40001001	Yesu Kilistu afumili mulukolu lwa Dawudi na Dawudi afumili mulukolu lwa Ibulahimu. Alu ndi lulalanda lwa lukolu lwaki.
40001002	Ibulahimu kamulela Isaka na Isaka kamulela Yakobi na Yakobi kamulela Yuda na vakulumundu.
40001003	Yuda amlelili Pelesi na Zela, mawau aveli Tamali. Pelesi kamulela Hesilomi, na Hesilomi kamulela Lami na
40001004	Lami kamulela Aminadabu na Aminadabu kamulela Nashoni na Nashoni kamulela Salumoni na
40001005	Salumoni kamulela Boasi, mamundu Boasi aveli Lahabu. Boasi na Lutu vaveli valeli va Obedi. Na Obedi kamulela Yesi.
40001006	Yesi kamulela Mutwa Dawudi. Na Dawudi kamulela Solumoni, mawaki Solumoni mwanja mtasi aveli mdala wa Uliya.
40001007	Solumoni kamulela Lehoboamu na Lehoboamu kamulela Abiya na Abiya kamulela Asa,
40001008	na Asa kamulela Yehoshafati na Yehoshafati kamulela Yolamu na Yolamu kamulela Usia.
40001009	Na Usia kamulela Yofamu, na Yofamu amlelili Ahasi, na Ahasi kamulela Hezekia.
40001010	Na Hezekia kamulela Manasi, na Manasi kamulela Amosi, na Amosi kamulela Yosia.
40001011	Na Yosia kamulela Yekomia na vahaja vaki fyosi afi fyaveli chipindi Vayawudi pavatoliwili vavanda kuyenda Babiloni.
40001012	Vayawudi pavatoliwili kala kuuvanda kuluhamila aku Babiloni, Yekonia kamulela Shealitieli, Shealitieli kamulela Zelubabeli.
40001013	Na Zelubabeli kamulela Abyudi, na Abyudi kamulela Eliyakimu, na Eliyakimu kamulela Azoli.
40001014	Azoli kamulela Sadoki na Sadoki kamulela Akimu na Akimu kamulela Eliyudi.
40001015	Eliyudi kamulela Eliyazali na Eliyazali na mweni kamulela Matani na Matani kamlela Yakobi.
40001016	Yakobi kamulela Yosefu bambu waki Maliya na Maliya kamulela Yesu yivamkema Kilistu.
40001017	Topi kwavelili na fileli lilongu na mchechi kukandila Ibulahimu mbaka Dawudi, Fileli lilongu mchechi tangila Dawudi mbaka kuluhamila kula Babiloni, kwaveli na fileli lilongu na mchechi kukandila kutoliwa kuyenda kula Babiloni mbaka chipindi cha Kilistu Mgombola.
40001018	Topi ndi wawonikili Yesu Kilistu. Maliya mamudu Yesu aveli nondi ya Yosefu. Ngajila tanila kumufika amanyikili kala kucha aveli na suliya yapatili kwa uwesu wa Mfuki Mng'alili.
40001019	Yosefu nondi yaki Maliya aveli goleki, alemili kumupa soni nondi waki pawelu. Kwanongwa ayi ayiholili amuleki kwa chifisu.
40001020	Paghaveyi akwihola chilongu achi, topi, makungu wa Bambu kamwisila mung'onju, kamuwombela, “Yosefu wa lukolu lwa Dawudi kotoo kutila kumheta Maliya kwanongwa kana suliya kwa uwesu wa Mfuki Mng'alili.
40001021	Dayihongeshi mwana mlumi na yuwi dawumupi litawa Yesu, kwanongwa mweni ndi davalowoli vandu vaki kufuma mu sambi shawu.”
40001022	Topi afi fyosi fiva ili chivi chila chilongu cha detili Bambu kwa lishu lya mbuyi wa Chapanga kucha,
40001023	“Muyenji dayimi yinda na daamuleli mwana mlumi na davamkemi litawa lyaki Imanueli” Mana yaki, “Chapanga kava pamu na yufwi.”
40001024	Topi, Yosefu payimukili, kamuheta Maliya kucha makungu wa Bambu Chapanga wamuwombilili.
40001025	Yosefu kawonja ha na Maliya mbaka pawonikili mwana. Topi Yosefu kamupa litawa lya Yesu mwana yula yawonikili.
40002001	Yesu awonikili mumbwani ya Betelehemu, mumkowa wa Yudeya, chipindi cha Helodi paghavaya mutwa. tepu, vandu yivasikawula ndondwa vafikili Yelusalemu kufuma kundamba.
40002002	Vadasha, “kava koti mwana yawonikili daghavi mutwa wa Vayawudi? Tuyiwona ndondwa yaki payibwitukili kundamba, tuyisa kumutundamila.”
40002003	Mutwa Helodi papikanishili afi, ang'ong'utekili nendu, mweni pamu na vandu vosi va Yelusalemu.
40002004	Topi, kavakema vatambika vakomi vosi pamu na vawula va Malawu kavadasha, “Kilistu Mgombola dawonikeli koti?”
40002005	Veni vamuyangula, “Dawonikeli kumbwani Betelehemu, mkoa wa Yudeya. topi ndi wayandikili mbuyi wa Chapanga.
40002006	‘Yuwi Betelehemu mlima wa Yuda, kuva mkomi gati ya mbwani sha Yuda, nongwa kwa yuwi dabwituki chilongosi, davalongoshi vandu vangu, Vayisilaeli.’ ”
40002007	Topi Helodi avakemili vasimanyili ndondwa kwa chifisu ili vamumanyishi chipindi choti nakaka ndondwa payibwitukili.
40002008	Pambeli kavalayila Betelehemu padeta, “Muyendi mukakombikeshi kwa chiganu nongwa ya mwana ayu. Pamumuwona mwisi kung'ombela na nenga nyendi ngamutundamili.”
40002009	Pavapikanishili kala filongu fya Mutwa vayendilela na mwanja na yila ndondwa yivayiwonili kundamba yivalongulela, payiyenda mbaka yiwoloka pambindi ya pavelili mwana.
40002010	Pavawonili ndondwa vasekelela munu.
40002011	Topi vayingila munyumba, vamuwona yula mwana pamu na Maliya, vawa vamtundamila, pambeli vawopola mbembu shawu vamupa fupu: chumang'andu na ubani na mafuta vatalamili yivavakema manimani.
40002012	Chapanga avakayikili vala yivayisili kumlola mwana Yesu vakotoo kumuwuyila Helodi, topi vawuya kaya kupitila deha yingi.
40002013	Pavawukili kala vala vahenja, Topi makungu wa Bambu Chapanga amfumbukilili Yosefu mung'onju, kamuwombela, “Tandamuki! Umtoli mwana pamu na mamundu, mutuvili Misili mukayikali aku mbaka pandivawombela, kwanongwa Helodi akwilata amuwulayi mwana ayu.”
40002014	Topi Yosefu atandamukili, kamtola mwana pamu na mamundu pamihi yiyila yila, vawuka vayenda Misili.
40002015	Kayikala aku mbaka Helodi pasovili. Topi, chilongu chadetili Bambu kwa deha ya vambuyi wa Chapanga fiva, “Ndamkemili mwana wangu kufuma Misili.”
40002016	Helodi pamanyili kucha vala vasimanyili ndondwa vaveli vamujanga, akalalili munu. Alayishili vana valulumi vosi mumbwani ya Betelehemu na vala yivaveli mumbali mbali yaki yivaveli na myaka mivili na pasi ya mwaka mivili vawulaghiwi. Agolili nahau ngimu wakashili chipindi cha vala vasimanyili ndondwa pavadashili milandu ya mwana.
40002017	Nahawu ndi wuyivelili chilongu chila chadetili mbuyi wa Chapanga Yelimiya,
40002018	“Lishu lipikanika aku Lama, chivembu na kudedeka nendu. Raheli akuvalilila vana vaki. Wala akudayila ha kushisha moyu, kwanongwa vosi vayaghamila.”
40002019	Helodi asovili kala, topi makungu wa Bambu amubwitukilili Yosefu mulilotu kula Misili.
40002020	Kamuwombela “Tandamuki! Mtoli mwana na mamundu muyendi Mlima wa Isilaeli, nongwa vala yivadayileyi kumuwulagha mwana ayu vasova kala.”
40002021	Katandamuka kamtola mwana pamu na mamundu vawuya kumlima wa Isilaeli.
40002022	Lakini papikanishili kucha Alikelau aveli mutwa wa Yudeya badili ya Helodi tatimundu, aveli akutila kuyenda aku. Mweni pavamukayikili mumilotu ayendili mwambu wa Galilaya.
40002023	Kayenda ayikalili mumbwani ya Nazaleti nahau ndi wufivelili filongu fyawombili kwa deha ya Vambuyi “Davamkemi mundu wa Nasaleti.”
40003001	Majuva vala Yohani Mbatisha abwitukili: palandula kuchivala aku Yudeya:
40003002	Mweni kawomba, “Mupomeli sambi nongwa wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga samba wisa.”
40003003	Yohani ayu ndi yula Isaya yaveli mbuyi wa Chapanga yamudetili: “Mundu yumu akukema kucheja: ‘Mutandi njila ya Bambu, Muhololi deha yaki.’ ”
40003004	Yohani mbatisha afwalili yingwa sivasonili kwa mingoma ya ngamia. Na lufunga lwa ngwembi muchiwunu chaki. Filivi fyaki fyaveli vangumbingumbi na njuki.
40003005	Topi, vandu kufuma Yelusalemu na kufuma mbembi shosi sha mlima wa Yudeya pamu na mbembi shosi sha mumbali mbali ya lweni Yoludani, vamuyendela.
40003006	Vayipetili sambi shawu na mweni kavabatisha mulweni Yoludani.
40003007	Lakini pavawonili Mafwalisayu na Masadukayu vakumwisila ili vabatishiwi. Kavawombela, “Yumwi vanjoka! Ghani yavapwepwilili mwilyepi na asabu yiyisayi?”
40003008	Mulangushi kwa fivelekwa kucha mupomela.
40003009	Mukotoo kuyihola kucha damuyilyepi asabu nongwa tati wenu ndi Ibulahimu! Nguvawombela Chapanga akuwesha kuyigola migonguveli ayi yivi vana va Ibulahimu.
40003010	Topi, livawu liva kala kudumula mikigha ya libiki, ndamboyi kila libiki lingajila kulela fivelekwa finofu likudumuliwa na kudangiwa mumotu.
40003011	Nenga nguvabatisha kwa machi kulangusha kucha mupomela. Lakini yula dayisi kumbeli ya nenga yaveli na liwovi pitu nenga. Nenga ngujakwa ha hata kupapa filatu fyaki. Mweni davabatishi kwa Mfuki Mng'alili na kwa motu.
40003012	Mweni akukamula luselu mumawoku vaki dafyaghili nendu luvagha lwaki na dakungi mbeyu shaki musanja na myeyu akwinyanya mumotu wungajila kujimika
40003013	Chipindi achi Yesu ayisili kufuma Galilaya kayenda mulweni Yoludani abatishiwi na Yohani mbatisha.
40003014	Lakini Yohani mbatisha ayeshili kumkanila padeta, “Nenga ngudayila kubatishiwa na yuwi, kandi na yuwi ukwisa kwa nenga?”
40003015	Lakini Yesu kamuyangula, “Yuwi ujumili hela kwanongwa tugoli fyosi fyadayila Chapanga.” Topi Yohani ajumilili.
40003016	Yesu pabatishiwi kala, bahala pala kajabuka mumachi topi kumbindi kwa Chapanga kufuwuka kamuwona Mfuki wa Chapanga pasunuka kucha njiva na kumtula pambindi yaki.
40003017	Lishu kufuma kumbindi kwa Chapanga lideta, “Ayu ndi mwana wangu yindimtamili mayiliwa na mweni.”
40004001	Pambeli Mfuki Mng'alili amulongushili Yesu mbaka kucheja ili ayeshiwi na Lijangavandu.
40004002	Kayikaja kulya majuva milongu mchechi pamusi na pamihi, pambeli kawona njala.
40004003	Topi, Mwafu kamwisila, kamuwombela “Leki yuwi kuva Mwana wa Chapanga nakaka, deti migonguveli ayi yivi filivi.”
40004004	Yesu kamuyangula, “Yiyandikiwa mumayandiku Vang'alili. Mundu akwikala kwa kulya filivi weka hela ha, ila kwa chilongu chochosi chadeta Chapanga.”
40004005	Pambeli Lijangavandu kamtola mbaka Yelusalemu, mbwani ying'alili, kamvika pambindi ya mnala wa nyumba ya Chapanga.
40004006	Kamuwombela, “Leki nakaka yuwi kuva mwana wa Chapanga, widangi pasi, kwanongwa yiyandikiwa mumayandiku Vang'alili ‘Chapanga davalayishi makungu vaki vakuyangi mumawoku vawu, ukotoo kuponikela mumigonguveli’”.
40004007	Yesu kavawombela, “Yiyandikiwa mumayandiku Vang'alili, ukotoo kumuyesha Chapanga, Bambu waku.”
40004008	Pambeli Lijangavandu kamtola mbaka pambindi ya chidunda chitali, kamlangusha wutwa shosi na ukomi waki.
40004009	Lijangavandu kamuwombela, “Fyosi afi ngukupa pawundundamila.”
40004010	Topi Yesu kamuwombela, “Kopoki apa Lijangavandu! Yiyandikiwa mumayandiku Vang'alili mtundamili Chapanga Bambu waku na kumkimbanikila mweni hela.”
40004011	Topi, Lijangavandu kawuka kamuleka Yesu na makungu vayisa, kumukimbanikila Yesu.
40004012	Yesu apikanilili kucha Yohani mbatisha vamutatila muchijaka, ayendili Galilaya.
40004013	Awukili Nasaleti, kayenda kwikala mumbwani ya Kapelinaumu, muluwongu ya lihiva lya Galilaya mumbaka ya wilaya ya Sebuloni na Nafutali.

40004015	“Mlima wa Sebuloni na mlima wa Nafutali yavelili mudeha ya kuyenda kulihiva lya Galilaya mwambu ya lweni Yoludani na mumlima wuvayikala vangajila kuva Vayawudi.
40004016	Vandu vayikalili kuchisi, vawonili lwengi lukomi. Na vala vayikalili mulisisi lya njifwa, lwengi luvang'alikila!”
40004017	Kukandila chipindi achi Yesu akandili kulandula, padeta, “Mupomeli, kwanongwa wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga wuva pabehi!”
40004018	“Yesu patyangeyi muluwongu lwa lihiva lya Galilaya, avawonili vandu vavili yivavelili ulongu. Vavelili Simoni yivamkema Petili pamu na Andeleya, vaveli mulihiva vakufuva vasomba kwa lwafu. Veni vaveli vafuva.
40004019	Yesu kavawombela, mungovikeli, nenga danivagoli muvi vafuva va vandu.”
40004020	Bahala pala, vasileka njafu shawu, vamukovikela Yesu.
40004021	Payendili pawulongolu, kavawona vandu vengi vavili yivavelili ulongu, vavelili Yakobi na Yohani vana va Sebidayu, veni vavelili muwatu pamu na tati wawu pavasambula njafu shawu. Yesu kavakema.
40004022	Tepu vawulekili watu pamu na tati wawu, vamukovekela Yesu.
40004023	Yesu aveli akuyendayenda mumlima wosi wa Galilaya. Pawula munyumba sha kudadavila na kulandula Chilongu cha nyanyi cha wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga na kulowola matami kafwauti kafwauti.
40004024	Milandu yaki yakwilili mumlima wosi wa Siliya, vamuyeghela vandu vosi yivavelili na matami, vala yivavelili vakutamika na kuteshiwa, yivavelili na matami va finyamkela na chisilika na vapombalili vamuyeghilili na mweni kavalowola vosi.
40004025	Mipinga mikomi ya vandu yamukovikelili kufuma Galilaya na Dekapoli, mbwani yikemiwili Mbwani Lilongu na kufuma Yelusalemu na kufuma Yudeya na kufuma mbembu yingi ya Yoludani.
40005001	Yesu paliwonili lipinga lya vandu, akwenili kuchidunda, kayikala. Vanachuli vaki vamushengitela.
40005002	Pambeli kakanda kuvawula,
40005003	“Vanemiliwa vala yivayimanya kucha veni vakuwesha ha kwikala ngajila Chapanga! Nongwa wutwa wa kumbindi ndi wawu.
40005004	Vanemiliwa vala yivavelili na lung'ong'u, Nongwa Chapanga davavafwamushi.
40005005	Vanemiliwa vala vashishamoyu, nongwa ava ndi davahali mlima wa shonu.
40005006	Vanemiliwa vala yivavelili na njala na yivayikaja kulya kwanongwa ya ugoleki, Chapanga davayikutishi.
40005007	Vanemiliwa yivaveli na lusungu, Chapanga davawoneli lusungu.
40005008	Vanemiliwa vala yivamtama Chapanga kwa ndima yawu yosi, nongwa davamuwoni Chapanga.
40005009	Vanemiliwa vala yivavika kusika, kwanongwa davakemiwi vana va Chapanga.
40005010	Vanemiliwa vala vagobuleka kwanongwa ya ugoleki, kwanongwa wutwa wa kumbindi ndi wa veni.
40005011	“Munemiliwa yumwi vandu pavavajowola na pavavasulumu na pavavapayishila findu fyosi fya wafu kwanongwa ya nenga.
40005012	Musekileli na kunemelela kwanongwa fupu yenu ngomi kumbindi kwa Chapanga, nongwa pavavasulumili vambuyi ngimu yimusulumiwa ponopawu yumwi.”
40005013	Yesu kadeta, “Yumwi muva munyu wa mlima lakini munyu pawuyaghamisha chinosi chaki dayinoghishiwi na liki? Yikujakwa chindu kandi ha, ila yikuyasiwa hela na vandu vayivatangi.
40005014	“Yumwi muva lwengi lwa mlima awu! Mbwani yivajengili pachidunda yikufisika ha.
40005015	Kwahela mundu yanamika luliku na kulugubika kwa chiyungu, ila ukuluvika kumbindi ya pachindangawala ili yivang'alikili vosi yivaveli munyumba.
40005016	Wuwowu luliku lwenu lulikili vandu, ili vafiwoni figoli fyenu finofu, vamujumi Tati wenu yaveli kumbindi.
40005017	“Mukotoo kwihola kucha nyisa kuwusha Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa na mayandiku va vambuyi, ila nyisa kugola fivi.

40005020	Nguvawombela, ugoleki wenu pawuyongisheka ng'odu pitu wula wa Mafwalisayu na vawula va Malawu, damuyingili ha muwutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga.”
40005021	“Mupikanila kala kucha vandu va pakwandi vawombiliwili, ‘Ukotoo kuwulaya! Yula dawulayi dahighiwi.’
40005022	Lakini nenga nguvawombela, yoyosi yamukalalila mlongu mundu, ahighiwi. Yamubedala mlongu mundu dayeghiwi kuchitemela. Yamukema mlongu mundu ‘Mpufi’ kava munjifwa ya kuyingila mulifumbika.
40005023	“Topi, pawuyegha fupu yaku pafyalu na pawukumbuka kuva na shoshu na mlongu waku,

40005026	Nakaka ngukuwombela, dawufumi ng'odu mula mbaka uhombi ligwala lya mwishu.”
40005027	“Mupikanisha kucha vandu vavawombilili, ‘Mukotoo kugola uwoni!’

40005029	Topi, lisu lyaku lya mlilu palikugola ugoli uvifyi, wulikolopoli kaliyasili kutali. Ngiba yuwi uyaghamishi chimu mumvili waku, pitu kuyasa mvili waku wonda mulifumbika.
40005030	Kucha liwoku lyaku lya mlilu palikuvifya, ulidumuli uliyasi kutali. Ngiba yuwi uyaghamishi chindu chimu cha mvili waku pitu mvili waku wosi ugwijuki mulifumbika.”
40005031	“Yiwombiwa kala, ‘mundu yamuleka mwehi waki, yamugayilili talaka.’
40005032	Lakini nenga nguvawombela, yamugayila mwehi mundu talaka ila kwanongwa yoyosi yingajila uwoni akuvifya kumugola ayu mdala agoli uwoni. Pambeli mlumi yamuheta mdala yula alekiwili na mweni akugola uwoni.”
40005033	“Kandi mupikanila kucha vandu va pakwandi vawombiwili, ‘Ukotoo kuleka malapu vaku, lakini ugoli malapu vaku kwa Bambu.’

40005035	Kandi mukotoo kwilapa pamlima kwanongwa ndi chigoda chaki cha kuvikila mawulu na mukotoo kwilapa hata kwa Yelusalemu kwanongwa ndi mbwani ya wutwa mkomi.
40005036	Kandi kotoo kwilapa kwa mutwi waku kwanongwa ukuwesha ha kulugola lufwili lumu luvi lukeli awu lutitu.
40005037	Pawudeta, ‘yina’ yivi yina na ‘Ng'odu’ yivi ng'odu topi chochosi dachiyongisheki chikufuma kwa yula mwafu.”
40005038	“Mupikanisha kucha yideteka, ‘Lisu kwa lisu, linu kwa linu.’
40005039	Lakini nenga nguvawombela, ukotoo kumugolela Lugotu mundu mwafu. Mundu pakuvangula likanja lya mlilu mughalambulili na likanja lya mkiyi.
40005040	Mundu pakuyegha kuchitemela kucha kakutolela gwanda yaku, mleki atoli na lihabiti lyaku.
40005041	Mundu pakung'ang'anika kupapa msiwu waki mwanja wumu, yuwi yendi kavili.
40005042	Mundu pakakuluva umupi, kotoo kumupa chisowu mundu yadayila kukopa chindu.
40005043	“Mpikana kucha vadeta, ‘Mtami mjofi waku na kumunyekwa chimudwama waku.’
40005044	Lakini nenga nguvawombela muvatami vachimdwama venu na kuvadadavila kwa Chapanga vala yivavasulumu yumwi.
40005045	Ili muvi vana va Tati wenu yaveli kumbindi. Kwanongwa mweni akuvavalila lijuva vandu vawafu na vanofu na kuvatonyela ndonya vandu goleki na va wafu.
40005046	Damupati fupu liki kwa kuvatama vala yivavatama yumwi hela? Kwahela! Kwanongwa hata vala vasumula vakugola wuwowu!
40005047	Kucha pamuvajambusha vaghanja venu hela, mukugola chindu ng'odu? Hata vandu vangajila kumumanya Chapanga vakugola wuwu.
40005048	Topi mugoleki vasangi kucha Tati wenu yaveli kumbindi waveli msangi.”
40006001	“Mwivavali mukotoo kugola figoli fyenu fya ugoleki pawulongulu ya vandu ili mumanyiki. Pamugola naha Tati wenu yaveli kumbindi davapi ng'odu fupu.
40006002	“Topi pawumtanga mgaju, kotoo kulandusha kwa vandu. Kotoo kugola kucha mfyangu wagola munyumba sha kudadavila na mudeha ili vandu vavajumi. Nakaka nguvawombela, ava vapata kala fupu shawu.
40006003	Lakini yumwi pamuvatanga vagaju, hata wa chimbundi chimu akotoo kumanya, lakini pawumtanga, hata mundu yuummanyili akotoo kumanya chiwugolili.
40006004	Tawuli utangi waku kwa chifisu na tati waku yalola findu fifisikili fiwugola, dakufupi.
40006005	“Pamudadava mukotoo kugola kucha vafyangu. Veni vakudayila kuwoloka na kudadava munyumba sha kudadavila na mumaleka ili vandu vavaloli, nakaka muvawombeli ava vapata kala fupu shawu shosi.
40006006	Lakini yuwi pawudadava, wingili munyumba yaku, tati mlyangu, pambeli muluvi Tati waku yangajila kuwoneka. Na mweni yalola fifisikili daakufupi.
40006007	“Pamudadava, mukotoo kudeta fitangalili fingajila nongwa kucha vandu vangajila kumumanya Chapanga. Veni vakwihola kucha vamulungu vawu daavapikanishi kwanongwa ya filongu fyawu fitangalili.

40006011	Utugayili filivi fya nalelu.
40006012	Tupomeli fituvifyili, ngimu yufwi wutuvapomela vala vatuvifyili.
40006013	Kotoo kututaya munyeshiwu, lakini wutuwilyepeshi na yula mwafu. [Kwanongwa wutwa ndi waku na liwovi na ukomi mbaka jola. Yina.]
40006014	“Kwanongwa pamuvapomela vandu fyavavifyili na yumwi wuwowu Tati wenu wa kumbindi davapomeli.
40006015	Lakini pamuvapomela ng'odu vandu fyavavifyili na yumwi Tati wenu davapomeli ng'odu fimuvifyili.

40006019	“Mukotoo kulunda mali apa pamlima pavelili sondu na kutu fikuyananga na vefi vakwingila na kuhija.
40006020	Mulundi mali kumbindi kwa Chapanga kungajila sondu na kutu ya kuyananga, wala vefi kuyingila na kuhija.
40006021	Kwa nongwa pala pawulundili mali shaku na moyu waku dawuvi bahala.
40006022	“Lisu kucha lwengi lwa mvili waku. Leki lisu lyaku linofu na mvili waku wosi dawuvi mulwengi.
40006023	Lakini lisu lyaku palivifya, muvili waku wosi dawuvi mulwisa. Topi, payiva lwengi luveli mugati yaku luva mulwisa, topi ndi lwisa totolu!
40006024	“Kwahela mundu yawesha kuvakimbanikila vabambu vavili. Mana damuleki yumu na kumutama yula monga, awu damukovikeli yumu na kumubedala yula yumu. Muweshi ng'odu kumukimbanikila Chapanga na mbiya kwa chipindi chimu.
40006025	“Ndi nongwa nguvawombela, mukotoo kuva na chipwembwi kucha damulyi liki na damlandi liki ili mwikali awu kucha damufwali yingwa liki, unofu ndi utalama pitu filivi. Na mvili utalama pitu filivi na yingwa?
40006026	Muvaloli vambongu, vakukweta ng'odu, wala vakubena ng'odu na vavahela lusanja. Hata naha, Tati wenu wa kumbindi akuvakutisha. Topi, yumwi mtalama pitu ava.

40006028	Nongwa liki mukuyihola kuyilata yingwa? Muloli uluva ndambu yiwukula na pawunemuna. Wukugola ha chichuku wala kugola.

40006030	Leki payiva Chapanga akulifwalisha lidasi livelili nalelu na chilawu likuyasiwa mumotu, ponopa akuvagolela yumwi vandu finofu nendu? Yumwi vandu yimuvelili na ujumilwa mdokwa!

40006032	Nongwa fyosi afi ndi fikudayiliwa na vandu vangajila kumumanya Chapanga. Lakini yumwi Tati wenu wa kumbindi kamanya kucha mukudayila findu fyosi afi.

40007001	“Mukotoo kuvahigha vengi na yumwi damuhighiwi na Chapanga.

40007025	Ndonya yitonya na nyeni siyitika liyegha lipugha na kuwumbila kunyumba ayi. Lakini yiwa ha kwanongwa vajengili pambindi ya ligonguveli.

40010011	“Pamuyingila mumbwani awu chijiji chochosi mumusaki mundu wa kumutyangila na mwikali amu mbaka lijuva damuwuki pala.

40010013	Leki venikaya pavavayanga, kusika kwenu dakuvi pamu na veni. Lakini pavavayanga ng'odu, topi sika yenu dayivawuyili mwaveni.
40010014	Kucha mundu yoyosi palema kuvalibushila awu kuvapikanisha, topi pamufuma munyumba yila awu mbwani yila, mupundi lifu mumawulu yenu yivi chilangushilu cha napilu yenu.
40010015	Nakaka nguvawombela, lijuva lya highilu vandu va mbwani ayi davapati asabu ngomi pitu yila yivapatili vandu va Sodoma na Gomola.”
40010016	“Mpikanishi! Ponopa nenga nguvalayisha yumwi kucha vafungami gati ya fingekembi. Muvi na luhunja kucha njoka na vashishamoyu moyu kucha vanjiva.
40010017	Muyivavali, nongwa davavayeghi yumwi kuchitemela na kuvalatula ndomondu munyumba shawu sha kudadavila.
40010018	Davavayeghi pawulongolu ya vatavala na vatwa kwanongwa ya nenga, ili mundovileli kwa veni na kwa vandu vamonga vangajila kuva Vayawudi.
40010019	Topi, yumwi pavavayegha mubalasa, mukotoo kuyihola kucha damudeti liki na damudeti wuliwuli, tepu damugayiliwi fya kudeta.
40010020	Mana damudeti yumwi ha, ila Mfuki wa Tati wenu ndi yadeta kupitila yumwi.
40010021	“Mlongu damushengeti mlongu mundu awulayiwi na Tati damshengeti mwana mundu na vana davavalimbi valeli vawu na kuvagola vawulayiwi.
40010022	Vandu vosi davavanyekwi yumwi kwanongwa ya litawa lyangu. Lakini yayiwunishila mbaka mbelu, ndi dalowuliwi.
40010023	“Vandu pavavagobola mumbwani yimu, mutuvilili mbwani yingi. Nakaka nguvawombela, damumalili ha ndyangilu yenu mumbwani shosi sha Isilaeli ngajila mwana wa mundu kufika tanila.
40010024	“Mwanachuli ampiti ha muwula waki, wala ndumindumi ampiti Bambu mundu ha.
40010025	Yikwila mwanachuli kuva kucha muwula waki na ndumindumi kuva kucha Bambu mundu. Leki mkomi wa nyumba vamukema Besibuli, vana va muna nyumba davakemiwi matawa va wafu nendu!”
40010026	“Topi, mukotoo kuvatila vandu ava. Chindu chochosi chigubikiwili dachigubutuliwili na chindu chifisiwili dachilangushiwi.
40010027	Chindivawombela yumwi mulwisa, muchideti pangesha na chilongu muchipikanishili mumbwepu, muchilandushi pachisuwulu.
40010028	Mukotoo kuvatila vala yivawulagha muvili, lakini vakuwesha ha kuwulagha ndima. Ngiba munu kumtila Chapanga nongwa mweni akuwesha kuwulagha mvili pamu na ndima mumotu wa lifumbika.
40010029	Vamkongujoli vavili vakuhemishiwa kwa ligwala lidokwa limu. Lakini hata yumu akuponeka ha pasi ngajila Tati wenu kumanya.
40010030	Lakini kwa mwambu wenu, hata fwili sha mitwi yenu sivalangiwa shosi.
40010031	Ponopa mukotoo kutila, yumwi muna nongwa pitu mkongujoli vatangalili.”
40010032	“Mundu yajumila pawelu kucha mweni wa nenga na nenga dandimjumili pawulongolu ya Tati wangu yaveli kumbindi kwa Chapanga.
40010033	Lakini yoyosi yanema pawulongolu ya vandu na nenga dandimlemi paulongolu ya Tati wangu yaveli kumbindi kwa Chapanga.”
40010034	“Mukotoo kwihola kucha nyisa kuyegha kusika pamlima awu, nyisa kuyegha kusika ha ila upanga.
40010035	Mana nyisa kuyegha shoshu kwa mundu na Tati mundu, kwa kamwali na mawaki na mkohanu na mkohanumundu.
40010036	Na chimdwama wa mundu, ndi mundu wa kayaki.
40010037	“Yamutama Tati awu mamundu pitu nenga, akudayiliwa ha. Na yamtama kamwali awu mwana waki akujumiliwa ha kuva ndundami.
40010038	Mundu yangajila kutola lupingika lyaki na kungovikela, akudayiliwa ha kuva ndumindumi.
40010039	Yakamulila unofu waki, dayaghamishi, lakini yayaghamisha unofu waki kwanongwa ya nenga dawupati.
40010040	“Yavapokela yumwi, akumbokela nenga na yambokela nenga akumpokela yula yanayishili.
40010041	Yamupokela mbuyi wa Chapanga kwanongwa ndi mbuyi, dapokeli fupu ya mbuyi. Yamulibushila mundu msangi kwanongwa ndi mundu msangi, dapokeli fupu ya mundu goleki.
40010042	Nakaka nguvawombela, yoyosi damupi mundu mudokwa gati ya vanachuli ava lwindi lwa machi vasisimili kwanongwa kava mundu wa nenga nakaka dayimpoti ha kupokela fupu yaki.”
40011001	Yesu pamalilili kuvawombela naha vala vanachuli vaki lilongu na vavili, awukili pala, kayenda kuwula na kulandula mumbwani sha behi na kula.
40011002	Yohani mbatisha paghaveyi muchijaka apikanishili milandu yagolili Kilistu, topi, Yohani kavalayisha vanachuli vaki vayendi kwa Kilistu.
40011003	Vamudashi, “Yuwi kuva yula Yohani adetili dawisi, awu tumulembileli wingi?”
40011004	Yesu kavayangula, “Muyendi mukamuwombeli Yohani mbatisha filongu fimupikana na kufiwona,
40011005	Vangalimesu vakulola na vandevindevi vakuyendayenda. Vaveli na utami wa mwiku vakung'ala na majogu vakupikana. Vasovili vakushukushiwa na vagaju vakulanduliwa Chilongu cha Nyanyi.
40011006	Ngiba mundu yula yaveli na cheleli yangajila njelangu na nenga.”
40011007	Topi vala valayiliwili na Yohani mbatisha pavawukeyi, Yesu akandili kuliwombela lipinga lya vandu nongwa ya Yohani mbatisha: “Pamuyendili kuchivala kumulola Yohani mukadayileyi kulola chindu liki? Mukadayileyi kulola liteti palitikanyishwa na liyegha? Ng'odu!
40011008	Ponopa mukayendili kulola mundu wa wuliwuli? Wuli mukayiholili mwayendili kumulola mundu yafwalili yingwa sha nyanyi? Ng'odu! Vandu vakufwala yingwa sivayilili vakwikala munyumba sha vatwa!
40011009	Lakini, mukayendili kulola liki? Mbuyi? Yina nakaka mundu pitu mbuyi wa chapanga.
40011010	Ayu ndi yivamuhimula mumayandiku vang'alili. ‘Loli, nenga ngumlayisha makungu wangu akulonguleli, mweni dakutandili deha yaku:’
40011011	Nakaka nguvawombela gati ya vandu vosi yivaikalili, kwa hela yawonikili kuva mkomi pitu Yohani mbatisha. Hata naha, yula yaveli mdokwa muwutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga, ndi mkomi pitu Yohani.
40011012	Tangila chipindi cha Yohani mbatisha mbaka nalelu, wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga wukulevangiwa nendu na vandu vakali vakuyesha kuwutola kwa liwovi.
40011013	Ngulilu shosi sha vambuyi va Chapanga na Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa vahimulilagha milandu ya Wutwa mbaka chipindi cha Yohani mbatisha.
40011014	Leki pamuwesha kujumila, topi Yohani ndi Eliya amuhimulileyi kwisa.
40011015	Muna majeji vakupikanila apikani!
40011016	“Topi, dachiyifwani na chindu liki chileli achi? Kucha fijana vaveli vayikala paluvagha, pavayiwombela lipinga limu kwa lipinga limonga.
40011017	‘Tuvakuvila ngoma lakini mufina ha! Tusomola misambu ya lung'ong'u, lakini mulila ha!’
40011018	Kwa nongwa Yohani mbatisha ayisili, ayikajili kulya na wala kulanda difwayi ha, lakini veni vawomba kana chinyamkela.
40011019	Mwana wa mundu ayisili, akulya na kulanda na veni vadeta, ‘Mumloli ayu, mbafu na njayila, ghanja wawu vandu vasumula mbiya na vaveli na sambi!’ Hata naha luhunja lwa Chapanga lukuwoneka ilinganila kwa findu figolikili.”
40011020	Vandu va mumbwani sila Yesu shagolili mihilu yitangalili vapomela ha, topi Yesu awukili mumbwani sila.
40011021	“Pishu yuwi Kolosayi! Pishu yuwi Betisayida! Nongwa, mihilu yigolikili kwa yumwi yingagolikili kula Tilu na Sidoni, vandu vaki vangafwalili kala milobota dahili na kuyibunga lifu pavapomela sambi.
40011022	Hata naha, nguvawombela nakaka, lijuva lya highilu yumwi damupati asabu ngomi pitu yila ya Tilu na mlima wa Sidoni.
40011023	Na yuwi Kapelinaumu! Wuli ukwihola dawuyikweshi mbaka kumbindi kwa Chapanga? Dawutengelimuliwi mbaka kumambi! Mana leki mihilu yigolikili kwa yuwi yingagolikili kula Sodoma, mlima wula wungavelili mbaka nalelu.
40011024	Lakini nguvawombela nakaka, lijuva lya highilu yuwi dawupati asabu ngomi pitu yila ya Sodoma.”
40011025	Chipindechi Yesu adetili, ngukulumba yuwi Tati, Bambu wa kumbindi na mlimawu, nongwa kuvafisa yivavelili na luhunja na yivasomili findu afi, kuvagubutulila yivangajila kusoma.
40011026	Yina, Tati nahawu ndi yikunowilili.
40011027	“Tati wangu kanyimba findu fyosi. Kwahela yamumanyili Mwana ila Tati, wala kwahela yamumanyili Tati ila Mwana na mundu yoyosi yula Mwana padayila kumgubutulila.
40011028	“Mwisi kwa nenga yumwi mwavosi yimutofili kwa kwitwika misiwu misitu na nenga dandivagoli mupumulili.
40011029	Mwiwopi lingongola yangu na mwiwuli kwa nenga, nongwa nenga ndi msangi na mshisha moyu na yumwi damusikimali mundima shenu.
40011030	Nongwa lingongola lindivapa nenga liva nyililili na msiwu wangu mpusu.”
40012001	Chipindi achi Yesu, akatyangeyi mufitava fya mupunga lijuva lya kupumulila, topi vanachuli vaki vawona njala, vakanda kuketula sasa sha mpunga kunu pavadodola ngokwa shaki.
40012002	Mafwalisayu pavawonili nawula, vamuwombela Yesu, “Loli, vanachuli vaku vakugola chindu chikaniwili mumalawu kugola lijuva lya kupumulila!”
40012003	Yesu kavayangula, “Musoma duhu fyagolili Dawudi pamu na vayaki pavaveghi na njala?
40012004	Mweni ayingilili munyumba ya Chapanga kalya mibumunda yivikiwili litambiku lya Chapanga, mweni hata vamonga vala vajumishiwa ha kulya mibumunda yila ila vatambika weka yawu.
40012005	Awu musoma duhu muchitabu cha Malawu cha Musa kila lijuva lya kupumulila vatambika vakuvifya Malawu munyumba ya Chapanga, lakini kwahela yaihola kucha vana nongwa?
40012006	Topi, nguvawombela kucha, apa kuna yaveli mkomi pitu nyumba ya Chapanga.
40012007	Kucha tungamanyili mana ya filongu afi ‘Ngudayila lusungu litambiku ha.’ Mungavahighili ha vandu vangajila nongwa.
40012008	Mana Mwana wa mundu ndi bambu wa lijuva lya kupumulila.”
40012009	Yesu awukili pala kayenda munyumba ya Chapanga.
40012010	Kwaveli mundu yumu munaliwoku lipombalili. Topi, vandu vamudasha Yesu, “Finofu kumulowola mundu lijuva lya kupumulila?” Vamudashili nahawu ili vapati pa kumuhighila.
40012011	Lakini Yesu kavawombela, “Tudeti mundu kana meni waki kadubukila mumyowu, akotoo kumujabula kwanongwa lijuva lya kupumulila?
40012012	Lakini mundu katauka pitu meni! Topi, tukujumishwa kugola chindu cha nyanyi lijuva lya kupumulila.”
40012013	Pambeli kamuwombela yula mundu, “Hololi liwoku lyaku.” Kaliholosha na lyeni liva linofu kucha lila liwoku lingi.
40012014	Topi, Mafwalisayu vafuma panji vawombana, ndambu davamuwulayi Yesu.
40012015	Lakini Yesu pamanyili chindu chila, kawuka pala paghaveyi. Vandu vatangalili vamukovikelili, kavalowola vatami vosi,
40012016	na avalayishili vakotoo kuvawombela vandu filongu fyaki,
40012017	Agolili wula ili fila fyadetili Chapanga kupitila mbuyi wa Chapanga Isaya fivi,
40012018	“Loli ayu ndumindumi wangu yindimushawulili, yindimutamili na yanovilili mumoyu. Dandimuviki Mfuki wangu, na mweni dalanduli highilu yangu kwa vandu va milima yosi.
40012019	Daghavi na malimbu ng'odu wala kuvika umatu, wala lishu lyaki dalipikaniki mudeha ng'odu.
40012020	Lutete lufujukili daluketuliwi ha, wala utambi ututuma lyosi daujimishiwi ha, mbaka haki yitavali.
40012021	Mweni vandu va milima yosi davamshuvilili.”
40012022	Pambeli vamuyeghela Yesu mundu yumu ngalimesu na yaveli ngadeta kwanongwa aveli na chinyamukela. Yesu kamulowola, kawesha kudeta na kulola.
40012023	Lipinga lya vandu lijinga na kudeta, “Pamongapa ayu ndi Mwana wa Dawudi?”
40012024	Lakini Mafwalisayu pavapikanishili afi, vadeta, “Mundu ayu akuvinga finyamkela kwa litawa lya Besibuli mkomi wa finyamkela.”
40012025	Yesu amanyili hoshu shawu, kavawombela, “Wutwa wowosi wuyitapulili lipinga lipinga pawulimbana, wuyikali ha. Na mbwani awu nyumba yoyosi yiitapula fipinga fipinga na kulimbana dayiwi.
40012026	Payiva Lijangavandu akumuvinga Lijangavandu monga, akwilimba mweni. Topi, wutwa waki dauwoloki wuliwuli?
40012027	Yumwi mukudeta kucha nguvavinga finyamkela kwa uwesu wa Besibuli, vala vanachuli va yumwi vakuwusha finyamkela kwa uwesu wa ghani? Findu fivagola vanachuli venu fikulangusha nakaka kucha yumwi muyaghamila.
40012028	Lakini payiva nguvavinga finyamkela kwa liwovi lya Mfuki wa Chapanga, topi, mumanyi wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga wufika kala kwa yumwi.
40012029	“Kwahela mundu yawesha kwingila munyumba ya mundu muna liwovi na kutola findu, ngajila kumuwopa mundu ayu muna liwovi. Pamuwopili kala ndi daweshi kumupoka findu.
40012030	“Yoyosi yangajila kuva mwambu wangu akunimba na yoyosi yangajila kukunganya pamu na nenga akuchachasha.
40012031	Nongwa ayi, nguvawombela, vandu davapomiliwi sambi shosi sivagolili na kumduka kwawu kosi, lakini davapomiliwi ha sambi ya kumuduka Mfuki Mng'alili.
40012032	Kandi yadeta chilongu cha kumulimba Mwana wa mundu dapomeliwi, lakini yula yadeta chilongu cha kumulimba Mfuki Mng'alili, dapomiliwi ng'odu, wala mumlima awu wala kumulima wuyisa.”
40012033	“Muligoli libiki kuva linofu na fivelekwa fyaki dafivi finofu, Muligoli kuva lya wafu na fivelekwa fyaki dafivi fya wafu. Libiki likumanyika kwa fivelekwa fyaki.
40012034	Yumwi vanjoka! Mukuwesha wuliwuli kudeta chilongu chinofu kunu yumwi muva va wafu? Nongwa mundu akudeta kufuma fimemili mundima yaki.
40012035	Mundu mnofu akufumisha chindu chinofu kufuma mundima yaki nofu na mundu wa wafu akufumisha findu fya wafu mundima yaki wafu.
40012036	“Topi, nguvawombela, lijuva lya kuhighiwa vandu davayanguli kwanongwa ya filongu fingajila kujakwa fila fivadetili.
40012037	Nongwa kwa chilongu chaku dawuvi goleki na kwa filongu fyaku dawuhighiwi.”
40012038	Pambeli vawula vamonga va Malawu na Mafwalisayu vamuwombela Yesu, “Muwula, tukudayila utulangushi mihilu yaku.”
40012039	Mweni kavayangula, “Chileli cha wafu chingajila kujumila! Mukudayila mihilu lakini damupati ng'odu chilangushilu ila chila chilangushilu cha mbuyi wa Chapanga Yona.
40012040	Ndambu Yona yaikalili majuva matatu mumtima ya somba mkomi, yiva nga wayikalili Mwana wa Mundu muuganga majuva matatu.
40012041	Vandu va Ninawi vabwituka chipindi cha kuhigha, davachihighi chileli achi. Nongwa vandu va Linawi vapomilili pavampikanishili Yona palandulili! Nguvawombela nakaka, apa pana chindu chikomi pitu Yona
40012042	Lijuva lya kuhigha, Muhumbu wa Sheba dachihighi chileli achi. Nongwa mweni yafumili mwanja mutali kayenda kupikanila chilongu cha luhunja cha Solumoni na kumbi apa kuna chikomi pitu Solumoni,
40012043	“Chinyamkela mwafu, pavingiwa kwa mundu, akuyelejayeleja kucheja pasaka pahali pa kupumulila apati ha.
40012044	Na apa akwidetela, dang'uyi kayangu kufumili? Lakini pawuya payiwona kwahela, yifyaghiliwa na kunoweshwa.
40012045	Akuyenda kuvatola finyamkela vamonga saba vawafu pitu mweni na vosi vakwisa kumuyingila mundu yula na ngalilu ya mundu yula yikuva ya wafu pitu dahili. topi ndi dayivi kwa vandu ava va wafu.”
40012046	Yesu paghaveyi akalihela kudeta na lipinga lya vandu chipindi mawaki na valongumundu pavafikili na vawolukili panji, vakadayileyi vaywangi na Yesu.
40012047	Topi, mundu yumu kamuwombela Yesu, “Mawaku na valongu vaku vava panji vakudayila kuywanga na yuwi.”

40012049	Pambeli kaholola liwoku lyaki pavavasonyela vanachuli vaki, padeta, “Ava ndi vamawu vangu na valongu vangu!
40012050	Nongwa yoyosi yagola fyadayila Tati wa nenga yaveli kumbindi ayu ndi muhaja wangu na mkulu wangu na mawu wangu.”
40013001	Lijuva lilila, Yesu afumili mula munyumba kayenda akayikali muluwongu ya lihiva na kuwula.

40013004	Paghaveyi akukweta mbeyu, simonga shaponikili mudeha na vambongu vayisa valya.
40013005	Simonga shaponikili muuganga wuveli na migonguveli gonguveli pangajila uganga wutangalili. Simela kalopu, kwanongwa pavelihela uganga utangalili.
40013006	Palivalili lijuva mikigha yiyuma kwanongwa uganga waveli mudokwa.
40013007	Simonga shaponikilili mumisomi, misomi yikula na kuyikekeneka mihali.
40013008	Simonga shaponikilili muuganga wa nyanyi, simela na shavelikili nendu, simonga siveleka mya yimu na simonga siveleka milongu sita na simonga siveleka milongu mitatu.”
40013009	“Muna majeji vakupikanila apikani!”
40013010	Vanachuli vaki vamuyendela, vamudasha, “Nongwa liki ukudeta na vandu kwa chilangushilu?”
40013011	Yesu kayangula, “Yumwi msangiliwa kusimanya mbwepu sha wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga, lakini veni vasangiliwa ha.
40013012	Nongwa yaveli na chindu akugayiliwa na kuyongeshiwa, Lakini yula yangajila chindu, hata chila chidokwa chavelili nachu na cheni chikupokiwa.
40013013	Nongwa ngudeta nawu kwa chilangushilu, kwanongwa vakulembesha lakini vakulola ha, vakupikanisha lakini vakupikana ha, wala vakumanya ha.
40013014	Kwaveni fiva fila fyadetili Mbuyi Isaya, ‘Kupikana damupikani, lakini mumanyi ha. Kusepa damusepi lakini damuloli ha.
40013015	Nongwa luhala lwa vandu ava lupufika, vadiva majeji vawu, Vagunga kwa mesu vawu, pamonga vangalolili kwa mesu vawu, na vangapikanishili kwa majeji vawu, na vangamanyili kwa luhala lwawu, na veni vangaghalambukili, pavadeta Bambu, na nenga ningavalowulili.’ ”
40013016	Yesu kadeta kandi, “Ngiba yumwi! Nongwa mesu venu vakulola na majeji venu vakupikana.
40013017	Nakaka nguvawombela, Vambuyi va Chapanga na vandu goleki vatangalili vadayilili nendu kufiwona fila fimufiwona yumwi na vafiwona ha na kufipikana fila fimufipikana yumwi na vafipikana ha.
40013018	“Topi yumwi muyiwuli kwa chilangushilu cha mkweta.
40013019	Yoyosi yapikana chilongu cha wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga ngajila kumanya, akuva kucha sila mbeyu siponikili mudeha, Yula mwafu akwisa na kusitola sila sikwetiwili mumoyu waki.
40013020	Mbeyu yila yikwetilwi mumigonguveli ndi chilangushilu cha mundu yapikanisha chilongu achi na kuchipokela kwa cheleli.
40013021	Lakini akuchikamula ha na mikigha yaki, yikuyendilela kukula nendu ha. Pambeli pawubwituka kugobuleka kwanongwa ya chilongu achi, akulepisiwa kalopu.
40013022	Yila mbeyu yiponikili pamibiki ya misomi, ndi chilangushilu cha mundu yapikanila chilongu, lakini chipwembwi cha mlimawu na kufwamuka kwa mali likuchikekeneka chilongu achi na mweni akulela ha fivelekwa.
40013023	Yila mbeyu yikwetiwili muuganga mnofu ndi chilangushilu cha mundu yapikanila chilongu cha Chapanga na kuchimanya na mweni akulela fivelekwa, Yumu mya, wingi milongu sita na wingi kandi milongu mitatu.”
40013024	Yesu kavawombela vandu chilangushilu chingi, “Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga wuyifwana nga naha, mundu yakwetili mbeyu nofu muchitava chaki.
40013025	Pamihi yimu vandu pavaveli mung'onju chimudwama yumu ayisili katulila mityendya mumpunga, pambeli awukili.
40013026	Topi, muhali pawukulili na kukanda kuyalula na mityendya wuwula yiwoneka.
40013027	Vandumindumi va yula muna chitava vamuyendela, vamuwombela, Bambu, yuwi wakwetili mbeyu nofu muchitava chaku, ponopa mityendya yifuma koti?
40013028	Mweni kavayangula, ‘Chimudwama ndi yagolili nahawu,’ Topi, vandumindumi vaki vamudasha, wuli, ukudayila tuyendi tukatupuli mityendya?

40013030	Muyileki yikuli pamu mbaka chipindi cha kubena, chipindi achi dandivawombeli vala yivabena. Mukungashi tanila mityendya mukawopi milundumilundu ya kunyanya motu, lakini mupunga mukunganyi mukauviki mulusanja lwangu.”

40013032	Yeni dokwa pitu mbeyu shonda, lakini payimela likuva libiki likomi pitu mibiki yosi, hata vambongu vakwisa na kujenga miyumba yawu mumitafyi yaki.”
40013033	Yesu kavawombela chilangushilu chingi, “Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga wukwifwana na simika yatolili mawu yumu, kayihasha na ukova fitandavala fivili na litingaja, ukova wosi kawupundila mumula.”

40014001	Chipindi chila Helodi mtavala wa Galilaya, apikanishili milandu ya Yesu.
40014002	Topi, kavawombela Vandumindumi vaki, “Nakaka ayu ndi Yohani mbatisha, kashukuka kufuma kumambi, Kwa nongwa akuwesha kugola mihilu.”

40015002	“Kwanongwa liki vanachuli vakukombikesha ng'odu fila tufipokilili kwa vavaha vetu? Vakunava kukandila mawoku ngimu ya chishovi chetu ha pavadayila kulya!”

40016001	Mafwalisayu na Masadukayu vamuyendilili Yesu, ili kumuyesha, vamuluva avalangushi mihilu kufuma kumbindi kwa Chapanga.

40017014	Pavalifikilili kandi lila lipinga lya vandu, mundu yumu amuyendilili Yesu, kamutundamila,
40017015	“Kadeta, Bambu muwoneli lusungu mwana wangu kana chisilika, akugobuleka munu, myanja yitangalili akuwila mumotu na mumachi.
40017016	Ngamuyeghili kwa vanachuli vaku lakini vaweshili ha kumulowola.”
40017017	Yesu kayangula, “Yumwi chileli chingajila ujumilwa, chiyaghamili! Dandiyikali na yumwi mbaka ndili? Dandivawunishili yumwi mbaka ndili? Mumuyeghi apa mwana ayu.”
40017018	Topi, Yesu kamulakalila yula chinyamkela na mweni kamufuma yula mwana, mwanja wuwula wula kanana.
40017019	Pambeli vanachuli vamuyendela Yesu kwa chifisu, vamudasha, “Kwanongwa liki yufwi tulemwa kumuwusha yula chinyamkela?”
40017020	Yesu kavayangula, “Nongwa ya ujumilwa wenu mdokwa. Nguvawombela nakaka, pamuva na ujumilwa hela, wuvi mdokwa hata kucha mbeyu ya likuyu, mukuwesha kuchiwombela chidunda achi, Wuki apa yendi pala, cheni dachiyendi. Kwahela chindu chingajila yumwi kuwesha.”
40017021	Lakini mayandiku vamonga vayandika, “Finyamkela fya ndambu ayi fikuwuka kwa njila ayi ha, ila kwa kudadava na kwikaja kulya.”
40017022	Pavaveghi pamu aku Galilaya, Yesu avawombilili, “Mwana wa mundu datawuliwi mumawoku va vandu.
40017023	Davamuwulayi, lakini lijuva lya tatu kukandila pasovili, dashukushiwi.” Vanachuli vang'ong'oteka munu.
40017024	Pavafikili Kapelinaumu vandu yivakunganya kodi ya Nyumba ya kudadavila vamuyendilili Petili, vamudasha, muwula wenu akuhombaya kodi ya Nyumba ya kudadavila?
40017025	Petili kayangula, “Yina, akuhomba.” Topi, Petili payingilili munyumba, hata akali hela kudeta chilongu chochosi, Yesu kamudasha, Simoni, “Yuwi ukuwona wuliwuli? Vatwa va mlimawu vakukunga ushulu awu kodi kufuma kwa vaghani! Kufuma kwa vanamlima awu kwa vahenja?”
40017026	Petili kayangula, “Kufuma kwa vahenja, Yesu kavawombela mani naha vanamlima yikuvayilata ha.”
40017027	Lakini tukotoo kuvavifya, yendi kulihiva kalopoli, Toli somba yatalili kuwomela, umutumbuli, mugati ukusiwona mbiya sha saka. Toli ukahombi kwanongwa ya nenga na yuwi.
40018001	Chipindi chila vanachuli vamuyendilili Yesu, vamudasha, “Ghani yaveli mkomi nendu muwutwa wakumbindi kwa Chapanga?”
40018002	Yesu kamukema mwana yumu, kamuwolosha pagati yawu,
40018003	Pambeli kadeta, “Nguvawombela nakaka pamupota kughalambuka kuva kucha vana, damwingili ng'odu muwutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga.
40018004	Yoyosi yangajila kwikwisha kucha mwana ayu, ayu ndi yaveli mkomi muwutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga.
40018005	Mundu yamulibushila mwana yumu kucha ayu kwa litawa lyangu, akumbokela nenga.”
40018006	“Lakini mundu damuvifyi yumu wa ava vadokwa yivajumilili nenga, yingaveli ngiba awopiwi mungulu ligonguveli lya kushaghila na kudibashiwa mumachi.
40018007	Ngiba mlima kwanongwa ya ngingamu sivagufya vatangalili. Ngingamu asi dasifumbuki lakini ngiba mundu yula dafigoli figoleki.
40018008	“Kucha liwoku awu liwuli lyaku palikuvifya wulidumuli na wuliyasi kutali nayuwi. Ngiba kwa yuwi kwingila muunofu wa jola ngajila liwoku awu liwulu, pitu kudangiwa mulifumbika pawuva na mawoku mavili na mawulu vaku mavili.
40018009	Lisu lyaku palikuvifya, likolopoli na kulidangila kutali na yuwi. Ngiba kwingila muunofu pawuva nandoju, pitu kudangiwa mumotu wa lifumbika pawuva na mesu vosi mavili.
40018010	“Mwivavali! Mukotoo kumubedala hata yumu wa ava wadokwa. Nguvawombela, Makungu vawu aku kwa Chapanga majuva vosi vava pawulongolu pa Tati wangu yaveli kumbindi.
40018011	Mana Mwana wa Mundu ayisili kuchilowola chiyaghamilili.
40018012	“Mukuwona wuliwuli? Mundu paghava na vafungami mya, pamuyaghamisha yumu, akugola wuliwuli? Akuvaleka vala milongu tisa na tisa kuchidunda, akuyenda kumusaka yula yayaghamilili.
40018013	Pamuwona, nguvawombela nakaka, akumunemilela yula pitu hata vala milongu tisa na tisa vangajila kuyaghamila.
40018014	Wuwowu, Tati wenu yaveli kumbindi, akudayila ng'odu hata yumu wa ava vadokwa vayaghamili.
40018015	“Mlongu waku pakuvifya, muyendi mukajovi pamuva weka yenu Pakupikana dawuvi kumupata mulongu waku.
40018016	Pakupikana ng'odu, umtoli mundu yumu awu vavili pamu na yuwi ili hoshu sha vatovilela vavili awu vatatu chilongu chosi chihighiwi.
40018017	Pavapikana ng'odu ava, uliwombeli lipinga lya vandu limjumilili Kilistu, kucha palipikana ng'odu lipinga lya vandu limjumilili Chapanga, Topi, yavavika yumwi kucha vandu vangajila kumumanya Chapanga na vasumula mbiya.”
40018018	Nguvawombela nakaka, chila damuchitati mumlima wuwula wula dachitatiwi kumbindi kwa Chapanga na chimuchifuwula pamulima wuwula wula dachifuwuliwi kwa Chapanga.
40018019	“Kandi nguvawombela vavili pavajumila apa pamlimawu kwilata chindu chochosi cha kuluva, Tati wangu wa kumbindi davagoleli chindu achi.
40018020	Kwa nongwa poposi pala pavayikungasha vavili awu vatatu kwa litawa lyangu, nenga ndiva pamu na veni.”
40018021	Pambeli Petili kamuyendela Yesu kamudasha, “Bambu mlongu wangu pamifya ndimupomeli kaningi? Myanja saba?”
40018022	Yesu kamuyangula, “Ngudeta myanja saba hela ha, ila milongu saba myanja milongu saba.
40018023	Ndi nongwa wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga wukwifwana na mutwa yumu yadayileyi tolitoli ya Vandumindumi vaki.
40018024	Pakandili kukawula, vamuyeghela mundu yumu yaveli na nongwa ya mbiya milongu alufu.
40018025	Mundoyu aveli kavahela cha kuhomba, Ponopa Bambu mundu kalayisha vamuhemeshi mweni na mdalamundu na vana na fyosi fyaveli nafyu, akahombi nongwa.
40018026	Topi, ayu ndumindumi katundama pawulongolu yaki, kadeta, ‘Umeti danguhombi nongwa yaku yosi.’
40018027	Yula Bambu kamuwonela lusungu, kampomela nongwa yila, kamuleka ayendi.”
40018028	“Lakini ndumindumi yula awukili, kamuwona yumu wa ndumindumi mumonga yaveli na nongwa yaki ya mbiya mya. Kamukamula kamukama pangulu kunu padeta, ‘Hombi mbiya shangu!’
40018029	Yula ndumindumi monga katundama, kamuluva, ‘Umeti danguhombi.’
40018030	Lakini mweni kalema, ila kamuwopa muchijaka mbaka pahomba yila nongwa.
40018031	Topi, vandumindumi vamonga pavawonili chilongu achi vang'ong'oteka munu, vayenda kumuwombela Bambu wawu chilongu chila chibwitukili.
40018032	Topi, yula Bambu kamukema yula ndumindumi kamuwombela, yuwi ndumindumi mwafu munu! Yuwi wanuvili na nenga ngupomela nongwa yaku yosi.
40018033	Na yuwi wungamuwonilili lusungu kucha nenga wungugolilili kwa ndumindumi muyaku?
40018034	Topi Bambu yula akalalili munu, kamufumisha yula ndumindumi alatuliwi mbaka pahomba nongwa yosi.”
40018035	Yesu kamalilila kwa kudeta, “Na Tati wangu yaveli kumbindi davagoleli nahawu kucha mundu pamupomela ng'odu mlongu mundu kwa moyu waki wosi.”
40019001	Yesu akamalili kudeta filongu fila, kawuka Galilaya, kayenda Yudeya kumwambu ya lweni Yoludani.
40019002	Vandu vatangalili vamukovikela, mweni kavalowola.
40019003	Mafwalisayu vamu vamwisilili, vamudasha kwa kumushengeta, “Wuli, malawu vetu vakujumisha mlumi kumuleka mdala mundu kwanongwa yoyosi?”
40019004	Yesu kavayangula, “Wuli, musoma duhu Mumayandiku Vang'alili, kucha pakwandi Chapanga amulumbili mundu mlumi na mdala,
40019005	Chapanga adetili, ‘Kwa nongwa ayi mlulumi damuleki Tati waki na mawaki davayibavi na mdala mundu na veni davavi yumu?’
40019006	Ponopa, veni vavili kandi ha ila mundu yumu. Topi chavikili pamu Chapanga, mundu akotoo kuchilekanisha.”
40019007	Lakini Mafwalisayu vamudasha, “Nongwa liki Musa atulayishili kumuleka mdala mbaka yiyandikiwi talaka ndi alekiwi?”
40019008	Yesu kavayangula, “Musa avajumishili kuvaleka vadala venu nongwa ndima shenu sidindala. Lakini yavelili nahawu ha Chapanga palumbeyi mlima.
40019009	Topi, nguvawombela, mundu yamleka mdala mundu na kumuheta wingi akali akagola uwoni, ila paamleka kwanongwa ya uwoni wa mdala yula.”
40019010	Vanachuli vaki vamuwombela, “Kucha milandu ya mlumi na mdala yiva naha, ngiba kuleka kuheta.”
40019011	Yesu kavawombela, “Vosi ha yivawesha kupokela chilongu achi, ila vala hela yavatangili Chapanga.
40019012	Nongwa kuna nongwa simu simugola mundu aleki kuheta, vamonga kwanongwa vawoneka nahawu na vamonga kwanongwa vagoliwa nahawu na vandu na vamonga vawona ngiba vakotoo kuheta kwanongwa ya wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga. Yawesha kupokela ng'ulilu ayi apokeli.”
40019013	Pambeli vandu vamuyeghela Yesu vana vadokwa avavikili mawoku na kuvadadavila kwa Chapanga. Lakini vanachuli vavalakalila.
40019014	Yesu kadeta, “Muvaleki vana ava vayisi kwa nenga, mukotoo kuvakana nongwa Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga ndi wa vandu yivaveli kucha vana ava.”
40019015	Topi, kavavikila mawoku, pambeli kawuka.
40019016	Mundu yumu ayisili kwa Yesu, kamudasha, “Muwula, goli chindu liki chinofu ili ndiwupati unofu wa jola?”
40019017	Yesu kamuwombela, “Mbona ukudasha milandu ya nyanyi? Kuna yumu hela yaveli msangi. Pawudayila kwingila muunofu wa jola, koli Malawu va Chapanga.”
40019018	Yula mundu kamudasha, malawu voti? Yesu kadeta, “Kotoo kuwulagha, kotoo kugola uwoni, kotoo kuhija na kotoo kutovilela ufyangu,
40019019	vapikanishi tati waku na mawu waku na umutami mjofi mwawu ngimu witama umweni.”
40019020	Yula chijana kamuwombela, “Fyosi afi ndifikola: chamunu goli liki?”
40019021	Yesu kamuwombela, “Leki ukudayila kuva nyanyi, yendi kawuli mali shaku, mbiya dawusipati uvapi vagaju na yuwi dawuvi na lusanja kwa Chapanga pambeli wisi ungovikeli.”
40019022	Yula chijana papikanishili afi, kawuka kunu pang'ong'oteka, nongwa aveli mlundamali.
40019023	Topi Yesu kavawombela vanachuli vaki, “Nakaka nguvawombela, yidindala munu kwa mulundamali kwingila Muwutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga.
40019024	Kandi nguvawombela, yipusuka nendu kwa ndembu kwingila muchilanga cha sasiya, pitu mulundamali kwingila muwutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga,”
40019025	Vala vanachuli pavapikanishili nawula vajinga munu, vamudasha, “Leki yiva nahawu, ghani dalowoki?”
40019026	Yesu kavalola, kadeta, “kwa mundu fidindala, lakini kwa Chapanga findu fyosi fipusuka.”
40019027	Pambeli Petili kadeta, “Yufwi tufileka fyosi tukukovikela, datupati liki?”
40019028	Yesu kavawombela, “Nguvawombela nakaka mwana wa mundu payikala muchigoda cha wutwa wa muukomi, yumwi lilongu na vavili yimungovikela damwikali mufigoda pamuvahigha makabila lilongu na vavili va Isilaeli.
40019029	Na mundu yayilekili nyumba, mlongu awu muhaja, tati awu mawu, vana awu fitava kwanongwa ya nenga, dapokeli myanja mya na nendu, dapati na unofu wa jola.
40019030	Lakini yivaveli vakwaa davavi kumbeli na yivavelili kumbeli davavi vakwaa.
40020001	“Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga wifwana nga mundu yumu munachitava cha misabibu, yavelili kafuma pamalavila puti kuvavika vagolafichuku va muchitava chaki.
40020002	Awombanili nawu kuvahomba mbiya ijala ya lijuva limu, pambeli kavayegha muchitava chaki cha misabibu.
40020003	Kawuka kandi saa tatu pamalavila, kavawona vandu vamonga vawoloka kusoku, vavahela chichuku cha kugola.
40020004	Kavawombela, ‘muyendi kuchitava changu cha misabibu mukagoli chichuku, nenga dandivahombi ijala yenu.’
40020005	Topi, vayenda. Yula munachitava kawuka kandi saa sita pamusi na saa tisa kagola nga wuwula wula.
40020006	Hata payifikili saa lilongu na limu palumihi, kawuka kandi, kavawona vandu vamonga vawoloka pala pasoku. Topi, kavadasha, ‘Mbona muwoloka apa pamusi posi ngajila kugola chichuku?’
40020007	Vamuyangula, ‘Kwa nongwa kwahela mundu yatukemili tukagoli chichuku, mweni kavawombela na yumwi muyendi mukagoli chichuku cha muchitava changu cha misabibu.’
40020008	“Lijuva palihongili yula munachitava kamuwombela mkola mbiya waki, vakemi vagola chichuku uvahombi ijala yawu, ‘Ukandi na vala vafikili kumbeli, pambeli umalishili na vala vakwaa.’
40020009	Topi, vayisa vala yivayisili saa lilongu na limu vapokela kila mundu ijala ya lijuva limu.
40020010	Vala va kwaa kufika pavafikili, vakacheyi davapokeli sitangalili, lakini veni vapata ngimu wuwula wula kila mundu ijala ya lijuva limu.
40020011	Vasipokela mbiya shawu, vakanda kumung'ong'utekela yula bambu.
40020012	Vadeta, ‘Ava vafikili kumbeli vagola chichuku cha kwa lisaa limu hela. Mbona kutugolela tulinganili na veni kunu yufwi twiwunishila tugola chichuku chikomi na lijuva likali lituyakila?’
40020013	“Topi yula bambu kamuyangula yula muyawu yumu, ‘pikanishi ghanja, ngubanja chindu ng'odu! Twawombanili ng'odu na nenga, kucha ndivahombi ijala ya lijuva limu?
40020014	Toli ijala yaku, yendi, ngudayila kumupa ayu wa kumbeli mulinganili na yuwi.
40020015	Ndivahela haki ya kugola mali shangu ngimu wudayila ndimweni? Wuli, ukuwona weyi kwanongwa nenga ndiva msangi?’ ”
40020016	Yesu kamalilila kwa kudeta, “Ndi dayivi nahawu, yivavelili kumbeli ponopa davavi vakwaa na vakwaa davavi va kumbeli pambeli.”
40020017	Yesu paghaveyi akuyenda kumbindi Yelusalemu, avatolili vala vanachuli lilongu na vavili pachifisu na paghaveyi mudeha kavawombela,
40020018	“Mpikanishi! Tukuyenda Yelusalemu na aku Mwana wa Mundu davamuhadishi kwa mtambika mkomi na vawula va Malawu, veni davamuhighi awulayiwi kwa kumuvangilila mulupingika.
40020019	Davamuhadishi kwa vandu vangajila kumumanya Chapanga ili vamudanili, dalatuliwi ndomondu na kuvangiliwa mulupingika, lakini lijuva lya tatu kukandila pasovili, dashukushiwi.”
40020020	Mdala wa Sebidayu amwisilili Yesu pamu na vana vaki, katundama pawulongolu yaki kumuluva chindu.
40020021	Yesu kamudasha, “Chiwudayila liki?” Mawu yula kamuwombela, “Ngukuluva undangi muwutwa waku, ava vana vangu vavili vayikali yumu mwambu waku wa mlilu na wingi mwambu waku wa mkiyi.”
40020022	Yesu kamuyangula, “Mumanya ha kucha mukuluva chindu liki. Mukuwesha kulandila lwindi lwa ndeshiwu danandili nenga?” Vamuyangula, “Tukuwesha.”
40020023	Yesu kavawombela, “Nakaka damulandili lwindi lunandila nenga, lakini kwikala kumulilu awu kumukiyi chichuku cha ya nenga ha, chindu achi davapati vala yivashawuliwili kala na Tati wangu.”
40020024	Vala vanachuli vamonga lilongu pavapikanishili afi, vavalakalila vala valongu vavili.
40020025	Yesu kavakema, kavawombela, “Mumanya kucha vatavala va vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi vakutavala vandu vawu kwa mawovi na vakomi vala vakuvatavala vandu vawu.
40020026	Lakini kwa yumwi yikotoo kuva nahawu, ila yadayila kuva mkomi gati ya yumwi ghavi ndumindumi wa vosi,
40020027	na yadayila kuva wa kwaa gati ya yumwi ghavi ndumindumi wa yumwi.
40020028	Ndambu yiyeyi, Mwana wa Mundu kayisa kukimbanikiwa ha, ila kukimbanika na kutawula unofu waki kuva badili ya vandu vatangalili.”
40020029	Yesu paghaveyi akuwuka mbwani ya Yeliku, lipinga lya vandu lyamukovikelili.
40020030	Topi kwavelili na vangalimesu vavili vayikalili mumbalimbali ya deha, pavapikanishili kucha Yesu akupita pala, valandushili lishu, “Bambu, mwana wa Dawudi, wutuwoneli lusungu!”
40020031	Lila lipinga lya vandu livalakalila na kuvawombela vanyamali. Lakini veni valandusha nendu lishu, “Bambu mwana wa Dawudi, wutuwoneli lusungu!”
40020032	Yesu kawoloka, kavakema na kuvadasha, “Mukudayila ndivagoleli liki?”
40020033	Vamuyangula, “Bambu, tukuluva tuloli.”
40020034	Topi, Yesu kavawonela lusungu, kavagufya mesu vawu na tepu vawesha kulola, pambeli vamukovikela.
40021001	Yesu na vanachuli vaki pavaveghi samba vafika Yelusalemu, vafikili tanila Betifage mufidunda fya miseyituni. Pala Yesu avalayishili vanachuli vaki vavili,
40021002	kavawombela, “Muyendi mbaka chijiji chiveli pawulongolu yenu damumuwoni chihongu vamuwopa pamu na ngwada waki. Muvawoposoli munyegheli.
40021003	Leki mundu pavadasha nongwa liki mukumuwopusola, mumuwombeli Bambu akumudayila na tepu mweni davawuyishili.”
40021004	Chilongu achi chagolili ili fila fidetiwili na mbuyi fivi.
40021005	“Muyiwombeli mbwani ya Sayuni, Loli, Mutwa waku akwisila! Kava mshishamoyu na kayipakila chihongu, ngwada wa chihongu, mwana wa chihongu.”
40021006	Vala vanachuli vayenda vagola ngimu Yesu wavalayililili.
40021007	Vamuyegha yula chihongu pamu na mwana waki, vayala yingwa shawu kumuwongu ya vachihongwi na Yesu kayipaka kumuwongu yaki.
40021008	Lipinga lya vandu vayala yingwa shawu mudeha na vandu vamonga vatemula miputila ya mibiki vayala mumbali mbali ya deha kumulibushila.
40021009	Mipinga ya vandu valongulili na vala vamukovikela valandusha lishu, “Ajumiwi Mwana wa Dawudi! Anemiliwi ayu yayisa kwa litawa lya Bambu! Ajumiwi Chapanga kumbindi!”
40021010	Yesu paghaveyi akwingila Yelusalemu, mbwani yosi yimema njova. Vandu vakadasheyi, “Ayu ghani?”
40021011	Vandu mulipinga lila vadeta, “Ayu ndi Yesu, mbuyi wa Chapanga kafuma Nasaleti mkowa wa Galilaya.”
40021012	Topi, Yesu kayingila munyumba ya Chapanga, kavavingila panji vandu yivavelili vakuchuusa na kuhemela findu mugati ya nyumba ya Chapanga, kasibidula mesa sha vala yivaveyi vakufunja mbiya na figoda fya vala yivavelili vakuwula vanjiva.
40021013	Kavawombela, “Yiyandikiwa Mumayandiku Mang'alili, Chapanga kadeta, ‘Nyumba ya nenga yikukemiwa nyumba ya kudadavila.’ Lakini yumwi mupagola kuva mbaku ya vefi na vapoki.”
40021014	Vangalimesu na vakwavakwava vamonga vamuyendilili aku kunyumba Ngomi ya Chapanga, Yesu kavalowola.
40021015	Topi, vatambika vakomi na vawula va Malawu vakalala pavayiwonili mihilu yagolili Yesu na vana pavaveghi vakulandula mashu vawu nyumba ya Chapanga pavadeta, “Lujumu kwa mwana wa Dawudi.”
40021016	Topi, vamuwombela, “Kupikana ng'odu chivadeta?” Yesu kavayangula, “Yina ngupikana! Wuli musoma duhu mayandiku ava? ‘Kwa milomu ya vana vadokwa na fyali, ukwipatila jumu yeni.’ ”
40021017	Topi, kavaleka kafuma panji ya mbwani na kuyenda Betaniya, aku kawonja.
40021018	Pamavavila puti Yesu paghaveyi akuwuya kumbwani, katopa njala,
40021019	kaliwona libiki limu mumbalimbali ya deha kaliyendela lakini kaliwona livahela chindu ila mihamba weka. Topi, kaliwombela, “Kotoo kulela fivelekwa kandi jola!” Bahala pala libiki lila linyala.
40021020	Vanachuli pavawonili nawula vajinga, vadeta, “Nongwa liki libiki ali linyala kalopu?”
40021021	Yesu kavayangula, “Nakaka nguvawombela, leki pamuva na ujumilwa ngajila hoshu, mukuwesha kugola nahawu. Wekahela ha, ila hata pamuchiwombela chidunda achi ‘Tupuki kayilyasili mubahali,’ dachigoleki nahawu.
40021022	Pamuva na ujumilwa, chochosi damuluvi kwa kudadava damupati.”
40021023	Yesu kayingila munyumba ya Chapanga, akawuleyi. Pawuleyi mtambika mkomi na vavaha va vandu vamonga vamudasha, “Ukugola findu afi kwa uwesu wa ghani? Ghani yakupili uwesu awu?”
40021024	Yesu kavayangula, “Na nenga nguvadasha chindu chimu, Pamunyangula na nenga dandivawombeli ngugola findu afi kwa uwesu wa ghani.
40021025	Mung'ombeli uwesu wa Yohani mbatisha wafumili kwa ghani? Wafumili kwa Chapanga awu kwa vandu?” Lakini vawombana veni kwa veni naha, “Patudeta wafumili kumbindi daatudashi, ‘Mbona mwamjumilili ng'odu?’
40021026	Na patudeta, ‘Wafumili kwa vandu,’ tukutila lipinga lya vandu nongwa vosi vakujumila kucha Yohani mbatisha aveli mbuyi wa Chapanga.”

41006027	Bahala pala mutwa kamulayisha machonda akayeghi mutwi wa Yohani mbatisha. Machonda kayenda muchijaka kamdumula Yohani mutwi waki.
41006028	Pambeli kauyegha mutwi wula muluselu kamgayila muhinja, mweni kamgayila mau waki.
41006029	Vanachuli va Yohani mbatisha pavapikanishili afi, vayenda kuutola mvili waki na kuusika.
41006030	Vandundami vawuyili vatangana kwa Yesu, vamuwombela fyosi fila fyavagolili na kuwula.
41006031	Yesu kavawombela, “Tuyendi weka yetu mahali pangajila vandu, mkapumulili padokwa.” Adetili ndambu ayi kwanongwa kwavelili na vandu vatangalili vavelili vakwisa na kuwuka, mbaka vapata ha fwasi ya kulya filivi.
41006032	Topi vawuka weka yawu muwatu, vayenda mahali pangajila mundu.
41006033	Lakini vandu vavawonili pavaveghi vakuwuka, vavamanyili. Topi, vatuva kwa mawulu kufuma mbwani shosi na vatalili kufika.
41006034	Yesu pafumili muwatu, aliwonili lipinga likomi lya vandu. Kavawonela lusungu kwanongwa vaveli kucha vameni vangajila mdima. Topi kakanda kuvawula findu fitangalili.
41006035	Lumihi palufikili, vanachuli va Yesu vamyendela na kumuwombela, “Mahali apa pangajila vandu na lijuva lihonga.
41006036	Uvaleki vandu vayendi kufitava na mufijiji fya pabehi vakayihemeleli filivi.”
41006037	Lakini Yesu kavayangula, “Yumwi muvapi filivi valyi.” Vamdasha, “Ponopa tuyendi tukahemeli mibumunda ya mbiya sha ijala ya myesi minani.”
41006038	Kavadasha, “Muva na mibumunda miningi? Muyendi mkaloli.” Pavalolili kala, vamuwombela, “Tuva na mibumunda muhanu na vasomba vavili hela.”
41006039	Pambeli Yesu kavawombela vanachuli vaki vavawombeli vandu vosi vayitapuli mufipinga-fipinga, vayikali pasi mulugobi.
41006040	Topi, vandu vayikala mufipinga fya vandu miya yimu fya vandu milongu muhanu.
41006041	Pambeli Yesu kaitola mibumunda yila muhanu na vasomba vavili. Kalola kumbindi, kamlumba Chapanga na kuyimetula yila mibumunda. Pambeli kavapa vanachuli vaki vavapi vandu. Wuwula wula kavapa vandu vosi vala vasomba vavili.
41006042	Vandu vosi valya vayikuta.
41006043	Vanachuli va Yesu vasola mibumunda na vasomba vasighalili vamemesha fitandavala lilongu limu na fivili.
41006044	Vandu vosi valili valulumi vaveli alufu muhanu.
41006045	Bahala pala Yesu kavawombela vanachuli vaki vayingili muwatu, vamlonguleli kuyenda Betisayida. Mweni aveli akuvatawula vandu.
41006046	Pamalili kuvayitawula vandu, kayenda kuchidunda kumdadava Chapanga.
41006047	Lumihi palufikili, watu waveli pagati ya lihiva, mweni aveli weka hela kumwambu ya lihiva.
41006048	Kavawona vanachuli vaki vakukimbanika kuguba watu kwa ngafi, kwanongwa liyegha lyaveli likuvalimba. Payiveyi samba kulangala, Yesu kavayendela payendayenda kumbindi ya machi. Akadayileyi kuvapita,
41006049	kumbi veni pavamuwonili akuyendayenda kumbindi ya machi, vadeta aveli chishuka. Vawuta,
41006050	kwanongwa vosi pavamuwonili vatilili nendu. Bahala pala Yesu kavawombela, “Ndiva nenga! Mkotoo kutila, mugangamali.”
41006051	Pambeli kayingila muwatu pamu nawu na uyegha unyamala. Vanachuli vaki vajinga nendu,
41006052	kwanongwa vaveli vakali hela kumanya mana ya kuvagayila mibumunda yila valyi, ndima shawu shaveli sidindala.
41006053	Vajabuka lihiva, vayisa mumlima wa Genesaleti, pala vapayika watu wawu.
41006054	Pavajabukili muwatu, bahala pala vandu vamumanya Yesu.
41006055	Topi, vatuva mumlima wosi na vavatola vatami muluhagha na kuvayegha mahali poposi pavapikanishili Yesu paghaveyi.
41006056	Mahali poposi Yesu payendili, kufijiji, mumbwani, awu kufitava, vandu vavavika vatami pawelu. Vamluva avaleki vagufyi lupembu lwa yingwa yaki na vosi vagufyili vanana.
41007001	Vafwalisayu vamu na vawula va Malawu vafumili Yelusalemu vamushengitelili Yesu.
41007002	Vavawona vanachuli vamu va Yesu vakulya filivi kwa mawoku mawafu, nyanyi vanava ha kucha chishovi chawu.
41007003	Kwa nongwa Vafwalisayu na Vayawudi vosi vakulya ha filivi mbaka vanavi mawoku vawu kucha wuvakamulili chishovi cha vavaha vawu.
41007004	Pavafuma kusoku vakulya ha chindu chochosi mbaka vachiwofuwi. Wuwula wula vakamulili fishovi fimonga, kucha kuwofuwa fikombi, fiyungu, fihela na fyombu fya chumang'andu.
41007005	Topi, Vafwalisayu vala na vawula va Malawu vamdasha Yesu, “Kwa nongwa liki vanachuli vaku vakukamula ha fishovi fya vavaha, ila veni vakulya kwa mawoku ‘Va wafu?’”
41007006	Yesu kavayangula, “Isaya atungili unofu, yumwi vafyangu, kucha fyayandikili: ‘Vandu ava vakujuma kwa milomu yawu, lakini ndima shawu siva kutali na nenga.
41007007	Vakundundamila hela, pavawula fishovi fya vandu, kucha malayishu va Chapanga!’
41007008	“Yumwi mukuvaleka Malawu va Chapanga na kukamula fishovi fya vandu.”
41007009	Yesu ayendililili kudeta, “Mukuyihola mugola finofu, lakini muvalema Malawu va Chapanga ili mkamuli fishovi fyenu.
41007010	Kwa nongwa Musa adetili, ‘Vapikani tati waku na mawaku, mundu yoyosi yamjowola tati mundu awu mamundu dawulayiwi.’
41007011	Lakini yumwi mukudeta, kucha mundu yaveli na chindu cha kumtanga tati mundu awu mamundu, lakini kadeta chindu achi ‘Kolibani’ mana yaki, fupu kwa Chapanga,
41007012	topi mukudeta, mundu ayu akulemiwa kumtanga tati mundu awu mamundu.
41007013	Topi, mkuchibedala chilongu cha Chapanga kwanongwa ya fishovi fyenu fyimukamulili. Kandi mukugola findu fitangalili fya ndambu ayi.”
41007014	Yesu kalikema kandi lipinga lila lya vandu. Kavawombela, “Mpikanishi vosi mumanya.
41007015	Kwahela chindu chimuyingila mundu chiwesha kumgola ghavi mwafu. Ila fila fimfuma mundu, fyeni fikumugola ghavi mwafu.
41007016	Mundu yaveli na majeji va kupikanishila, apikani”
41007017	Palilekili lipinga lya vandu na kuyingila munyumba, vanachuli vaki vamdasha mana ya filangushilu afi.
41007018	Yesu kavawombela, “Hata yumwi muvahela luhala? Topi hata yumwi mumanya ng'odu kucha kwahela chindu chimuyingila mundu kufuma panji chimgola mundu ghavi ‘Mwafu’?
41007019	Kwa nongwa chikumuyingila ha mundima, ila chikuyingila munda, pambeli chikufuma panji ya mvili waki.” Kwa kudeta naha, Yesu kafigola filivi fyosi finofu.
41007020	Kayendelela kudeta, “Chindu chimfuma mundu ndi chimgola ghavi mwafu.
41007021	Kwa nongwa mundima ya mundu kukufuma hoshu wafu na uwoni na wifi na kuwulagha na fimonga upeji na
41007022	uwoni ubafu na wafu na ufyangu na lumatamata pamu na weyi na majowolu na lukilu na upufi.
41007023	Fyosi afi fikufuma mugati ya mundu, ndi fikumugola mundu ghavi mwafu.”
41007024	Pambeli Yesu kawuka mahali pala, kayenda mumbwani ya Tilu. Aku kayingila munyumba yimu na kadayila ha mundu yoyosi amanyi. Lakini kawesha ha kuyififa.
41007025	Mdadala yumu yavelili na muhinja yaveli na chinyamkela, apikanishili filongu fya Yesu. Topi, bahala pala kamuyendela na kumuwila mumawulu vaki.
41007026	Mdadala ayu aveli mugiliki na awonikili mumbwani ya Silofoiniki. Kamluva Yesu amuwushi chinyamkela muhinja waki.
41007027	Lakini Yesu kamuwombela, “Leki tani vana vayikuti. Nyanyi ha kutola filivi fya vana na kuvagayila vagalu.”
41007028	Mdadala yula kamuyangula, “Yina Bambu, lakini hata vagalu yivavelili pasi ya mesa vakulya mipwambwa ya filivi fya vana!”
41007029	Yesu kamuwombela, “Kwa ndambu yiwuyangulili, yendi kaya dawuwoni chinyamkela kamfuma muhinja waku!”
41007030	Mdadala yula kayenda kaya yaki, kamuwona mwana waki kawonja paulili na chinyamkela kamfuma kala.
41007031	Pambeli Yesu kawuka mumbwani ya Tilu, kayenda mbaka Sidoni afikili lihiva lya Galilaya, kupitila Dekapoli.
41007032	Vandu vamu vamuyeghela mundu yavelili majogu na yangajila kudeta unofu. Vamluva Yesu amvikili mawoku.
41007033	Yesu kamukwegha pambali na vandu. Kavika fyala fyaki mumajeji va mundu ayu. Pambeli atemili mita na kugufya lulimi lwa mundu yula.
41007034	Pambeli Yesu kalola kumbindi, kapumula nendu na kumuwombela mundu ayu, “Efwata” Mana yaki “Fuwuki!”
41007035	Bahala pala majeji va mundu yula vadiwuka, lulimi lwaki lufuwuka, kakanda kudeta unofu.
41007036	Yesu kavakanila kumuwombela mundu yoyosi. Lakini ndambu payendelelili kuvakanila, ndi ndambu yayendililili kukwisha filongu fyaki.
41007037	Vandu vajinga nendu. Vadeta, “Kagola fyosi finofu. Kavagola majogu vapikana na vangadeta vadeti!”
41008001	Chipindi achi, lipinga lingi likomi lya vandu vayikungula, vaveli vahela filivi. Topi Yesu avakemili vanachuli vaki, avawombilili,
41008002	“Nguvawonela lusungu vandu ava nongwa tuyikala pamu kwa majuva matatu nalelu vavahela filivi.
41008003	Panivaleka vayendi kaya na njala davashungi mudeha, nongwa vamonga vafuma kutali.”
41008004	Vanachuli vaki vamudasha, “Kunu kudasi datupati koti mibumunda ya kuyikuta vandu vosi ava?”
41008005	Yesu avadashili, “Muna mibumunda miningi?” Vamyangula, “Tuva na mibumunda saba.”
41008006	Topi kavalayila vayikali pasi, kayitola yila mibumunda saba, kamdadava Chapanga, kayimetula mibumunda, kavagayila vanachuli vaki, veni vavagayili vandu.

41008020	“Pametuleyi yila mibumunda saba na kuvagayila vandu nendu ya elufu mchechi mkunga filivi fisiyalili finingi?” Vayangula, “Fyaveli saba.”
41008021	Topi kavadasha, “Mkali hela kumanya?”

41008027	Pambeli Yesu na vanachuli vaki vayendili kufijiji fya pabehi ya Kayisalia Filipu. Pavaveghi munjila, Yesu kavadasha vanachuli, “Vandu vakudeta nenga ghani?”

41009001	Yesu kavawombela, “Nakaka nguvawombela, kuna vamonga bahapa davasovi ng'odu mbaka vauwoni Wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga pauyisa kwa liwovi.”

41009035	Yesu kayikala pasi, kavakema vala lilongu na vavili, kavawombela, “Mundu padayila kuva wa kwaa ghavi wa kumbeli na ndumindumi va wosi.”
41009036	Pambeli kamtola mwana mdokwa, kamwolosha pagati yawu, kamkusikila, kavawombela.
41009037	“Mundu yoyosi yamupokela mwana kucha ayu kwa litawa lyangu, akumbokela nenga. Na mundu yoyosi yambokela nenga, akumbokela weka yangu ha, akumpokela na yula yanayishili.”
41009038	Yohani kamwombela, “Muwula, tumuwona mundu yumu pawusha finyamkela kwa litawa lyaku, yufwi kumkanisha kwanongwa mweni muyetu ha.”
41009039	Lakini Yesu kadeta, “Mkotoo kumkanisha, nongwa kwa hela mundu yagola mihilu kwa litawa lyangu na chipindi chichila kudeta filongu fya wafu kwa nenga.
41009040	Nongwa, yangajila kulimbana na yufwi, kava na yufwi.
41009041	Mundu yoyosi davapi machi va kulanda kamamya yumwi muva vandu va Kilistu nakaka dayimpoti ha kupokela fupu shaki.”
41009042	“Yoyosi yadayila kumpughanya yumu wa ava vadokwa vajumilili nenga, Yingavelili ngiba mundu ayu awopiliwi ligonguweli likomi mungulu yaki na kumdubushila mulweni.
41009043	Kucha liwoku lyaku palikuvifya, lidumuli. Ngiba uyingili muunofu wa jola na liwoku limu, pitu kuyingila kulifumbika na mawoku mavili. Aku motu waki ukujimika ng'odu.”

41013005	Yesu akandili kuvawombela, “Muyikali mesu akotoo kuvapughanya mundu.
