42012059	Yina ngukuwombela dawufumi ng'odu amu, mbaka umalili kuhomba ligwala lyaku lya mwishu.”
42013001	Chipindi achi vandu vamu vayisili vamuwombilili Yesu milandu ya vandu va Galilaya, Pilatu avelili kavawulagha chipindi pavaveghi vakugola mitambiku?

42013019	Yiva kucha mbeyu ya likuyu lyatolili mundu yumu na kukweta muchitava chaki, yamelili na kuva libiki. Vambongu vajenga miyumba yawu mumitafyi yaki.”
42013020	Yesu adashili kandi, “Daninganishi wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga na liki?

42013029	Vandu davayisi kufuma kundamba na kuchanya, kufuma kwavayighanji na kuyikala mulihungu kuwutwa wa Chapanga.

42014001	Lijuva lya kupumulila limu, Yesu ayendili kulya filivi kaya ya mkomi yumu wa Mafwalisayu, vandu vavelili pala vavelili vakumlolesha.

42014005	Pambeli kamuwombela, “Ghani wa yumwi yaveli na mwana waki awu senga waki padubukila mumyowu, angamuwushili ng'odu mulijuva lya kupumulila?”

43003030	Mweni akudayiliwa ghavi mkomi, nenga ngudayiliwa ndivi mdokwa.”
43003031	Mundu yafuma kumbindi kwa Chapanga ndi mkomi wa fyosi. Mundu wa mlimawu ndi wa mlima awu na mweni akudeta filongu fya mlima awu. Lakini mundu yafuma kumbindi kwa Chapanga ndi mkomi wa fyosi.
43003032	Mweni akutovilela fila fyafiwonili na kufipikana, lakini kwahela mundu yajumila lulayilayi lwaki.
43003033	Mundu yoyosi yajumila lulayilayi lwaki kamanya kucha Chapanga ndi nakaka.
43003034	Yalayishiwili na Chapanga akudeta filongu fya Chapanga, kwanongwa Chapanga akumumemesha Mfuki waki utangalili.
43003035	Tati akumtama Mwana waki, kamgayila uwesu wosi mumawoku vaki.
43003036	Mundu yamjumila Mwana kana unofu wa jola, lakini yalema kumujumila Mwana, dapati ha unofu wa jola, kwanongwa maya va Chapanga davamuwuyili mweni.
43004001	Mafwalisayu vapikanila kucha Yesu aveli akupata vanachuli vatangalili munu pitu Yohani mbatisha na kuvabatisha.
43004002	Hata naha mweni Yesu kabatisha ha, ila vandundami vaki ndi vabatisheyi.
43004003	Topi Yesu papikanishili afi, kawuka Yudeya, kawuya Galilaya.
43004004	Mumwanja wula, kapitila Samaliya.
43004005	Kafika Sikali Mbwani ya Samaliya, pabehi na chitava cha Yakobi chamupili Yosefu mwana waki.
43004006	Pala pavelili na litepu lya Yakobi. Yesu ayikalili mulunenengu ya lila litepu, kwanongwa atofyili mwanja. Yaveli pabehi ya pamusi.
43004007	Pambeli mdadala yumu wa mlima wa Samaliya kayisa palitepu kuteka machi. Yesu kamuwombela, “Nguluva machi nandi.”
43004008	Chipindi chila vandundami va Yesu vayendili kumbwani kuhemela filivi.
43004009	Topi yula mdadala kamuyangula, “Yuwi kuva Muyawudi na nenga Msamaliya. Ukuwesha wuliwuli kunuva machi va kulanda?” Vayawudi vayihashagha ha na Vasamaliya.
43004010	Yesu kamuyangula, “Leki ungamanyili Chapanga akutawula chindu liki na ayu ghani yakuluva machi va kulanda, ungamuluvili mweni na mweni angakupili machi va unofu.”
43004011	Yula mdadala kamuwombela, “Bambu, kuvahela chindu cha kutekela machi na litepu lyeni litali munu. Topi dawupati koti machi va unofu?
43004012	Mbuyi wetu Yakobi ndi yatugayilili yufwi litepu ali. Mweni bahala pamu na vana vaki na vang'ongolu vaki valandili machi vaki. Yuwi wukuyiwona kuva mkomi pitu Yakobi?”
43004013	Yesu kamuyangula, “Kila mundu yalanda machi ava dayumilwi kandi ha.
43004014	Lakini mundu yoyosi dalanda machi vala dandimgayili, dayumilwi kandi ha hata padokwa. Kwanongwa machi dandimgayili, davavi mugati yaki mukusesa machi na kutuva machi va unofu wa jola.”
43004015	Mdadala yula kamuwombela, “Bambu, topi unyimbi machi veni ili ngotoo kuyumilwa kandi na ngotoo kuyisa kandi apa kuteka machi.”
43004016	Yesu kamuwombela, “Yendi kamkemi mlumi waku ayisi apa.”
43004017	Yula mdadala kamuyangula, “Nenga ndivahela mlumi.” Yesu kamuwombela, “Ukudeta nakaka kucha kuvahela mlumi.
43004018	Kwanongwa wahetiwili na valumi muhanu na ayu yiwikala nayu ponopa mlumi waku ng'odu.”
43004019	Pambeli mdadala yula kamuwombela, “Bambu, nguwona kucha yuwi mbuyi.
43004020	Vavaha vetu vamudadavili Chapanga kumbindi ya chidunda achi, lakini yumwi Vayawudi mukudeta kucha Yelusalemu ndi peni patudayiliwa kumdadavila Chapanga.”
43004021	Yesu kamuwombela, “Mawu, ujumili nenga, chipindi chikwisa vandu davamdadavili ha Tati kumbindi ya chidunda achi wala aku Yelusalemu.
43004022	Yumwi Vasamaliya mumanya ha chimuchidadava. Vayawudi tukumdadava Chapanga yitumumanyili na kwa kupitila Vayawudi, Chapanga kavakombola vandu vosi va mumlima.
43004023	Lakini chipindi dachiyisi na chiva kala, ponopa yivamdadava kwa nakaka vakumudadava tati muufuki na unakaka. Nongwa tati akuvatama vandu yivamdadava ndambu yadayila mweni.
43004024	Chapanga ndi Mfuki, vandu yivamdadava vakudayiliwa vamdadavi Mumfuki na unakaka.”
43004025	Mdadala yula kamuwombela, “Manya kucha Mkombola yivamkema Kilistu dayisi, payisa datuhimulili filongu fyosi.”
43004026	Yesu kamuwombela, “Nenga yideta na yuwi, ndi mweni.”
43004027	Chipindi chichila Vanachuli vaki vawuya. Vayikanganika kumuwona akuwombana na mdadala. Lakini kwahela mundu yamudashili yula mdadala kucha akudayila liki, awu kumudasha Yesu kucha nongwa liki akuwombana na mdadala yula.
43004028	Topi mdadala yula kachileka chiyungu chaki cha machi pala, kawuya kumbwani, avawombilili vandu,
43004029	“Mwisi mumuloli mundu yang'ombilili milandu yosi yigolili! Ayu Kilistu nda?”
43004030	Topi vandu vafuma mumbwani yila, vamyendela Yesu.
43004031	Chipindi chichila vandundami vaki vamudediveka, pavadeta, “Muwula, wulyi tanila filivi!”
43004032	Lakini Yesu kavayangula, “Nenga ndina filivi mngajila kufimanya.”
43004033	Vanachuli vaki vakanda kuyidasha, “Kuna mundu yamuyeghilili filivi?”
43004034	Yesu kavawombela, “Filivi fyangu ndi achi: kugola fila fyadayila Chapanga na kumalisha chichuku chanayishili ndiyigoli.
43004035	Yumwi mukudeta, ‘Yisighala myesi mchechi chipindi cha kubena chivi.’ Lakini nenga nguvawombela, mugubutuli mesu, muloli fitava! Fivelekwa fikamala, fiva kala kwa kubeniwa.
43004036	Mundu yabena fivelekwa dahombiwi na akuvika fivelekwa pamu kwanongwa ya unofu wa jola. Pambeli mundu yakweta na mundu yabena davasekileli pamu.
43004037	Kwa nongwa detelu yideta, ‘Mundu yumu akukweta mbeyu na wingi akubena fivelekwa’ wuva nakaka.
43004038	Nenga ndavalayishili yumwi kuchitava kubena fivelekwa fingajila yumwi kuyiyasha. Vandu vamonga vayashiwili na yumwi mupata fwayida ya chichuku chawu.”
43004039	Vasamaliya vatangalili va mbwani yila vamujumilili Yesu kwanongwa ya filongu fya yula mdadala patovilelili naha, “Ang'ombilili fyosi figolili.”
43004040	Vasamaliya vamuyendela Yesu, vamudediveka ayikali pamu na veni na Yesu kayikala nawu kwa majuva mavili.
43004041	Vandu vatangalili vamjumilili Yesu kwanongwa ya filongu fyaki.
43004042	Vamuwombela yula mdadala, “Ponopa tukujumila, kwanongwa filongu fiwutuwombilili weka ha, ila kwanongwa tupikana twaveni na tumanya nakaka kucha ayu ndi Mlowola wa mlima.”
43004043	Pavapitili majuma mavili, Yesu awukili pala ayendili Galilaya.
43004044	Kwanongwa Yesu mweni adetili, “Mbuyi akutundamiwa ng'odu kayaki.”
43004045	Vandu va Galilaya vayendili Yelusalemu kulihungu lya Pasaka. Veni vafiwonili fyosi Yesu fyagolili kula. Topi Yesu pafikili Galilaya, vamlibushilili.
43004046	Pambeli Yesu kayenda kandi Kana, mumlima wa Galilaya, pala paghalambulili machi kuva difwayi. Apa kwaveli na mkomi yumu yavelili na mwana mtami aku Kapelinaumu.
43004047	Topi mkomi yula papikanishili Yesu kafuma Yudeya kafika mumlima wa Galilaya, kamyendela, kamluva amlowoli mwana waki yatamikili dabadaba.
43004048	Yesu kamuwombela, “Pamuwona ng'odu chilangushilu na findu fya filoja mujumili ha!”
43004049	Yula mkomi kamuwombela, “Bambu, deku tuyendi ponopa mwana wangu akali hela kusova.”
43004050	Yesu kamuwombela, “Yendi, mwana waku mnofu.” Mundu yula kajumila filongu fya Yesu, pambeli kayenda.
43004051	Paghaveyi mudeha akuwuya kayaki, vatanganili na vandumindumi vaki, vamuwombela, “Mwana waku kanana!”
43004052	Mweni kavadasha chipindi liki mwana waki pananili. Veni vamuyangula, “Yikaveli saa saba pamusi.”
43004053	Pambeli tati ayu kamanya kucha yikaveli pamusi yiyila Yesu pamuwombilili, “Mwana waku akunana.” topi mweni na nyumba yaki yosi vamjumila Yesu.
43004054	Achi ndi chilangushilu cha pili Yesu chalangushili yaveli paghaveyi akuwuya Galilaya kufuma Yudeya.
43005001	Pambeli Yesu kayenda Yelusalemu kulihungu lya Vayawudi.
43005002	Aku Yelusalemu pabehi na mlyangu wukemiwa “Mlyangu wa Fungami” Kwaveli na litanda lya machi livalikema kwa Chibulaniya Betisata na lyeni lyaveli na fibudi fimuhanu.
43005003	Vatami vatangalili vawonjagha mula mufibudi fila vangalimesu na vandevindevi na vapombalili. Vavetilagha machi vatimbushiwi,
43005004	kwanongwa makungu wa Bambu asunukeyi teputepu mulitanda lila na kutimbusha machi. Mtami yava wa kwaa kuyingila mulitanda machi pavatimbushiwa, ananili utami wowosi wavelinawu.
43005005	Pala kwavelili mundu yumu mtami kwa myaka milongu mitatu na minani.
43005006	Yesu pamuwonili mundu ayu kawonja pala, kamanya kucha aveli mtami kwa myaka yitangalili. Kamdasha, “Ukudayila kunana?”
43005007	Yula mtami kamuyangula, “Bambu, nenga ndivahela mundu wa kunyegha mumachi pavatimbushiwa. Kila panyesha kuyingila, mundu wingi akunongulela.”
43005008	Yesu kamuwombela, “Tandamuki, toli litefu lyaku, yendi.”
43005009	Tepu mundu yula kanana, katola litefu lyaki, kakanda kuyenda. Chilongu achi chagolikili Mulijuva lya kupumulila,
43005010	topi vakomi va Vayawudi vamuwombela yula mundu yalowuliwili, “Nalelu Lijuva lya kupumulila. Malawu vetu vakukanisha mundu yoyosi kupapa litefu mulijuva ali.”
43005011	Lakini mweni kavawombela, “Yula mundu yanowulili mweni ndi ang'ombilili, ‘Toli litefu lyaku, yendi.’ ”
43005012	Vamudasha, “Ayu mundu yakuwombilili toli litefu lyaku yendi ghani?”
43005013	Lakini mundu yula amanyili ha kucha yula yamulowulili aveli ghani, kwanongwa kwaveli na vandu vatangalili na Yesu awukili kala.
43005014	Pambeli Yesu kamuwona mundu yula mugati ya nyumba ya Chapanga. Kamuwombela, “Pikanishi, ponopa kunana. Kotoo kugola kandi sambi, ili chikotoo kukufika chilongu chawafu munu.”
43005015	Pambeli mundu yula kayenda, kavawombela vakomi va Vayawudi kucha Yesu ndi yamulowulili.
43005016	Kwanongwa Yesu agolili chindu achi mulijuva lya Kupumulila, Vayawudi vakandili kumuvipila.
43005017	Topi Yesu kavawombela, “Tati wangu akugola chichuku majuva vosi, wuwula wula nenga ngudayiliwa goli chichuku nga Tati wangu.”
43005018	Kwanongwa ya filongu afi, vakomi va Vayawudi vadayilagha kumuwulagha Yesu, kwanongwa ya kuvifya Lijuva lya Kupumulila weka hela ha, ila wuwula wula kwanongwa adetili Chapanga ndi Tati mundu nahawu ayigolili kalingana na Chapanga.
43005019	Yesu kavawombela, “Nakaka nguvawombela, Mwana akuwesha ha kugola chindu weka hela. Akuwesha kugola chila chamuwona Tati mundu pagola weka, kwanongwa chochosi chagola Tati, wuwula wula Mwana wa Chapanga akugola.
43005020	Nongwa Tati akumtama Mwana na kamulangusha findu fyosi fyagola mweni. Kandi damulangushi findu fikomi kupita afi, mwavosi yumwi damwikang'aniki.
43005021	Kucha wula Tati pashukusha vasovili kuvawuyishila unofu, wuwula wula Mwana akuvagayila unofu vala yivavadayila.
43005022	Kandi Tati akumuhigha mundu yoyonda ha, lakini kamupa Mwana chichuku chosi cha kuhigha,
43005023	ili vandu vosi vamjumili Mwana kucha wula wuvamtundamila Tati. Mundu yoyosi yalema kumtundamila Mwana, akumlema Tati yamlayishili.
43005024	“Nakaka nguvawombela, yapikana chilongu cha nenga na kumjumila yula yanayishili, dapati unofu wa jola. Dahighiwi ha, kwanongwa kachama kala njifwa na kayingila muunofu.
43005025	Nakaka nguvawombela, chipindi chikwisa, ponopa chifika kala, vandu vasovili davapikanili lishu lya Mwana wa Chapanga na vala vosi davalipikanishi, davayikali.
43005026	Kucha wula mweni Tati wavelili chikandilu cha unofu, wuwula wula kamugola Mwana waki kuva chikandilu cha unofu.
43005027	Wuwula wula kamupa uwesu wa kuhigha, kwanongwa mweni ndi Mwana wa Mundu.
43005028	Mkotoo kuyikang'anika filongu afi, kwanongwa dachiyisi chipindi, vandu vosi vasovili davapikanili lishu lyaki.
43005029	Na veni davafumi musembi shawu. Vala yivagolili findu fya usangi davashukuki na kuva vanofu na vala vagolili wafu davashukuki na kuhighiwa.
43005030	“Nenga mweni ng'weshi ha kugola chindu chochosi. Nenga nguhigha kucha wang'ombela Chapanga na highilu yangu ya nakaka. Ngugola ha kucha wudayilili nenga, ila kucha wadayilili yula yanayishili.
43005031	“Pandiyijuma nimweni, utovileli wa nenga wuva nakaka ha.
43005032	Lakini kuna wingi yandovilela na nenga manya kucha kila chatovilela chiva nakaka.
43005033	Yumwi mwavalayishili vandu kwa Yohani mbatisha na mweni avawombilili utovileli.
43005034	Nenga ngudayila ha utovileli wa mundu, ila ngudeta filongu afi ili mulowuliwi.
43005035	Yohani aveli kucha luliku luyaka na kulangasha na yumwi Mwasekilili lwengi lwaki kwa chipindi chidokwa.
43005036	Nenga ndina utovileli mkomi pitu wula wutawuliwili na Yohani mbatisha. Kwanongwa chichuku shanyimbili Tati ndisimalili, fichuku figola fikulangusha kucha Tati ndi yanayishili.
43005037	Tati, mweni yanayishili akundovelela. Yumwi mukalihela kupikanisha lishu lyaki wala mukalihela kuwona wushu waki chipindi chochosi.
43005038	Yumwi mukuchivika ha chilongu chaki mugati yenu, kwanongwa yumwi mukumjumila ha yula yalayishiwili na mweni.
43005039	Yumwi mkusoma Mayandiku Vang'alili kwanongwa mukuyihola kucha mugati yaki damupati unofu wa jola. Mayandiku vavava ndi yivandovilela!
43005040	Lakini yumwi mukulema kwisa kwa nenga mupati unofu.
43005041	“Ndadayilagha ha kuyanga ukomi kufuma kwa vandu.
43005042	Lakini manya kucha yumwi mumutama ha Chapanga mundima shenu.
43005043	Nenga nyisa kwa litawa lya Tati wangu, mumbokela ha. Lakini payiva mundu wingi akwisa kwa litawa lyaki mweni, yumwi damumupokeli.
43005044	Mukudayila kuyijuma mwaveni, wala mkusaka ha ukomi wa Chapanga weka hela! Ponopa damuweshi wuliwuli kujumila nenga?
43005045	Mkotoo kuyihola kucha nenga dandivagotoleli kwa Tati. Musa, yumwi yimushuvilileyi ndi davagotoleli.
43005046	Leki nakaka mungamjumilili Musa, mungajumilili wuwowu na nengapa, nongwa Musa ayandikili milandu ya nenga.
43005047	Lakini leki mukujumila ha fila Musa fyayandikili, mukuwesha wuliwuli kujumila fila fideta nenga?”
43006001	Pambeli Yesu kajabuka lihiva lya Galilaya awu lihiva lya Tibeliya.
43006002	Lipinga likomi lya vandu lyamkovikelili kwanongwa vafiwonili filangushilu fyagolagha fya kuvalowola vatami.
43006003	Pambeli Yesu kakwela kuchidunda, kayikala pamu na vandundami vaki.
43006004	Lihungu lya Pasaka ya Vayawudi lyaveli samba lifika.
43006005	Yesu pawonili lipinga likomi lya vandu likumwisila, kamuwombela Filipu, “Koti tukuwesha kuhemela filivi fya kuvagayila vandu vosi ava?”
43006006	Yesu adashili naha ili amuteghi Filipu, kwanongwa mweni amanyili kucha dagoli wuliwuli.
43006007	Filipu kamuyangula, “Dinali mya mbili hela dasikwili ha kuhemela mibumunda ya kukwila kila mundu.”
43006008	Mwanachuli yumu wa Yesu litawa lyaki Andeleya, mlongumundu Simoni Petili kamuwombela Yesu,
43006009	“Apa pana mwana kava na mibumunda muhanu na fisomba fivili. Lakini achi chindu ng'odu kwa vandu vatangalili nahawu!”
43006010	Yesu kavawombela vandundami vaki, “Muvawombeli vandu vayikali pasi.” Pahali pala pavelili na lugobi posi. Topi vandu vosi vayikala pasi. Valulumi weka mulipinga lila vavelili milongu mya muhanu.
43006011	Pambeli Yesu kayitola yila mibumunda, kamulumba Chapanga, kayimetula na kuvagayila vandu vosi vayikalili pala. Katola fisomba, kagola ngimu wuwula wula.
43006012	Vandu pavayikutili kala, Yesu kavawombela vanachuli vaki, “Mukungashi filivi fisighalili chikotoo kuyaghamila chindu chochosi.”
43006013	Topi vandundami vakungasha fisighalili, vamemesha fitandavala lilongu na fivili fya fibumunda fisighalili.
43006014	Vandu pavawonili chilangushilu chagolili Yesu, vawomba, “Nakaka ayu ndi mbuyi yayisa pamlima.”
43006015	Yesu pamanyili kucha vandu vakudayila kumtola ghavi mutwa kwa liwovi, kawuka, kayenda kuchidunda weka yaki.
43006016	Mbungamihi payiyingileyi, vandundami vaki vayenda kulihiva.
43006017	Vayipaka muwatu, vajabuki kumwambu ya lihiva vayendi Kapelinaumu. Lwisa lwayingilili kala, Yesu aveli akalihela kuvayisila.
43006018	Mulihiva kwavelili na majinga kwanongwa liyegha lyaveli likomi.
43006019	Vanachuli vaki pavayendili ngombu kucha muhanu naha, vamuwona Yesu akuyendayenda mumbindi ya machi, akwisa pabehi na watu wula. Vatila munu.
43006020	Yesu kavawombela, “Nengapa! Mkotoo kutila!”
43006021	Pambeli vadayilili kumpaka muwatu wula, teputepu watu wuyipayika payipalu.
43006022	Chilawu yaki, vandu yivasighalili kula kumwambu ya lihiva vamanyili kucha kwavelili watu wumu hela pala. Vamanyili wuwula kucha Yesu kayipaka ha pamu na vandundami vaki, ila vandundami vaki vayendili weka hela.
43006023	Pambeli matu vamonga vafumili Tibeliya vafika pala vandu pavalili mibumunda, Bambu padadavili kala kwa Chapanga.
43006024	Topi vandu pavamanyili kucha Yesu pamu na vandundami vaki vawuka pala, vayipakili mumatu vawu, vayenda Kapelinaumu kumusaka Yesu.
43006025	Vandu pavamuwonili Yesu mwambu wingi wa lihiva, vamudasha, “Muwula, kufika ndili apa?”
43006026	Yesu kavawombela, “Nakaka nguvawombela, mukunzaka kwanongwa mwawonili filangushilu figolili ha, ila kwanongwa mwalili mibumunda mwikuta.
43006027	Mkotoo kuyifwashila filivi yifiwola, ila muyifwashili filivi fya unofu wa jola. Mwana wa Mundu mweni Tati kamjumisha davapi chilivi achi.”
43006028	Veni vamdasha, “Tugoli liki ili tuweshi kugola chila Chapanga chadayila tugoli?”
43006029	Yesu kavayangula, “Achi ndi chindu Chapanga akudayila mugoli, mumujumili yula yamulayishili.”
43006030	Vamudasha, “Dawugoli chilangushilu liki ili tuloli na tukujumili? Dawugoli liki?
43006031	Vavaha vetu valya filivi fikemiwa mana kula kucheja, kucha wuyiyandikiwili Mumayandiku, ‘Avayikutishili mibumunda yifumili kumbindi kwa Chapanga.’ ”
43006032	Yesu kavawombela, “Nakaka nguvawombela, Musa ha yavapili filivi fila fya kumbindi kwa Chapanga. Ila Tati wangu ndi yavapa filivi fya nakaka fya kumbindi kwa Chapanga.
43006033	Kwanongwa filivi fyatugayila Chapanga ndi mundu yula yayisa kufuma kumbindi na kuvagayila unofu vandu vaveli pamlima.”
43006034	Vamuwombela, “Bambu, tugayili filivi afi majuva vosi.”
43006035	Yesu kavawombela, “Nenga ndi filivi fya unofu. Mundu yayisa kwa nenga dapikani njala kandi ha na mundu yajumila nenga dayumilwi hata padokwa.
43006036	Lakini kucha wundivawombilili, mung'ona ingava mukujumila ha.
43006037	Vosi vanyimbili Tati davayisi kwa nenga na nenga dandimvingi ng'odu mundu yoyosi yayisa kwa nenga.
43006038	Kwanongwa nyisa kufuma kumbindi kugola fila fidayila nenga ha, lakini kugola fyadayila yula yanayishili.
43006039	Mweni yanayishili akudayila naha, ngotoo kumuyaghamisha hata yumu wa vala vanyimbili, lakini ndivashukushi vosi mulijuva lya mwishu.
43006040	Kwanongwa chadayila Tati wa nenga achi, kila mundu yamulola Mwana na kumjumila daghavi na unofu wa jola na nenga dandimshukushi mulijuva lya mwishu.”
43006041	Topi Vayawudi vakanda kung'ong'oleka nongwa Yesu adetili, “Nenga ndi filivi fifumili kumbindi kwa Chapanga.”
43006042	Vadeta, “Ayu Yesu mwana wa Yosefu nda? Tuvamanya tati mundu na Mamundu! Ponopa akuwesha wuli wuli kudeta kucha kafuma kumbindi?”
43006043	Yesu kavawombela, “Mukotoo kuying'ong'utekela.
43006044	Kwahela mundu yawesha kwisa kwa nenga ila kwa liwovi lya Tati yanayishili. Na yayisa kwa nenga dandimshukushi mundu ayu lijuva lya mwishu.
43006045	Vambuyi vayandika naha, ‘Vandu vosi davawuliwi na Chapanga.’ Na mundu yoyosi yampikanisha Tati na kukamula mawuli vaki dayisi kwa nenga.
43006046	Kwahela mundu yamuwonili Tati, ila yula yafumili kwa Chapanga, mweni weka hela ndi yamuwonili Tati.
43006047	Nakaka nguvawombela, mundu yajumila nenga kana unofu wa jola.
43006048	Nenga ndi filivi fya Unofu.
43006049	Vavaha venu valili mana kula kucheja lakini vasovili.
43006050	Lakini afi ndi filivi fifumili kumbindi kwa Chapanga, mundu yoyosi yaghalya filivi afi dasovi ha.
43006051	Nenga ndi filivi fya unofu fisunukili kufuma kumbindi kwa Chapanga. Leki mundu yoyosi paghalya filivi afi, dayikali jola. Na filivi afi ndi mvili wa nenga wundiwutawula ili vandu va mlimawu vavi na Unofu.”
43006052	Vayawudi vakandili kulimbana kwa maya veni kwa veni, “Mundu ayu daweshi wuli wuli kutugayila mvili waki tulyi?”
43006053	Yesu kavawombela, “Nakaka nguvawombela, pamulya ng'odu mvili wa Mwana wa Mundu na kulanda mwasi waki, damuupoti Unofu mugati yenu.
43006054	Mundu yoyosi yaghalya mvili wa nenga na kulanda mwasi wa nenga, dapati Unofu wa jola na nenga dandimshukushi mulijuva lya mwishu.
43006055	Kwanongwa mvili wa nenga ndi filivi fya nakaka na mwasi wa nenga ndi chilandi cha nakaka.
43006056	Mundu yoyosi yaghalya mvili wa nenga na kulanda mwasi wa nenga, akwikala mugati ya nenga na nenga nguyikala mugati ya mweni.
43006057	Kucha wula Tati waveli Mnofu wanayishili nenga na nenga ndina Unofu kwanongwa ya Tati. Wuwula wula mundu yaghalya mvili wa nenga daghavi na unofu kwanongwa ya nenga.
43006058	Filivi afi fyasunukili kufuma kumbindi kwa Chapanga kucha fila ha fivalili vambuyi vetu kula kucheja na kusova. Lakini mundu yoyosi yaghalya filivi afi daghavi na unofu wa jola.”
43006059	Yesu adetili afi paghaveyi akuwula munyumba ya kudadavila aku Kapelinaumu.
43006060	Vandu vatangalili yivamkovikelili pavapikanishili naha, vadeta, “Ayi milandu yidindala! Ghani yawesha kuyimanya?”
43006061	Yesu amanyili kucha vandundami vaveli vakung'ong'utekela chilongu achi, ngajila kumuwombela mundu. Topi kavadasha, “Chilongu achi chikuvagola muvi na chipwembwi?
43006062	Ponopa dayivi wuliwuli pamumuwona Mwana wa Mundu akuwuya kumbindi kula kwaghaveyi dahili?
43006063	Mfuki ndi yayegha unofu, liwovi lya mundu likujakwa chindu ha. Filongu findivawombilili ndi filongu fya Mfuki wa Chapanga yayegha Unofu.
43006064	Hata naha, vamu va yumwi vangajila kujumila.” Yesu adetili nawula kwanongwa amanyili tangila ngengi vala vangajila kumjumila na yula yadayila kumshengeta.
43006065	Pambeli Yesu kadeta, “Ndi nongwa ndadetili kucha kwahela mundu yawesha kwisa kwa nenga mbaka Tati amtangi.”
43006066	Kwanongwa ya afi fyadetili, vala yivamkovikeleyi vatangalili vamuleka, vamukovikela kandi ha.
43006067	Topi Yesu kavadasha vala vandundami vaki lilongu na vavili, “Wuli na yumwi mukudayila kuyiyendela?”
43006068	Simoni Petili kamuyangula, “Bambu, datuyendi kwa ghani? Yuwi kuna filongu fya unofu wa jola.
43006069	Ponopa tukujumila na tumanya kucha yuwi kuva Mng'alili yufumili kwa Chapanga.”
43006070	Yesu kavawombela, “Nenga ndi yindivashawulili yumwi lilongu na vavili? Lakini muyenu yumu Lijangavandu!”
43006071	Yesu adetli naha nongwa ya Yudasi, mwana wa Simoni Sikaliyoti, yumu wa vala vandundami lilongu na vavili. Pambeli Yuda ndi daamshengeti Yesu.
43007001	Pambeli Yesu ayendili Galilaya, pafumila Yudeya nongwa Vayawudi vadayilili kumuwulagha.
43007002	Lihungu lya Vayawudi lya fidimililu lyaveli pabehi,
43007003	ponopa valongu vaki vamuwombela, “Uwuki apa yendi Yudeya, ili vandundami vaku vakaloli mihilu yiwugola aku.
43007004	Kwahela mundu yadayila kumanyika na vandu ayifisi. Topi kwanongwa ukugola findu ngimu afi, wuyilangushi kwa vandu vosi vakuwoni.”
43007005	Nongwa hata valongu mundu vamjumila ha.
43007006	Yesu kavawombela, “Chipindi changu chifika ha, lakini chipindi chiva jola.
43007007	Vandu va mlima vaweshi ha kuvanyekwa yumwi, lakini vakunyekwa nenga kwanongwa nguvatovilela findu fya wafu fivagola.
43007008	Yumwi muyendi kulihungu, nenga nguyenda ha kwanongwa chipindi changu chikali hela kufika.”
43007009	Pavawombilili kala naha, kayikala Galilaya.
43007010	Valongu mundu pavayendili kala kula kulihungu, Yesu ayendili kula kulihungu wuwowu, lakini ayendili kwa chifisu ngajila kuyilangusha lipala hela.
43007011	Kula kulihungu Vakomi va Vayawudi vakamsakeyi pavayidasha, “Kava koti yula?”
43007012	Mulipinga lila kwavelili na lupwepu lukomi lwa mweni. Vamu vawomba, “Mweni mundu mnofu.” Vamu vayangula, “Ng'odu, akuvayaghamisha vandu.”
43007013	Lakini kwahela hata mundu yumu yamuwombilili pawelu, kwanongwa vayipwelishili vakomi va Vayawudi.
43007014	Pambeli pagati ya lihungu lila, Yesu kayingila Munyumba ya Chapanga, kakanda kuwula.
43007015	Topi vakomi va Vayawudi vajuluvala kunu pavadeta, “Mundu ayu kapata koti luhunja ngajila kuwuliwa kuchuli?”
43007016	Yesu kavayangula, “Mawuli vawula va nenga ha, ila va yula yanayishili.
43007017	Leki mundu padayila kugola fila fyadayila Chapanga, damanyi mawuli vangu vakufuma kwa Chapanga awu ngudeta kwa uwesu wangu ndimweni.
43007018	Mundu yadeta kwa uwesu waki mweni akusaka ukomi waki mweni. Lakini yula yasaka lujumu lwa yula yamulayishili, ayu ndi muna unakaka na kavahela udesi wowosi.
43007019	Musa avagayilili ng'odu Malawu? Hata naha kwahela hata yumu gati ya yumwi yavakamula Malawu. Ponopa chimudayilila kung'ulaghila chindu liki?”
43007020	Pala vandu vamyangula, “Kuna chinyamkela yuwi! Ghani yadayila kukuwulaya?”
43007021	Yesu kavawombela, “Kuna muhilu wumu wugolili wuvagolili mwikang'aniki vosi yumwi.
43007022	Yumwi mukudumula jandu hata Lijuva lya kupumulila nongwa Musa avalayililili kwingila jandu nakaka dayivi kwa Musa ha, ila kwa vambuyi venu.
43007023	Topi, leki mukuwesha kuvayingisha jandu vandu hata Lijuva lya Kupumulila, ili mukotoo kuvaleka Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa, nongwa liki mukungalalila kwa kumulowola mundu mulijuva lya Kupumulila?
43007024	Mukotoo kuhigha milandu panji hela, ila muhighi kwa unakaka.”
43007025	Vandu vamu va Yelusalemu vawomba, “Ayu mundu yula yivamsaka vamuwulayi nda?
43007026	Mumloli ponopa akudeta pawelu hela, wala vakumuwombela chindu ha! Awu pamongapa vakomi naveni vamanya nakaka kucha ayu ndi Kilistu.
43007027	Lakini tumanya mahali mundu ayu pafuma. Kilistu payisa kwahela mundu damanyi mahali kwafumili.”
43007028	Topi Yesu pawuleyi Munyumba ya Chapanga adetili naha kwa lishu likomi, “Yina yumwi mukuyijuma kucha mumanya na pafumili. Nyisa kwa liwovi lyangu nimweni ha, lakini yanayishili muna unakaka. Yumwi mumumanya ha,
43007029	Lakini nenga ndimumanya kwanongwa ndafumili kwa mweni na mweni ndi yanayishili.”
43007030	Topi vamusakili vamukamuli, lakini kwahela mundu yamukamulili kwanongwa chipindi chaki chafikili ha.
43007031	Vandu vatangalili mulipinga lila vamujumilili mweni, pavadeta, “Kilistu payisa dagoli filangushilu fitangalili munu pitu mundu ayu?”
43007032	Mafwalisayu vapikanila kung'ong'oleka mulipinga lya vandu kwa mundu yula, veni pamu na vatambika vakomi vavalayisha vamachonda vamukamuli Yesu.
43007033	Topi Yesu kacha, “Ngali na yumwi chipindi chidokwa hela, pambeli dang'uyi kwa mweni yanayishili.
43007034	Damunzaki lakini damung'oni ng'o, yumwi damufikili ha pala dandivi.”
43007035	Vayawudi vayidasha veni kwa veni, “Ayu dayendi koti pangajila yufwi kumuwona? Dayendi kwa Vayawudi yivapwililikili Muugiliki na kuvawula Vagiliki?
43007036	Kana mana liki wadetili, Damunzaki lakini damung'oni ha na pala dandivi damuweshi ha kufika?”
43007037	Lijuva lya mwishu lya Lihungu lila lyaveli lijuva likomi lya Lihungu, Yesu kawoloka kudeta, kwa lishu likomi, “Mundu payumilwa, ayisi kwa nenga alandi.
43007038	Mundu yoyosi yajumila nenga, Kucha yivadeta Mayandiku Vang'alili, ‘Nyeni sha machi va Unofu dasimwayiki kufuma mugati ya ndima yaki’ ”
43007039	Yesu padeteyi naha, aveli akudeta chilongu cha Mfuki Mng'alili, yula vandu yivamveta kumuyanga. Mbaka chipindi chila, Mfuki avelili akalihela kwisa, kwanongwa Yesu aveli akalihela kujumiwa.
43007040	Vandu vamonga mula mulipinga pavapikanishili filongu fila, vadeta, “Mundoyu nakaka ndi yula Mbuyi wa Chapanga!”
43007041	Vamu vadeta, “Ayu ndi Kilistu!” Lakini vamu vayidasha, “Yingaweshili wuli wuli Kilistu afumi Galilaya?
43007042	Mayandiku Vang'alili vadeta ng'odu kucha Kilistu dawoneki kufuma mulukolu lwa Mutwa Dawudi na mumbwani ya Betelehemu?”
43007043	Topi vandu vakulekanila mula mulipinga kwanongwa ya Yesu.
43007044	Vandu vamu vadayilagha kumuwopa, lakini kwa hela mundu yayeshili kumkamula.
43007045	Pambeli vala machonda vawuya kwa Vatambika vakomi pamu na Mafwalisayu, veni vavadasha machonda, “Nongwa liki Yesu mumuyegha ng'odu?”
43007046	Vamachonda vayangula, “Kwahela mundu yawesha kulonga kucha ayu yavalonga!”
43007047	Mafwalisayu vavadasha, “Wuli na yumwi wuwowu mujangiwa?”
43007048	“Ghani pagati ya vakomi vetu awu Mafwalisayu yamujumilili?
43007049	Lakini lipinga lyosi ali lya vandu vangajila kumanya Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa, lilapiwa.”
43007050	Nikodemu, yula yamyendileyi Yesu paulongolu, avelili yumu wa Mafwalisayu avelili bahala. Kavawombela,
43007051	“Kulingana na Malawu, tukuwesha ha kumuhigha mundu ngajila kumupikanisha tanila na kumanya fila fyagolili.”
43007052	Veni vamuyangula, “Na yuwi wuwowu kufuma Galilaya? Kaloleshi uswanu mayandiku vang'alili dawuwoni kucha Galilaya kukufuma ha mbuyi.”
43007053	Pambeli kila mundu kawuya kayaki.
43008001	Pambeli vandu vosi vayendili kaya, Yesu ayendili kuchidunda cha miseyituni.
43008002	Chilawu yaki lumbutila kayenda kandi munyumba ya Chapanga. Vandu vosi vamuyendela, mweni kayikala akuvawula.
43008003	Vawula va Malawu pamu na Mafwalisayu vamuyendela mdadala yumu yivamkamulili muuwoni. Vamuwolosha pagati ya veni.
43008004	Pambeli vamudasha Yesu, “Muwula, mdadala ayu tumkamula muuwoni.
43008005	Mumalawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa vatulayilili yufwi vatuwombela mdadala kuchaa ayu atovangiwi na miganga mbaka asovi. Ponopa yuwi ukucha wuli?”
43008006	Vadetili naha kwa kumyesha, vapati chilongu cha kumuhigha. Lakini Yesu agondamili pasi, kayandika pasi na chala chaki.
43008007	Pavayendelili kumudasha, Yesu katandamuka kavawombela, “Mundu yangajila sambi kwa yumwi atoli liganga akandi kumtova.”
43008008	Pambeli kagondama kandi, akuyandika pasi.
43008009	Pavapikanishili nawula, vakanda kuwuka yumu yumu, valongulili vavaha. Yesu kasighala pamu na yula mdadala kawoloka bahala.
43008010	Yesu patandamukili kamudasha yula mdadala, “Vava koti vala vandu? Kwahela yakuhighili kuva muna nongwa?”
43008011	Yula mdadala kamyangula, “Bambu, kwahela hata yumu!” Yesu kadeta, “Hata nenga ngukuhigha ng'odu uyiyendeli, lakini ponopa ukotoo kugola kandi sambi.”
43008012	Yesu paywangili kandi na Vayawudi kavawombela, “Nenga lwengi lwa mlima. Yangovekela nenga dayendi yendi ng'odu mulwisa daghavi na lwengi lwa Unofu.”
43008013	Mafwalisayu vamuwombela, “Yuwi ukuyitovelela umweni, topi, utovileli waku wuva nakaka ha.”
43008014	Yesu kavayangula, “Mani nguyitovilela nimweni utoveleli wa nenga wuva nakaka, wula nenga ngumanya kufumili na kunyenda. Lakini yumwi mumanya ng'odu kufumili awu kunyenda.
43008015	Yumwi mukuhigha milandu ya vandu, nenga ngumuhigha mundu ha.
43008016	Hata pahigha, ngulamula fya maha, kwanongwa nenga ndiva weka hela ha, Tati yanayishili kava pamu na nenga.
43008017	Yiyandikwa Mumalawu venu utovileli wa vandu vavili wa nakaka.
43008018	Nenga nguyitovilela ndimweni na mweni Tati yanyeghili akundovelela.”
43008019	Veni vamudasha, “Tati waku kakoti?” Yesu kayangula, “Yumwi mumanya ng'odu nenga, wala Tati wangu mumumanya ha. Leki mungamanyili nenga, mungamumanyili wuwula na Tati wangu.”
43008020	Yesu kadeta filongu fila muchumba gati cha kuvikila sanduku lya mbiya paghaveyi akuwula Munyumba ya Chapanga. Kwahela mundu yamkamulili nongwa saa yaki yaveli yikali hela kufika.
43008021	Yesu kavawombela kandi, “Nenga nguyenda, damnzaki, damusovi mu sambi shenu kunyenda nenga yumwi damuweshi ng'odu kufika.”
43008022	Vakomi va Vayawudi vayidasha, “Mani dayiwulayi? Kadeta, kwayenda datuweshi ng'odu kufika.”
43008023	Yesu kavayangula, “Yumwi va pasi, nenga wa kumbindi. Yumwi va mlima awu, nenga wa mlima awu ha.
43008024	Ndivawombela damsovi mu sambi shenu. Damusovi mu sambi shenu leki mukujumila ng'odu kucha Nenga ndi Mweni.”
43008025	Veni vamudasha, “Yuwi kuva ghani?” Yesu kavayangula, “Chilongu chichila chila ndivawombilili kufumila dayili!
43008026	Ndiva na fitangalili fya kuvawombela na kuvahigha yumwi. Yula yanayishili kava nakaka na nenga nguwuwombela mlima filongu fimbikanishili kufuma kwa mweni.”
43008027	Veni vamanyili ng'odu ngimu Yesu akuywanga milandu ya Tati mundu.
43008028	Topi Yesu kadeta, “Pamumujuma kala Mwana wa Mundu, damumanyi kucha ‘Nenga ndi Mweni’, Ngugola findu fyosi kwa liwovi lyangu ha, ngudeta fila fyanayili Tati.
43008029	Yula yanayishili kavapamu na nenga, mweni kaneka weka hela ha, kwanongwa majuva vosi ngugola fila fyadayilili mweni.”
43008030	Mweni padeteyi afi vandu vatangalili vamjumilili.
43008031	Yesu kavawombela Vayawudi yivamjumilili, “Ngimu pamukombishela mawuli va nenga nakaka damuvi vandundami va nenga.
43008032	Damuwumanyi unakaka na unakaka dawuvagoli mupekisuki.”
43008033	Veni vamyangula, “Yufwi tuvaleli va Ibulahimu, twakali hela kuva vavanda va mundu yoyosi yula. Kuna mana liki paudeta, ‘Damuvi pekesu’?”
43008034	Yesu kavayangula, “Nakaka nguvawombela, mundu yoyosi yagola sambi kava mvanda wa sambi.
43008035	Mvanda akwikala ha pakaya majuva vosi, Mwana akwikala kaya majuva vosi.
43008036	Mwana pavavavika pekesu, damuvi pekesu nakaka.
43008037	Manya kucha yumwi uleli wa Ibulahimu, yumwi mkuyesha kung'ulaya kwanongwa mulema kupokela mawuli vangu.
43008038	Nenga nguvawombela fila fyanangushili Tati wangu, lakini yumwi mkugola fila fyavawombilili vatati venu.”
43008039	Veni vamuyangula, “Yina tati wetu Ibulahimu!” Yesu kavayangula, “Leki yumwi mungaveli vana va Ibulahimu,” Yesu kayangula, “mungagolili fila fyagolili Ibulahimu.
43008040	Nenga nguvawombela nakaka fimbikanishili kufuma kwa Chapanga, ponopa mukunzaka mung'ulayi nenga. Ibulahimu agolili nga nahau ha!
43008041	Yumwi mkugola chichuku sha tati wenu.” Veni vamuwombela, “Yufwi tuwonekela muuwoni ha, tuva na Tati yumu hela ndi Chapanga. ‘Nakaka twavana vaki’”
43008042	Yesu kavawombela, “Kucha Chapanga angaveli Tati wenu nakaka, mungandamili, kwanongwa fuma kwa Chapanga ponopa ndiva apa. Nenga nyisa ndiyilata ndimweni ha, ila mweni ndi yanayishili.
43008043	Wuliwuli mukufimanya ng'odu afi fideta? Ponopa mukulemwa kupikanisha unjagila wa nenga.
43008044	Yumwi tati wenu Lijangavandu, mkugola milandu yadayilili tati wenu. Kufumila pakwandi mweni avelili akuwulagha vandu. Kana chiganu ng'odu, padeta fya hela akudeta fifuma mumunda yaki mweni, kwa nogwa mweni mudesi na tati wa udesi.
43008045	Nenga nguwomba nakaka, lakini mkujumila ng'odu nenga.
43008046	Ghani wa yumwi kana utovelela kucha nenga ndiva na sambi? Nenga ngudeta nakaka, mbona yumwi mkujumila ng'odu nenga?
43008047	Yula yafumili kwa Chapanga, akupikanisha fya Chapanga, leki pamumpikanisha ng'odu kwanongwa yumwi va Chapanga ha.”
43008048	Vayawudi vamdasha, “Yufwi tukudeta finofu ng'odu patudeta yuwi Msamaliya na yuwi kuva na chinyamkela?”
43008049	Yesu kayangula, “Nenga ndivahela chinyamkela, nenga ngumutundamila Tati wangu na yumwi mukubedala nenga.
43008050	Nenga ngusaka ukomi ha, kwaveli mweni yasaka na kana luhighilu lwa nakaka.
43008051	Nakaka nguvawombela: yakamula mawuli va nenga dasovi ng'odu.”
43008052	Vayawudi ndavawomba, “Ponopa tumanya kucha yuwi kuna chinyamkela! Ibulahimu kasova na vambuyi vasova, ponopa yuwi ukuwomba, mundu pakamula chilongu chaku dasovi ha jola.
43008053	Wuli ukwigola kuva mkomi pitu Tati wetu Ibulahimu yasovili? Na Vambuyi vetu vasova wuwula. Yuwi ukuyigola kwa ghani?”
43008054	Yesu kavayangula, “Ukomi wangu ndimweni, chindu ha. Tati wangu, yumwi mukudeta ndi Tati wenu ndi yajuma nenga, ayu ndi Chapanga.
43008055	Hata yumwi mwamumanyili ha, nenga ndimumanya. Padeta ndimumanya ng'odu, dandivi ngudeta fya hela kucha yumwi, nenga ndimumanya na chilongu chaki nguchikamula.
43008056	Ibulahimu, tati wenu anemelili paliwonili lijuva lya kwisa nenga, mweni kasekelela.”
43008057	Vayawudi vamuwombela, “Yuwi ukali hela kuva na myaka milongu muhanu ya kuyikala, yuwi kumuwona Ibulahimu?”
43008058	Yesu kavawombela, “Nguvawombela nakaka Ibulahimu akali kuwoneka, nenga navelili.”
43008059	Bahala pala vasola migonguveli vamtovi, lakini Yesu kayifisa, pambeli kafuma munyumba ya Chapanga.
43009001	Yesu papiteyi kamuwona mundu yumu, ngalimesu kufumila kuwoneka kwaki.
43009002	Vanachuli vaki vamudasha, “Muwula! Ghani yagolili sambi, Mundu ayu awu vala vamlelili ngalimesu.?”
43009003	Yesu kayangula, “Ayu kagola ng'odu sambi na vala vamlelili vagola sambi ha, nongwa chichuku cha Chapanga chiwoneki kwa mweni.
43009004	Yikudayiliwa tugoli fichuku fya mweni yanyeyili nongwa ponopa pamusi na lumihi lukwisa mundu daweshi ng'odu kugola chichuku.
43009005	Pandiva mumlima awu, nenga lwengi lwa mlima.”
43009006	Pawombili nawula, katema mita pasi, kadaka na uganga kagola mitika, kamushagha mumesu mundu yula ngalimesu.
43009007	Kamuwombela, “Yendi kayipwembuli kuwushu mulitanda lya Siloamu.” Siloamu mana yaki, Vamlayishili. Kayenda kuyipwembula kuwushu, kawuya kunu palola.
43009008	Vandu va pabehi na pala payikalagha na vandu vamumanyili dahili, vayidasha, “Ayu mundu yuyula yayikalagha kunu pavaluva vandu?”
43009009	Vamu vadeta, ayu mweni. Vamu vadeta, “Mweni ha, kayifwana na mweni.” Ponopa mweni kadeta, “Nenga ndi mweni yinuveyi.”
43009010	Veni vamudasha, “Mesu vaku vafuwuka wuliwuli?”
43009011	Mweni kayangula, “Mundu yivamkema Yesu kagola mitika, kanshagha mumesu, kang'ombela nyendi ngayipwembuli kuwushu mulitanda lya Siloamu. Nyenda, ndiyipwembula kuwushu tepu nola.”
43009012	Vamudasha, “Mundu ayu kava koti?” Kavayangula, “Nenga manya ha.”
43009013	Pambeli vamyegha mundu yula yaghaveyi ngalimesu kwa Mafwalisayu.
43009014	Yesu lijuva lila lyagoleyi mitika kumgola mundu yula aloli, lyaveli Lijuva lya kupumulila.
43009015	Mafwalisayu vamudasha kandi, “Kuwesha wuliwuli kulola?” Kavayangula, “Kanshagha mitika kumesu, pambeli ndiyipwembula nola.”
43009016	Mafwalisayu vamu vawomba, “Mundu ayu yagolili naha kafuma kwa Chapanga ha, kwanongwa kakamula ha Malawu va Lijuva lya kupumulila.” Vamonga vadeta, “Akuwesha wuliwuli mundu yavelili na sambi kugola filangushilu kucha afi?” Vamu vatapukili.
43009017	Mafwalisayu vamudasha kandi, “Yuwi ukuwomba yula ghani? Yakugolili uloli.” Mweni kavawombela, “Yula mbuyi.”
43009018	Vakomi va Vayawudi vajumilili ng'odu kucha mundu ayu aveli akulola ha pakwandi, ponopa akulola, mbaka pavavakemili valeli vaki.
43009019	Veni vavadasha, “Ayu mwana wenu mwamulelili ngajila kulola? Ponopa yiva wuli wuli akuwesha kulola?”
43009020	Valeli vaki vayangula, “Tumanya kucha ayu mwana wetu, tumlela ngalimesu.”
43009021	Ponopa tumanya ha kucha kawesha wuliwuli kulola, yamgolili aloli tumumanya ha. Mumudashi, mweni kava kala mkomi, akuwesha kuwomba.
43009022	Valeli vawombili nawula vavatilili vakomi va Vayawudi, veni valonganili mundu yoyosi yamjumilili Kilistu masiya vandu davamuvingi munyumba ya kudadavila.
43009023	Kwa nongwa ayi valeli vadeta, “Mumdashi, mweni kava kala mkomi.”
43009024	Vamkema kandi yula yaghaveyi ngalimesu, vamuwombela, “Umupi ukomi Chapanga leki yuwi dawudeti nakaka! Yufwi tumumanya mundu ayu yakulowulili yuwi kana sambi.”
43009025	Kavayangula, “Mani kana sambi awu ng'odu, nenga manya ha. Chimanyili nenga chindu chimu hela kucha ngaveli ngalimesu ponopa ngulola!”
43009026	Veni vamudasha kandi, “Kagola liki kwa yuwi? Kakufuwula wuliwuli mesu vaku?”
43009027	Kavayangula, “Ndivawombela kala mupikanisha ng'odu, kwanongwa liki mkudayila kupikanisha kandi? Yumwi wuwu mkudayila kuva vandundami vaki?”
43009028	Veni vamkalalila, pavadeta, “Yuwi kwa mwanachuli vaki! Yufwi vandundami va Musa!
43009029	Tumanya kucha Chapanga amuwombilili Musa, lakini mundu yula yufwi tumanya ng'odu kwafumili.”
43009030	Mundu yula kavayangula, “Achi chiloja, yumwi mumanya ng'odu kwafumili, lakini ndi yafuwulili mesu vangu.
43009031	Yufwi tumanya Chapanga akuvapikanisha ha vala vaveli na sambi, akuvapikanisha vang'alili na vala vampikanisha mweni na kugola chavadayilili kugola.
43009032	Kufumila ukandi mlima kwa hela mundu, tupikanishili ngalimesu kufumila kuwoneka, kafuwuka mesu vaki.
43009033	Mundu ayu mani kafuma kwa Chapanga ng'odu, angaweshili ha kugola ngimu wagolili.”
43009034	Veni vayangula naha, “Yuwi kuwonikela na kuleliwa mu sambi, wuliwuli yuwi ukutuwula yufwi?” Vamufumisha panji ya nyumba ya kudadavila.
43009035	Yesu apikanishili kucha vamvinga mundu yula panji. Pavatang'anili na mweni kamdasha, “Yuwi ukumjumila Mwana wa mundu?”
43009036	Mweni kadasha, “Ghani Bambu? Ung'ombeli nguwesha kumujumila!”
43009037	Yesu kadeta, “Kumuwona kala, mweni ayu ponopa ukuywanga nayu.”
43009038	Mundu yula kadeta, “Ngujumila Bambu.” Pambeli kamtundamila.
43009039	Yesu kadeta, “Nyisa mumlima awu kuhigha, ili vangalimesu valoli na vala yivalola vavi ngalimesu.”
43009040	Mafwalisayu vamu vaveli pamu na Yesu, pavapikanishili chadetili, vamudasha, “Nakaka na yufwi ngalimesu?”
43009041	Yesu kavayangula, “Leki mungaveli vangalimesu, mungaveli na sambi ha, lakini ponopa mkudeta na mkulola, sambi muvanashu.”
43010001	Yesu avawombilili, “Nakaka nguvawombela, mundu yoyosi yayingila muligeleli lya fungami ngajila kupitila mumlyangu, lakini akwingilila pengi, ayu mwifi na mpoki.
43010002	Mundu yayingila kwa kupitila pamlyangu ayu nakaka ndi mdimi wa vafungami.
43010003	Mdima mlyangu akumfuwulila mundoyu na vafungami vakupikanisha lishu lyaki. Na mweni akuvakema vafungami vaki kwa matava vawu na kuvafumisha panji.
43010004	Mweni pavafumisha vafungami vosi panji, akutangila, vafungami vakumkovikela, nongwa valimanya lishu lyaki.
43010005	Davamkovikeli ha mundu wingi, ila mhenja davamtuvi nongwa valimanya ha lishu lyaki.”
43010006	Yesu kavawombela chilangushilu achi, lakini veni vamanya ha kucha kana mana liki.
43010007	Pambeli Yesu kavawombela kandi, “Nakaka nguvawombela, nenga ndiva mumlyangu wa vafungami.
43010008	Vala vamonga vosi yivanonguleli nenga ndi vefi na vapoki na vafungami vavapikanisha ng'odu.
43010009	Nenga ndi mlyangu. Mundu yoyosi yayingila kupitila kwa nenga dalowuliwi. Dayingili na kufuma kusaka filivi.
43010010	Mwifi akwisa kwanongwa ya kuhija, kuwulagha na kuyananga. Nenga nyisa mpati unofu, kandi mukotoo kuyangilwa na chindu chochosi mungalilu yenu.
43010011	“Nenga ndi msangi. Mdimi msangi akusova kwanongwa ya vafungami vaki.
43010012	Mundu wa ijala, mdimi ha, vafungami vaki ha, pamuwona chingekembi akwisa, akuvaleka vafungami akutuva, pambeli chingekembi akuvakamula vafungami na vakuyaghamila mudasi.
43010013	Mweni akwipwelesha chindu ha kwanongwa ya vafungami, mweni akuwesha kutuva nongwa mweni mundu wa ijala hela.
43010014	“Nenga mdimi msangi. Nguvamanya vafungami vangu na veni vamanya nenga.
43010015	Kucha Tati wamanyili nenga na nenga ndimumanya Tati. Nenga ngusova kwanongwa ya vafungami vangu.
43010016	Ndiva nawu vafungami vamonga, veni va ligeleli ali ha. Na lasima dandivayeghi wuwula na lishu lyangu davalipikani, pambeli davavi lipinga limu na mdimi yumu.
43010017	“Tati kandama, kwanongwa ayi ngusova pambeli mbati unofu kandi.
43010018	Kwahela mundu yang'ushila, ila nenga nguuwusha padayila nimweni, nenga ndiva na uwesu wa kuuwusha na kuuwuyishila kandi. Malawu ava yimbokilili kufuma kwa Tati wangu.”
43010019	Luyingila kandi lushoshu Vayawudi kwa Vayawudi kwanongwa ya filongu afi.
43010020	Vatangalili vawomba, “Kana chinyamkela, kandi kana lukwali! Wuli mukumpikanisha?”
43010021	Vamu vawomba, “Filongu afi fya mundu munachinyamkela ha, Chinyamkela akuwesha kuvagola vandu vangalimesu mesu, valoli?”
43010022	Kula Yelusalemu kwaveli na lihungu lya kuyihadisha nyumba ya Chapanga Chipindi chila kwaveli na lupepu.
43010023	Yesu aveli akuyendayenda munyumba ya Chapanga, mumdamwa wa Solumoni.
43010024	Topi Vayawudi vamshengeta Yesu, vamudasha, “Dautuleki muchipwembwi mbaka ndili? Tuwombeli kucha yuwi kuva Kilistu?”
43010025	Yesu kavayangula, “Ndivatovilela, lakini mujumila ha. chichuku achi chigola kwa litawa lya Tati wangu ndi chikundovilela nenga.
43010026	Yumwi mukujumila ng'odu kwanongwa muva vafungami vangu ha.
43010027	Vafungami vakupikana lishu lyangu, nenga ndivamanya, vala vangovikela.
43010028	Nenga nguvagayila unofu wa jola, veni davayaghamili ng'odu, kwahela mundu danyaghi muliwoku lyangu.
43010029	Tati wangu yanyimbili ava mkomi kupita vosi, kwahela mundu kandi yawesha kuvanyagha muliwoku lya Tati wa nenga.
43010030	Nenga na Tati, tuva yumu.”
43010031	Vayawudi vasola miganga vamugumi.
43010032	Yesu kavawombela, “Ndivalangusha chichuku sitangalili kufuma kwa Tati. chichuku choti sivavagola yumwi mugumangi miganga?”
43010033	Vayawudi vamuyangula, “Tukukuguma migonguveli kwanongwa ya chichuku chinofu ha, kwanongwa na ukumduka Chapanga! Ukuyigola kuva Chapanga na yuwi kwa mundu hela.”
43010034	Yesu kavayangula, “Yiyandikiwa mumalawu venu, ‘Chapanga akudeta yumwi muva va Chapanga.’
43010035	Chapanga kavakema vachapanga vala vagayiliwi chilongu chaki, yufwi tumanya kucha Mayandiku Vang'alili vakuwomba nakaka jola.
43010036	Mweni Tati yamgolili avi Mng'alili na kamulayisha mumlima, yumwi mukumuwombela, akumduka, nongwa adetili, Nenga ndi mwana wa Chapanga?
43010037	Mani ngugola fichuku fya Tati wangu ng'odu, topi mukotoo kujumila nenga.
43010038	Kumbi pandisigola, hata nenga pamujumila ng'odu, ngiba mufijumili fichuku fila figola nenga na kuwona kucha Tati kamugati ya nenga na nenga ndiva mugati ya mweni.”
43010039	Vakacheyi vamkamula lakini kasulubuka.
43010040	Yesu kayenda kandi kumwambu ya lweni Yoludani, pala Yohani mbatisha pabatisheyi mwanja mtasi, kayikala aku.
43010041	Vandu vatangalili vamyendela vawomba, “Yohani mbatisha kagola mihilu yoyonda ha, kumbi fyosi fyadetili Yohani mbatisha filongu fyaki mundu ayu fyaveli nakaka.”
43010042	Vatangalili vamjumilili Yesu.
43011001	Mundu yumu yivamkema Lasalu, mweni kaya wa Betaniya, alwalili. Betaniya yaveli mlima wayikalagha Maliya pamu na Malita, vahaja mundu Lasalu
43011002	Ayu Maliya ndi mweni yamshaghili Bambu mafuta va kunungilila mumawulu na kuvapukuta na fwili shaki. Mhaja mundu Lasalu ndi yaveli akulwala.
43011003	Topi vala vahaja mundu valayisha lulayilayi kwa Yesu, vadeta, “Bambu, yula ghanja waku yumtamili kalwala!”
43011004	Yesu papikanishili, kadeta, “Lasalu asovi kwa utami awu ha, lakini afi figoleka ili ukomi wa Chapanga wuwoneki kwa utami awu na mwana wa Chapanga na mweni ajumiwi.”
43011005	Yesu avatamili Malita na mhaja mundu na Lasalu.
43011006	Hata naha, papikanishili kucha Lasalu katakwa ayikalili majuva mavili kukula kula ngajila kuyenda kumlola.
43011007	Pambeli kavawombela vandundami vaki, “Tuyendi kandi Uyawudi!”
43011008	Vala vandundami vamuwombela, “Muwula! Mwandi mwandi hela Vayawudi vakakusakeyi vakugumi na miganga kukula kula, yuwi ukudayila kuyenda kandi kuku?”
43011009	Yesu kayangula, “Saa sha pamusi lilongu na mavili, duhu? Mundu payendayenda pamusi ayikwali ng'odu, nongwa akulola lwengi lwa mulima.
43011010	Mundu payendayenda pamihi dayikwali, nongwa kavahela lwengi.”
43011011	Yesu pamalilili kudeta naha, kavawombela, “Ghanja wetu, Lasalu kawonja, lakini nguyenda ngamyimushi.”
43011012	Vanachuli vaki vamuwombela, “Bambu leki pawonja, akunana.”
43011013	Veni vamanya kucha Yesu kawomba milandu ya kuwonja ng'onju, kumbi kawomba milandu ya njifwa ya Lasalu.
43011014	Yesu kavawombela ngatu hela, “Lasalu kasova,
43011015	lakini nenga ngusekilela kwanongwa ya yumwi kucha ngaveli aku ha, ili muweshi kujumila. Ponopa tuyendi kwa Lasalu.”
43011016	Tomasi yivamkema mambila kavawombela vandundami vamonga, “Tuyendi na yufwi tukasovi pamu na mweni!”
43011017	Yesu pafikili awonili Lasalu vamvikili kala musembi, majuva mchechi vapitili.
43011018	Chijiji cha Betaniya chaveli pabehi na Yelusalemu, utali kucha kilomita ndatu.
43011019	Vayawudi vatangalili vafikili kwa Malita na Maliya kuvakola mawoku kwa chivembu cha mhaja wawu.
43011020	Malita papikanishili kucha Yesu akwisa, ayendili kumyanga, Maliya asighalili munyumba.

43011022	Lakini ponopa manya kucha fyofyosi fiwudayila kumluva Chapanga dakugayili.”
43011023	Yesu kamuwombela, “Mhaja waku dashukuki.”
43011024	Malita kamyangula, “Manya kucha dashukuki mulijuva lya kushukushiwa.”
43011025	Yesu kamuwombela, “Nenga ndi awu ushukushu na unofu. Yajumila nenga, hata pasova, dayikali kandi.
43011026	Na yula yayikala na pajumila nenga, dasovi ha jola, wuli! ukufijumila afi?”
43011027	Malita kamuwombela, “Yina, Bambu! Nenga, ngujumila kucha yuwi ndi Kilistu, mwana wa Chapanga, yula dayisi mumlima.”

43011029	Mweni papikanishili, kalopu kamukovekela Yesu.
43011030	Yesu aveli akali hela kuyingila muchijiji, aveli akali hela pahala pala pamuyangilili Malita.
43011031	Vala Vayawudi yivaveli pamu na Maliya kayaki, vayisili pala pachivembu pavamuwonili akutandamuka kalopu na kufuma panji vamkovekelili. Vakacheyi akuyenda kusembi akalili.
43011032	Maliya pafikili pala pavelili Yesu, pamuwonili kamuwila mumawulu, kamuwombela, “Bambu, kucha ungaveli baha mhaja wangu angafwili ha!”
43011033	Yesu pamuwonili Maliya akulila na vala Vayawudi vayilongushili pamu vakulila, limkola lihingili mundima.
43011034	Pambeli kavadasha, “Mumuvika koti?” Vamuyangula, “Bambu, wisi loli.”
43011035	Yesu kalila na misosi pwaa.

43011037	Vamu vawomba, “Nakaka! Ayu yamgolili yula ngalimesu aloli, aweshi ng'odu kumgola Lasalu akotoo kusova?”
43011038	Yesu yaveli na lusungu mundima yaki, kayenda kusembi. Sembi yeni yaveli mumbaku, yigubikiwa na ligonguveli.
43011039	Yesu kadeta, “Muliwushi ligonguveli ali!” Malita mhaja mundu na yula yasovili kamuwombela, “Bambu, ponopa akununga, kwanongwa kana majuva mchechi tangila asovi.”
43011040	Yesu kamuwombela, “Nenga ngakuwombilili du kucha pamuwujumila damuwuwoni ukomi wa Chapanga?”
43011041	Pambeli valiwusha lila ligonguveli. Yesu kalola kumbindi, kawomba, “Ngukuhongesha yuwi Tati nongwa ukumbikanisha.
43011042	Ngumanya kucha ukumbikana myanja yosi, ng'omba naha kwanongwa ya vandu ava vaveli apa, vaweshi kujumila kucha yuwi ndi yiwunayishili.”
43011043	Pawombili naha, kakema kwa lishu likomi, “Lasalu! Fumi panji!”
43011044	Yula yaveli kasova kafuma panji, kunu aveli kana ligubiku mumawulu na mumawoku na kuwushu kawopiwa chitambala. Yesu kavawombela, “Mumuwopoli, mumleki ayiyendeli.”

43011048	Patumleka hela vandu vosi davamjumili na veni Valoma davayisi kuyananga Nyumba Ngomi ya Chapanga wetu na mlima wetu!”

43012001	Majuva sita lihungu lya Pasaka likali, Yesu kayenda Betaniya kwayikaleyi Lasalu, mweni Yesu amshukushili kufuma munjifwa.

43012020	Kwaveli Vagiliki vamu wa vala vafikili Yelusalemu kumluva Chapanga mulijuva lila.

43012023	Yesu kavawombela, “Saa ya kujumiwa Mwana wa Mundu yifika kala!
43012024	Nakaka nguvawombela, ngokwa ya mupunga yikusighala ngokwa hela hata payiponeka pasi pauganga pambeli yikusova. Mani payisova, yikulela fivelekwa fitangalili.
43012025	Vala yivautama unofu wawu davawuyaghamishi na vala yivatila ngalilu yau mumlima awu davayangi unofu wa jola.
43012026	Yadayila kungimbanikila, angovekeli ili pala pandiva nenga na vandumindumi vangu vavi. Tati wangu damtundamili mundu ayu.”

43012028	Tati, lijumi litawa lyaku.” Topi, lishu kufuma kumbindi kwa Chapanga lideta, “Nilijuma kala na danilijumi kandi.”
43012029	Lipinga lya vandu liwolukili pala lipikanila lishu lila, vamu vawomba, “Kudilima.” Vamu vawomba, “Makungu kaywanga na mweni!”

43012031	Hinapawu chipindi cha mlima awu kuhighiwa, mnakulongosha mlima awu dawushiwi.
43012032	Na nenga pabikuliwa kumbindi kwa Chapanga mumlima, dandivakweyi vandu vosi kwa nenga.”
43012033	Adetili nawula kulangusha kucha dasovi kwa njifwa liki.
43012034	Topi, lipinga lila limuyangula, “Yufwi tupikanila kufuma mumalawu vetu kucha Kilistu dayikali jola. Dauweshi wuli kuwomba nakaka Mwana wa mundu akudayila kunyasuliwa? Na mwana wa mundoyu ghani?”
43012035	Yesu kavawombela, “Lwengi luva pamu na yumwi kwa chipindi chitali ha. Muyendi yendi kukali na ngesha, ili lwisa lukotoo kuvagubika, kwanongwa yayendayenda mulwisa kamanya ng'odu kwayenda.
43012036	Pamuveyi na ngesha mujumili ili muva kala vana va lwengi.” Pamalilili kudeta filongu fila, Yesu kawuka kayifisa kutali na lipinga lila.
43012037	Yesu agolili mihilu yosi pavalola, lakini veni vamjumilili ha,
43012038	ili filongu fya detili mbuyi wa Chapanga Isaya ndafiwoneka, “Bambu, ghani yajumilili chilongu chetu? Uwesu wa Bambu uwoneka kwa ghani?”
43012039	Vawesha ha kujumila, kwanongwa Isaya kawomba kandi,
43012040	“Chapanga kawomba, dandivapofoli mesu vawu, kavapugha luhala lwawu vakotoo kulola kwa mesu vawu, na mahala vawu vakotoo kumanya vakotoo kung'alambukila nenga, kawomba Bambu, ng'weshi kuvagola vanani.”
43012041	Isaya ndakawomba filongu afi nongwa kaulola ukomi wa Yesu, kawomba milandu yaki.
43012042	Hata naha, vakomi va Vayawudi vatangalili ndavamjumila Yesu, lakini kwanongwa ya Mafwalisayu, vamuyitikila ng'odu pawelu pavatila davalekani na nyumba ya kudadavila ya Vayawudi.
43012043	Vadayila ukomi wa vandu pitu kujumiwa na Chapanga.
43012044	Pambeli Yesu kawomba kwa lishu likomi, “Mundu yajumila nenga, akujumila nenga hela ha, akumjumila na yula yanayishili.
43012045	Yanola nenga akumlola yula yanayishili wuwula.
43012046	Nenga nyisa pamlima kucha lwengi, ili yoyosi yajumili nenga akotoo kuyikala mulwisa.
43012047	Yangajila kupikana filongu fya nenga, nenga ngumuhigha ha, nongwa nyisa pamlima kuhigha ha, nyisa kuulowola.
43012048	Yivanema nenga na kukamula ng'odu filongu fyangu vana yumu wakuvahigha. Filongu fila fyang'ombilili dafivi muhigha lijuva lya mwishu.
43012049	Ayi nakaka, kwanongwa nenga ng'omba kwa uwesu wa nimweni baha ng'odu, Tati yanayishili ndi mweni yanayishili ng'ombi liki na nywangi liki.
43012050	Nenga manya kucha lilawu lyaki likuyegha unofu wa jola. Nenga nguwomba fila Tati fyanayishili ng'ombi.”
43013001	Yaveli lijuva limu lya Lihungu likali hela kufika. Yesu kamanya kucha saa yaki ya kuwuka pamlima kuyenda kwa Tati yafikili. Avatamili vandu yivaveli vaki va pamlima majuva vosi, avatamili munu!
43013002	Yesu pamu na vandundami vaki vayikalili pamu vakulya filivi fya pamihi. Lijangavandu avikili kala mundima ya Yudasi mwana wa Simoni Sikaliyoti, hoshu ya kumushengeta Yesu.
43013003	Yesu amanyili kucha Tati kamgayila findu fyosi mumawoku vaki na mweni kafuma kwa Chapanga na akuwuya kwa Chapanga.
43013004	Yesu kayisegha pafilivi, kakusa yingwa yaki, kayiwopa lukwindu muchiwunu.
43013005	Pambeli kataya machi mungwangu, kakanda kuvawofuva mawulu vandundami vaki kunu pavapukuta na yingwa yafwalili muchiwunu.
43013006	Kayenda paveli Simoni Petili, mweni kawomba, “Bambu yuwi ukung'ofua nenga mawulu?”
43013007	Yesu kayangula, “Chila chigola ponopa kuchimanya ha, lakini daumanyi pambeli”
43013008	Petili kamuwombela, “Dauweshi kung'ofuwa nenga mawulu vangu hata kamu!” Yesu kamyangula, “Panguwofuva ng'odu dauvi Lighanja na nenga ha.”
43013009	Simoni Petili kamyangula Bambu, “Ng'ofuwi, mawulu hela ha pamu na mawoku vangu na mutwi.”
43013010	Yesu kamuwombela, “Yayovili, kang'ala kala, akudayila kuyova kandi ha ila kunava mawulu hela. Yumwi mung'ala kala ila yumu hela.”
43013011	Yesu amumanyili kala yula daamushengeti, ndi nongwa awombili naha, “Mwavosi yumwi mung'ala kala, ila yumu hela.”
43013012	Pavawofuwili kala mawulu, kakusumbula yingwa yaki, kayikala pamesa, kavawombela, “Mufimanya fyendivagolili?
43013013	Yumwi mukungema nenga Muwula na Bambu, yumwi mukuwomba nyanyi nongwa nenga mweni.
43013014	Nenga muwula na Bambu wenu ndivawofua yumwi mawulu na yumwi mukudayila muyiwofuvi mwaveni mawulu.
43013015	Ndiva gayila chilangushilu, yumwi mugoli kucha wugolili nenga.
43013016	Nakaka nguvawombela, vavanda vavi vakomi ha kwa vabambu vawu na vanjagila vavi vakomi ha kwa yula yavalayishili.
43013017	Mani muvamanya ava damuvi na ngiba pamugola.
43013018	Afi fing'omba fya mwavosi yumwi ha, nenga ndiva manya vala ndivashawulili. Lakini Mayandiku yivayandikiwili yivawomba, ‘Yula yalili filivi pamu na nenga danshengeti.’
43013019	Nenga ndivawombela filongu afi, fikali kufumbuka ponopa, fifumbuka muweshi kujumila kucha nenga ndi mweni.
43013020	Nakaka nguvawombela, yamupokela yula yindimulayishili akumbokela nenga na yula yambokela nenga akumpokela yula yanayishili.”
43013021	Yesu pawombili filongu fila, ndima yimutama nendu kadeta, “Nakaka nguvawombela muyenu yumu dashengeti!”
43013022	Vandundami vayilola veni kwa veni, vamanya ha akumuwomba ghani.
43013023	Paveli na ndundami yumu Yesu yamtamili aveli kayikala pambali yaki.
43013024	Simoni Petili akamukupisheyi kwa mawoku pawomba, “Mudashi akumudeta ghani?”
43013025	Ndundami yula kaselela pabehi na Yesu kamudasha, “Bambu ghani ayu?”
43013026	Yesu kayangula, “Yula yindimupa chipandi cha libumunda chinikishilili ndi mweni. Pambeli katola chipandi cha libumunda kalikishila, kamupa Yudasi mwana wa Simoni Sikaliyoti.”
43013027	Yuda patolili libumunda lila, tepu, Lijangavandu limwingila. Yesu kamuwombela, “Chiwudayila kugola goli kalopu.”
43013028	Kwa hela mundu yayikalili pamesa yamanyili kucha wuli kamuwombela wula.
43013029	Yudasi aveli mkola mbiya, vamu vamanyili kucha Yesu akumuwombela mweni akahemeli findu fya lihungu awu kuvagayila vagaju findu.
43013030	Tepu hela Yuda payangili hela libumunda lila, kafuma panji. Ndayiva pamihi.
43013031	Yuda pawukili kala, Yesu kawomba, “Topi ukomi wa Mwana wa Mundu wukuwoneka, ponopa ukomi wa Chapanga akuwoneka kupitila mweni.
43013032	Kucha ukomi wa Chapanga ukuwoneka kupitila mweni, topi mweni Chapanga dagoli ukomi wa Mwana wa Mundu wuwoneki, tepu dagoli afi.
43013033	Vana vangu dandivi na yumwi padokwa, damunzaki, kucha ndivawombilili Vayawudi, nguvawombela ponopa, ‘Kunyenda, damufiki ha.’
43013034	Lilawu lya shonu nguvagayila, muyitami yumwi kwa yumwi, kucha ndivadayilili nenga, ponopa muyitami yumwi kwa yumwi.
43013035	Naha vandu vosi davamanyi kucha yumwi muva vandundami va nenga, mani mkuyitama yumwi kwa yumwi.”
43013036	Simoni Petili kamudasha, “Bambu, ukuyenda koti?” Yesu kamuyangula, “Kunyenda nenga dauweshi kungovekela ha. Dawungovikeli pambeli.”
43013037	Petili kadasha, “Bambu, wuli nenga dangweshi ng'odu kukukovikela ponopa? Nenga danyasi unofu wangu kwanongwa ya yuwi.”
43013038	Pambeli Yesu kamyangula, “Nakaka yuwi daumalili unofu waku kwanongwa ya nenga? Nakaka nguvawombela kandi njowolu akali kuvika yuwi daunemi nenga myanja mitatu!”
43014001	“Mkotoo kuyipwelesha kunda yenu, leki mukumjumila Chapanga, mujumili na nenga.
43014002	Munyumba ya Tati wangu muna fyumbagati fitangalili, kungaveli hela fwasi ya kuyikala ningavawombilili ha, nguyenda ngavatandili pa kuyikala.
43014003	Topi pandivatandila kala pakwikala, danyisi kandi kuvatola ili pandiva nenga na yumwi muvi baha.
43014004	Yumwi mwiyimanya deha yinyendela aku kunyenda.”
43014005	Tomasi kamudasha, “Bambu, yufwi tumanya ha kuwuyenda, ponopa datwimanyi wuli wuli deha?”
43014006	Yesu kayangula, “Nenga ndi nakaka na deha na unofu, kwa hela mundu yayenda kwa Tati ngajila kupitila kwa nenga.
43014007	Nongwa mungamanyili nenga, mungamumanyili na Tati wangu. Kukandila ponopa mumumanya na mumuwona kala.”
43014008	Filipu kamuwombela, “Bambu, yufwi tukudayila utulangushi Tati hela.”
43014009	Yesu kamuyangula, “Filipu, mumanya ng'odu nenga? Ndiyikala na yumwi majuva vatangalili. Yang'onili nenga kamuwona na Tati. Topi, nongwa liki mukudeta, ‘ndivalangushi Tati?’
43014010	Yuwi ukujumila ng'odu kucha nenga ndiva mugati ya Tati na Tati kava mugati ya nenga?” Yesu kavawombela, ngudeta kwa liwovi lyangu ha, ila Tati yayikala mugati ya nenga ndi ya gola chichuku chaki.
43014011	Mujumili nenga padeta kucha ndiva mugati ya Tati na Tati kava mugati ya nenga. Leki mukujumila ng'odu nenga, mujumili kwanongwa ya fila figola.
43014012	Nakaka nguvawombela, yula ya jumila nenga, dagoli fichuku fila figola, dagoli findu fikomi kupita afi, kwanongwa nenga nguwuka nguyenda kwa Tati.
43014013	Nenga dagoli chochosi chimudayila kuluva kwa litawa lyangu, ili Tati ajumiwi kwa njila ya mwana.
43014014	Leki pamuluva chindu chochosi kwa kutambula litawa lyangu, nenga dagoli.
43014015	“Leki mundama nenga, damukamuli Malawu vangu.
43014016	Na nenga dandimuluvi Tati, mweni avapi Mtangi wingi ayikali na yumwi jola.
43014017	Mweni ndi Mfuki wulangusha unakaka wa Chapanga, vandu va mlima awu davaweshi ha kumujumila kwanongwa vamuwona ha na vamumanya ha. Lakini yumwi mumumanya, kwanongwa kava na yumwi na akwikala mugati ya yumwi.
43014018	“Danivaleki ng'odu kucha Valekwa, dandivawuyili kandi.
43014019	Chisighala chipindi chidokwa vandu va mlima awu davang'oni kandi ha. Lakini yumwi damung'oni, kwanongwa nenga munofu na yumwi damuvi vanofu wuwula wula.
43014020	Lijuva palifika damumanyi kucha nenga ndiva mugati ya Tati wangu na yumwi muva mugati ya nenga na nenga ndiva mugati ya yumwi.
43014021	“Vandu vakamula Malawu va nenga na kuvajumila, ava vakundama. Na Tati wangu davatami vala yivandama nenga na nenga dandivatami wuwula wula na nenga dandiyilangushi kwa veni.”
43014022	Yuda wingi Sikaliyoti ha, kamudasha, “Bambu, wuli wuli dawiyilangusha umweni kwa yufwi, ngajila kuyilangusha kwa vandu va mlima awu?”
43014023	Yesu kamuyangula, “Yandama nenga dakamuli mawuli vangu. Tati wangu damutami, Tati pamu na nenga datuyingili mugati yaki na kuyikala.
43014024	Yandama ng'odu, akukamula ha filongu fyangu na filongu fimupikana padeta fikufuma kwa nenga ha, filongu fya Tati wangu yanayishili.
43014025	“Afi ndi finivawombeleyi pandiyikaleyi na yumwi.
43014026	Lakini Mtangi, ndi Mfuki Mng'alili, Tati damulayishi kwa litawa lyangu, davawuli findu fyosi, kuvakumbushila fyosi findivawombilili.
43014027	“Nguvalekela kusika, nguvapa kusika kwa nenga. Kusika kundivavapa nenga kuva ng'odu kucha ngimu mlima wuvavapa yumwi. Mkotoo kuyipwelesha wala mukotoo kutila.
43014028	Mumbikanisha pandivawombilili kucha, ‘Nguyenda pambeli nguwuya kandi.’ Leki mungandamili mungasekilili kucha nguyenda kwa Tati, nongwa Tati mkomi pitu nenga.
43014029	Ndivawombela filongu afi ngengi, ili pafibwituka mujumili.
43014030	Danywangi na yumwi filongu fitangalili ha, kwanongwa mtavala wa mlima awu akwisa, mweni kwa nenga kana liwovi ha,
43014031	lakini ili mlima umanyi kucha ngumutama Tati na ngugola findu fyosi kucha mweni wanayishili. “Muwoloki, tuwuki apa.
43015001	“Nenga ndi msabibu nakaka, Tati wangu mulimi.
43015002	Mweni akudumula litafi lingajila kulela fivelekwa na kuliyasa na akulihengelela lila litafi lilela ili lileli fivelekwa fitangalili.
43015003	Yumwi muva nyanyi kala kwanongwa mukamula chilongu chila chindivawombilili.
43015004	Muyikali mugati ya nenga na nenga dandiyikali mugati ya yumwi. Litafi weka hela lileli ha fivelekwa mbaka livi mulibiki lyaki lya musabibu. Wuwula wula yumwi muleli ha fivelekwa ila pamuva mugati ya nenga.
43015005	“Nenga ndiva lihadiki lya lisabibu na yumwi muva mitafyi, yiyikala mugati ya nenga na nenga nguyikala mugati yaki na akulela fivelekwa fitangalili, kwanongwa pangajila nenga mukuwesha ha kugola chindu.
43015006	Mumuleki mundu yayikala ng'odu mugati ya nenga, ayu akuva kucha litafi liyasiwili na kuyuma, mitafi yiyumili yikungiwa na kuyasiwa mumotu, dayilunguli nigu!
43015007	Leki mkuyikala mugati ya nenga na filongu fyangu dafiyikali mugati ya yumwi, damuluvi chochosi chimudayila damugayiliwi.
43015008	Leki pamulela fivelekwa fitangalili, Tati wangu dajumiwi nakaka damuvi vandundami vangu.
43015009	Kucha wula Tati pandamili nenga, wuwula wula nenga ndivatama yumwi, muyikali muwutami wa nenga.
43015010	Pamuvakamula Malawu vangu, yumwi damuyikali muwutami wangu, kucha nenga wundivakamulili Malawu va Tati wangu na nguyikala muwutami waki.
43015011	“Ndavawombilili naha ili sekelelu yangu yivi mugati yenu na sekuseku yenu yimemi.
43015012	Lilawu lyangu ndi ali: muyitami yumwi kwa yumwi kucha nenga wundivatama yumwi
43015013	Kwahela mundu yaveli na utami kucha awu, wa kuuleka unofu waki kwanongwa ya vaghanja vaki.
43015014	Yumwi muva vaghanja vangu mani mkugola fila fyindivalayishili.
43015015	Dandivakemi ng'odu vandumindumi kandi, kwanongwa vandumindumi vamanya ng'odu fyagola bambu wawu. Lakini yumwi ndivakema vaghanja, kwanongwa fyosi findifipikanilili kwa Tati ndivawombela.
43015016	Yumwi munshawula nenga ng'odu, nenga ndivashawula yumwi na ndivalayisha yumwi, muyendi mukaleli nendu fivelekwa fya kuyikala. Na Tati davavapi chindu chochosi chimumuluva mulitawa lyangu.
43015017	Nguvawombela naha yumwi, muyitami yumwi kwa yumwi.
43015018	“Leki vandu va mlima pavavakalalila yumwi, muyiholi kucha vangalalili nenga tanila.
43015019	Leki mungaveli vandu va mlima awu, vangavatamili yumwi kucha veni. Lakini yumwi wa mlima awu ng'odu, nongwa nenga ndivashawula kufuma mumlima awu, kwanongwa ayi vandu va mlima awu vakuvakalalila yumwi.
43015020	Muyiholi wundivawombilili kucha kwahela vavanda yivaveli vakomi kwa Bambu wawu. Leki vandeshili nenga, davavateshi na yumwi wuwula wula. Leki vavakamulili mawuli va nenga, davakamuli na va yumwi wuwula wula.
43015021	Lakini davavagoleli fyosi kwanongwa yumwi muva va nenga, veni vamanya ng'odu mweni yanyeghili.
43015022	Leki ngayisili na kuwomba na veni ng'odu, vangaveli na sambi ng'odu, ponopa vavahela cha kuyitasha sambi shawu.
43015023	Yula yangalalila nenga akumkalalila Tati wangu wuwula wula.
43015024	Mani ngagolili ng'odu fichuku fila kwahela mundu angagolili na vangaveli na sambi ha. Ponopa vayiwona mihilu yigolili, lakini vangalalila nenga na Tati wangu.
43015025	Lakini fyosi afi fidayiliwa kugoleka ili Malawu vavi nakaka, ‘Vangalalila nenga ngajila nongwa.’
43015026	“Leki payisa ayu Mtangi, yindivayeghela kufuma kwa Tati, ayu Yang'alili nakaka kufuma kwa Tati, mweni dandovileli nenga.
43015027	Na yumwi wuwula wula damundovileli nenga, kwanongwa tuva pamu kufumila pakwandi.”
43016001	“Ndivawombela naha ili mukotoki kuleka ujumilu wenu.
43016002	Davavavingi munyumba shawu sha Chapanga, chipindi chikwisa chila kila mundu yavawulaya daamanyi akumuwushila Chapanga litambiku.
43016003	Vandu davagoli naha nongwa vamumanya ng'odu Tati na nenga.
43016004	Ndivawombela filongu afi, ili chipindi pachifika muvi na ngumbungumbu kucha ndivawombilili kala.
43016005	“Ponopa nguyenda kwa mweni yanayishili, lakini kwahela mundu yadasha nguyenda koti.
43016006	Ndivawombela naha, mundima shenu mumema ligafugafu.
43016007	Lakini ndivawombela nakaka, finofu kwa yumwi nenga kuwuka, kwanongwa nenga pang'uka ng'odu, dayisi ha Mtangi, ila pang'uka, dandimulayishi kwa yumwi.
43016008	Mweni payisa, davamanyishi vandu va pamlima milandu kucha vatoshangila milandu ya sambi na ugoleki na fiyilatili highilu ya Chapanga.
43016009	Vatoshangila milandu ya sambi, kwanongwa vajumila ng'odu nenga,
43016010	Kwilata ugoleki kwanongwa nenga nguyenda kwa Tati, damung'oni kandi ha,
43016011	vatoshangila mumilandu ya kuhigha, nongwa Lijangavandu mkomi wa mlima awu kahighiwa kala.
43016012	“Ngali na filongu fitangalili fya kuvawombela, lakini dafivi vitangalili munu kwa yumwi kufikamula fyosi.
43016013	Topi payisa Mfuki mweni, ayu ndi yalangusha unakaka wa Chapanga, davalongoshi muunakaka wosi, mweni davawombeli kwa uwesu waki mweni lakini davawombeli fyapikanila na fila dafiyisi kuwulongolu.
43016014	Mweni dajumi nenga, nongwa datoli fyang'ombilili avawombeli yumwi.
43016015	Fyosi fya Tati wangu fya nenga, ndi nongwa ndawombili Mfuki Mng'alili datoli fila fyindimugayilili avawombeli yumwi.
43016016	“Yikali chipindi chidokwa hela damung'oni ha, pambeli padokwa damung'oni.”
43016017	Vandundami vaki vamu vayikanganikili, “Afi fya detili fina mana liki? Kutuwombela chisighala chipindi chidokwa datumuwoni ha na kudeta, ‘Samba kawuka, samba kawuya na akuyenda kwa Tati.’
43016018	Vasiyala vakwidasha, ‘Chilongu liki achi chawomba?’ Tumanya ha chawomba.”
43016019	Yesu kamanya kucha vadayila kumdasha, topi kavawombela, “Chimwidasha liki kucha ng'omba, samba ndivaleka damung'oni ha pambeli samba mung'ona.
43016020	Nakaka nguvawombela, yumwi damulili kunu pamu yidedeka, topi, mlima dausekeleli, yumwi damukalali, kukalala kwa yumwi dakughalambuki cheleli buja.
43016021	Mdala palela, kana lihingili nongwa saa yaki yifika ya kulela, leki palela mwana, akwivasuwa lila lihingili lya kulela kwanongwa ya cheleli.
43016022	Na yumwi wuwula, muna lung'ong'u, lakini nenga dandang'aniki na yumwi kandi, yumwi damumemi cheleli buja mumunda shyenu, kwahela yawesha kuvawushila seku shyenu.
43016023	Mulijuva lila damungonyi chindu ng'odu. Nakaka nguvawombela, Tati wa nenga davagayili chila chimumluva kwa litawa lyangu.
43016024	Mbaka ponopa munuva ng'odu chindu chochosi mulitawa lyangu. Muluvi, damupati, kusekelela kwa yumwi kuvi jola.
43016025	“Ng'omba kwa ng'ombelu ya kuyifwana na yumwi, kuvawombela milandu ayi. Saa yikwisa nenga danywangi kwa kuyifwana ha, dang'ombi lipala hela milandu ya Tati.
43016026	Mulijuva lila damuluvi kwa kupitila litawa lyangu, ngudeta ha kucha nenga dandivaluvili kwa Tati,
43016027	Tati mweni kavatama yumwi. Kavatama yumwi kwanongwa mundama nenga na mujumila kucha nenga fuma kwa Chapanga.
43016028	Fuma kwa Tati, nyisa mumlima, ponopa nguwuleka mlima nguwuya kwa Tati wangu.”
43016029	Pambeli vandundami vaki vamuwombela, “Ponopa ukuwomba lipala, ukudeta lipala ngajila chifisu mung'ombelu.
43016030	Tumanya kucha yuwi kumanya milandu yosi kwahela mundu wa kukudasha naha tujumila kucha yuwi kufuma kwa chapanga.”
43016031	Yesu kavayangula, “Ponopa mukujumila?
43016032	Dachisi chipindi na chiva kala, mwavosi damulekanili kila mundu na kaya yaki, damuneki weka, lakini nguva weka ha kwanongwa Tati wangu kava na nenga.
43016033	Ndivawombela naha ili yumwi muvi na kusika pamuva pamu na nenga. Vandu vamlima davavagoboli lakini mudindali! Mlima ndiwuwesha kala.”
43017001	Yesu pamalilili kuwomba naha, kalola kumbindi kunu pawomba, “Tati chipindi chiyisa. Uvagoli vandu vamujumi mwana waku, ili mwana waku akujumi.

43021001	Pambeli Yesu kawoneka kandi kwa vandundami vaki kulihiva lya Tibeliya. Yaveli naha:
43021002	Simoni Petili na Tomasi yiva mkema mambila na Natanieli yula yafumili Kana ya Galilaya na vana vavili va Sebidayu na vandundami vavili va Yesu vaveli pamu.
43021003	Simoni Petili kavawombela, “Nguyenda kulova vasomba.” Veni vawomba, “Yufwi datuyendi na yuwi.” Vayenda vayipaka muwatu, lakini pamihi posi vapata hata somba yumu ha.
43021004	Pamalavila lijuva palisosomokeyi, Yesu aveli muluwongu lwa lihiva, vandundami vamumanyili ha kucha ndi Yesu.
43021005	Pambeli Yesu kavadasha, “Vaghanja vangu muwomesha ng'odu hata somba yumu?” Vamuyangula, “Tupata ha.”
43021006	Kavawombela, “Muyashi lwafu mwambu wa mulilu wa watu, damuvapati vasomba.” Vategha, pambeli valemwa kukweghela lwafu muwatu, nongwa vawomeshili vasomba vatangalili.
43021007	Pambeli ndundami yula yatamiwili na Yesu kamuwombela Petili, “Yula ndi Bambu!” Simoni Petili papikanishili kucha yula ndi Bambu, kakuna yingwa yaki kayiwopela muchiwunu. Nongwa asighalili na sawu hela kayiyasila mumachi.
43021008	Vandundami vasighalili muwatu vayisa kumwambu ya lihiva, kunu pavakweya lwafu lumemili vasomba. Vaveli patali ha na luwongu, paveli kucha mawulu milongu lilongu.
43021009	Pavafikili muluwongu, vawona motu wa makala, pambindi vavika vasomba pamu na mibumunda.
43021010	Yesu kavawombela, “Muyeyi vasomba vamu yimuvakamulili ponopa.”
43021011	Simoni Petili kayipaka muwatu kakwegha lwafu luveli na vasomba mbwaya milongu na lilongu muhanu na vatatu. Vasomba vosi ava lakini lwafu lwademukili ha.
43021012	Yesu kavawombela, “Mwisi mulyi.” Kwahela ndundami yamudashili kucha, mweni ghani, kwanongwa vamanyili mweni Bambu.
43021013	Yesu katola libumunda kavagayila, pambeli atolili vasomba kagola nga wuwula.
43021014	Awu waveli mwanja wa tatu wa Yesu kuvafumbukila vandundami vaki kufuma pashukukili.
43021015	Pavalili kala, Yesu kamuwombela Simoni Petili, “Simoni mwana wa Yohani, Wuli, yuwi ukundama nenga munu kupita voseva?” Kamyangula, “Yina Bambu, yuwi kumanya kucha ngukutama.” Yesu kamuwombela, “Dimi vanafungami vangu.”
43021016	Yesu kamuwombela kandi, “Simoni mwana wa Yohani, wuli, kundama?” Kamuyangula, “Yina Bambu, yuwi kumanya kucha ngukutama.” Yesu kamuwombela, “Dimi vafungami vangu.”
43021017	Mwanja wa tatu kamuwombela, “Simoni mwana wa Yohani, ukundama nenga?” Petili kakalala nongwa kamdasha myanja mitatu, “Yuwi ukundama nenga?” Mweni kamuwombela, “Bambu kumanya.” Yesu kawomba, “Dimi vafungami vangu.
43021018	Ngukuwombela nakaka, pawuveyi msongolu wayiwopili umweni yingwa yaku, wayendili kuwudayila umweni. Lakini paugogola dawuhololi mawoku vaku na mundu wingi akukuwopa yingwa yaku, pambeli akukuyegha kuungajila kudayila kuyenda.”
43021019	Yesu kawomba naha kulangusha kucha Petili dasovi munjifwa ya wuliwuli na kuyegha ukomi kwa Chapanga. Pambeli Yesu kamuwombela, “Ungovikeli!”
43021020	Petili kaghalambuka kamuwona ndumindumi yula yatamiwili na Yesu akuvakovikela, ndundami yula ndi mweni yamusaghamilili Yesu pavalyeyi, yula amudashili, “Bambu ghani akwisa akushengeti yuwi?”
43021021	Petili pamuwonili mweni, kamudasha Yesu, “Wuli mundu ayu?”
43021022	Yesu kamyangula, “Leki ngudayila mweni ayikali mbaka panyisa, achi chindu liki kwa yuwi? Yuwi ungovekeli nenga.”
43021023	Chilongu chila chilanduka kwa valongu kucha ndundami yula dasovi ha. Lakini Yesu kawomba ha kucha yula ndundami dasovi ng'odu, mweni kawomba kucha “Mani ngudayila mweni ayikali mbaka panyisa, achi chindu liki kwa yuwi?”
43021024	Yula ndundami ndi mweni yadetili na kuyandika milandu ayi. Tumanya kucha chatovilelili chavelili nakaka.
43021025	Kuna milandu yitangalili Yesu yagolili. Leki fingayandikiwili fyosi chimu chimu, nguyihola mlima wosi wungaveli kwahela fwasi ya kuvika fitabu.
44001001	Mkomi Teofili, muchitabu cha kwaa ndayandikili milandu yosi Yesu yagolili na kuwula kukandila pakwandi ya chichuku chaki,
44001002	mbaka lijuva lila patoliwili kumbindi. Paghaveyi akali kutoliwa kumbindi Mfuki Mng'alili amgolili avawulili vandundami yivashawulili ndambu ya kuyikala.
44001003	Majuva milongu mchechi kufumila kusova kwa mweni avafumbukilili myanja yitangalili nakaka aveli mnofu. Vamuwonili, mweni aywangili nawu milandu ya wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga.
44001004	Chipindi patang'anikeyi pamu na veni avawulili naha, “Mkotoo kuwuka Yelusalemu, mveteli tanila Mfuki Mng'alili ayu ndi fupu yajangili Tati, mwambikanishili kala pandimuhimulileyi.
44001005	Yohani Mbatisha abatishili kwa machi, pavapita majuva madokwa yumwi damubatishwi kwa Mfuki Mng'alili.”
44001006	Topi, vandundami pavatang'anikili pamu na Yesu, vamudashili, “Wuli Bambu, chipindi achi dauvapi kandi wutwa wula vandu va Isilaeli?”
44001007	Lakini Yesu kavawombela, “Chipindi na majila va milandu ayi yiva muuwesu wa Tati wangu, ayi milandu yenu ha kumanya kucha dayivi ndili.
44001008	Lakini chipindi Mfuki Mng'alili pavavasunukilili yumwi, damupokeli liwovi damuvi vatovilela vangu mumbwani ya Yelusalemu na mumkowa wa Yudeya na Samaliya pamu na mumlima wosi.”
44001009	Padetili kala afi, kunu pavamlola, atoliwili kumbindi, lifundi limfifa vakotoo kumuwona kandi.
44001010	Pavaveghi vakali vakalola kumbindi, paghaveyi akuyenda, tepu vandu vavili yivavelili vafwala yingwa sha mbuleteee vawolukili pabehi na veni.
44001011	Vadeta, “Yumwi vandu va Galilaya! Wuli mukuwoloka kunu patoliwa kumbindi? Yesu ayu yatoliwili kufuma kwa yumwi na kuyenda kumbindi, dayisi kandi ndambu yiyeyi yimumuwonili patoliwa kumbindi.”
44001012	Pambeli vandundami vawuya Yelusalemu kufuma chidunda chivachikemili Miseyituni chaveli pabehi kucha kilumita yimu kufuma kumbwani.
44001013	Pavafikili kumbwani vayingilili chumbagati cha mugolofa veni vavelili vakwikala, aveli Petili na Yohani na Yakobi na Andeleya na Filipu na Tomasi na Batulumeyu na Mateyi na Yakobi mwana wa Alufayu na Simoni mlevangila mlima wa Vaisilaeli na Yuda mwana wa Yakobi.
44001014	Voseva vayikungula pavadadava pamu na vadadala vamonga na Maliya mawaki Yesu pamu na vafwata mundu.
44001015	Mumajuva vala, Petili awolukili pagati ya vala valongu yivajumilili vayikungili, vosi vaveli vandu mya na milongu mivili,
44001016	kadeta, “Valongu vangu yimujumilili, yaveli nakaka lula lubali lwa Mayandiku Vang'alili luvi, lubali lwa Mfuki Mng'alili, kwa filongu fya Dawudi, atungili milandu ya Yudasi, yula yavalongushili vala vandu kumkamula Yesu.
44001017	Yuda aveli yumu wa chipinga chetu, kwanongwa ashawuliwili ghavi mungimbaniku yetu.”
44001018	Mweni ahemilili chitava kwa sila mbiya shapatili kwa chindu chaki cha wafu, kawa pasi luu! Kabaluka, mitima yaki yisekimuka.
44001019	Kila mundu Muyelusalemu apikanishili milandu yila kwa luga yawu na vachikema chila chitava “Hakeli Dama.” Mana yaki, “Chitava cha Mwasi.”
44001020	“Topi, vayandika muchitabu cha Lumbombu: ‘Makalu vaki vasighala domu, mundu yoyosi akotoo kuyikala mugati yaki.’ Na yiyandikiwa: ‘Mundu wingi atoli fwasi yaki ya ngimbanikilu.’
44001021	“Pambeli, mundu yumu wa vala yivaveli pamu na yufwi chipindi chosi Bambu Yesu paghaveyi mumwanja, ashawuliwi ghavi pamu na yufwi.
44001022	Ayu ghavi yumu wa vala yivayilongushili na yufwi tangila Yohani Mbatisha pabatishagha mbaka lijuva lila Yesu patoliwili kumbindi kufuma kwa yufwi. Ayu daghavi pamu na yufwi muutovileli wa kushukuka kwa Yesu.”
44001023	Apa, vatambula matawa va vandu vavili, wa kwaa Yosefu vamkemaya Balisaba awu Yustu na yumonga Matia.
44001024	Pambeli vadadava: “Bambu, yuwi kumanya ndima sha vandu vosi. Topi, wutulangushili gati ya ava vavili yoti yumushawulili,
44001025	Ili atoli achi chichuku cha undundami yachilekili Yudasi yayendili kwakumanyili Chapanga.”
44001026	Vagola doo, yamponikilili Matia, mweni kayongeshwa kwa vala vandundami vamonga lilongu na yumu.
44002001	Lijuva lya Pendikosti palifikili, vosi vaveli vayikungula pamu.
44002002	Tepu, vapikanisha lishu kufuma kumbindi, lyaveli kucha liyegha likomi, limema munyumba yonda yivayikalili.
44002003	Pambeli, fifumbuka findu kucha myengi ya motu, yiivavili kutula kwa vandu vosi yivavelili mula.
44002004	Vosi vamemishiwa Mfuki Mng'alili, vakanda kudeta detelu yingi kucha Mfuki Mng'alili wavagolili vadeti.
44002005	Aku Yelusalemu vavelili Vayawudi, vandu yivamjumili Chapanga, vafumili kila mlima.
44002006	Pavapikanishili lishu ali, lipinga likomi lya vandu liyikungasha. Vosi valilimuka nendu, pala kila mundu vavapikanishili pavadeta kila mundu cha kayaki mweni.
44002007	Vajingwa na kuyikang'anika pavayiwombela, “Voseva venikaya va Galilaya yina ndaa?
44002008	Ponopa yikuva wuliwuli yufwi tukuvapikana kila mundu mukabila yetu? Yiva wuliwuli, vandu vosi tukuvapikana pavadeta kwa kabila shetu?
44002009	Vamonga gati ya yufwi, Vapalisi na Vamedi na Vaelamu na vamonga venikaya va Mesopotamia na Yudeya na Pondu na mkowa wa Asia,
44002010	na Fulugia na Pamfilia na Misili pamu na mwambu wa Libiya pabehi ya Kileni pamu na vahenja vamonga kufuma Loma,
44002011	Vayawudi na vandu yivalowokili mudini ya Vayawudi, vamonga va Kileti na Vahalabu. Twavosi yufwi tukuvapikana pavadeta kwa kabila shetu milandu mikomi ya Chapanga.”
44002012	Vosi vayikanganika na kujuluvala kunu pavayidasha, “Ayi yiva na mana liki?”
44002013	Lakini vamonga vakavadanileyi pavadeta, “Vandu ava valovela difwayi!”
44002014	Petili awolukili pamu na vala lilongu na yumu, akandili kuvalandulila vandu kwa lishu likomi: “Valongu va Vayawudi na vosi yimwikala Yelusalemu, mupikanishi kwa finofu filongu fyangu.
44002015	Vandu ava valovela ng'odu ngimu yimuyihola, mbona yiva malavila saa ndatu hela?
44002016	Nakaka milandu ayi yawombili Yoweli mbuyi wa Chapanga:
44002017	‘Majuva vala va mwishu, Chapanga akudeta, dandivamwayili Mfuki wangu vandu vosi. Vasongolu na vahinja venu davatungi milandu yangu, vafijana venu davaluluti umbuyi wa Chapanga, vavaha venu davaloti milotu.
44002018	Hata kwa vandumindumi vangu valumi na vadala, danivamwayili Mfuki wangu majuva vala, na veni davatungi milandu yangu.
44002019	Dagoli filangushilu kumbindi, na pasi pamlima danangushi filoja, dakuvi na mwasi na motu na lyosi tii,
44002020	Lijuva dalighalambuki lwisa, na mwesi dawubyuali kucha mwasi, paliveyi likali hela kufika lijuva lila likomi lya kwisa Bambu.
44002021	Apa, mundu yaluva kwa litawa lya Bambu dalowuliwi.’
44002022	“Vayisilaeli, mpikanishi filongu afi! Yesu wa Nasaleti aveli mundu yalangushiwili kwa yufwi na Chapanga kwa mihilu na nangushilu, ya kuyikang'anika na ndambu Chapanga wavalangushili gati yenu kwa kupitila mweni, kucha wula wumumanyili.
44002023	Yaveli milandu ya Chapanga mweni, yayilatili kala, Yesu atayiwi mumawoku venu, mumuwulaghi kwa kuvalekela vandu va wafu vamuvangilili mulupingika.
44002024	Lakini Chapanga amshukushili munjifwa, kamlekesha kugoboliwa munjifwa kwanongwa akotoo kuwopiwa na njifwa.
44002025	Dawudi awombili milandu yimwilatili mundu yula: ‘Ndamuwonili Bambu pawulongolu yangu chipindi chosi, kava na nenga mwambu wangu wa mlilu dandikanyiki ha.
