44002026	Ndima yangu yikusekilela, kandi lulimi lulumbilila kwa cheleli, na njimba yangu dayiikali yikushuvilila,
44002027	nongwa yuwi Chapanga dawuneki ng'odu nenga kumambi, wala kumlekishela mng'alili waku awoli.
44002028	Kunangusha deha sha unofu, yuwi dawumemeshi nenga cheleli pawuva pabehi na nenga.’
44002029	“Valongu vangu, ngudayila kuvawombela finofu milandu yimupatili mbuyi wetu mkomi Dawudi. Mweni asovili, vamsika na sembi yaki yiva pakaya yetu mbaka nalelu.
44002030	Dawudi aveli mbuyi wa Chapanga, yamanyili kucha Chapanga kamwilapila kucha yumu kufuma mulukolu lwaki dahali wutwa waki.
44002031	Dawudi awonili kala milandu dagoli Chapanga kavawombela kushukuka kwa Kilistu Mkombola chipindi padetili: Vamleka ng'odu kumambi na mvili waki uwola ng'odu.
44002032	Chapanga amshukushili Yesu ayu munjifwa na yufwi twavosi ndi vatovilela va unakaka awu.
44002033	Mweni pakweshiwili kala na kuvikiwa mwambu wa mlilu, Chapanga katugayila Mfuki Mng'alili ndi ujangi wa Tati, ponopa Yesu katuyitila kala ayu Mfuki Mng'alili. Achi chimuchiwona na kupikana ponopa.
44002034	Mana Dawudi mweni, akwelili kumbindi ha, ila mweni adetili: ‘Bambu amuwombilili Bambu wangu: Uyikali mwambu wangu wa mlilu,
44002035	mbaka ndivagoli vachimdwama vaku vavi kucha chigoda cha kuvikila mawulu vaku.’
44002036	“Vandu vosi va Isilaeli nakaka vakudayiliwa vamanyi kucha ayu Yesu yivamuvangililili mulupingika, Chapanga amugolili Bambu na Kilistu.”
44002037	Vandu pavapikanishili afi, fyavasomili mundima, vavadashili Petili na vala vandundami: “Valongu tugoli wuli wuli?”
44002038	Petili kayangula, “Mupomeli sambi shenu na mubatishiwi kwa litawa lya Yesu Kilistu ili kila mundu awushiwi sambi na mupokeli Mfuki Mng'alili ndi fupu.
44002039	Nongwa, ujangi waveli wa yumwi na vana venu, kwa vala vosi yivayikala kutali na kila mundu dakemiwi na Bambu wetu Chapanga.”
44002040	Avawombilili filongu fitangalili na kuvadedeka vandu pavawombela, “Mulowoki muchileli achi cha wafu.”
44002041	Vandu vatangalili vajumilili filongu fyaki, vabatishiwa. Lijuva lila vayongishekili vandu alufu ndatu mulipinga lila.
44002042	Ava vosi vayiwulili kwa vandundami na tuwilumba pamu muulongu, kulya pamu na kudadava.
44002043	Mihilu na mihilu fitangalili fyagolikili na vandundami mbaka kila mundu awonili lyova.
44002044	Vala vajumilili vosi vaveli vayendilela kuva mahali pamu na findu fyawu fyaveli fya vosi.
44002045	Vahemishili fitava na findu fyawu, pambeli vavaghanili mbiya kila mundu ndambu ya shida yaki.
44002046	Majuva vosi vatanganikaya munyumba sha Chapanga. Lakini chipindi cha kulya, vatanganikaya munyumba shawu na valili filivi fyawu kwa cheleli na kushisha ndima.
44002047	Vamujumili Chapanga, vatamiwili na vandu vosi. Kila lijuva Bambu avayongishili mulipinga lyawu vandu yivavelili vakulowuliwa.
44003001	Lijuva limu, saa tisa pamusi, Petili na Yohani vaveli vakuyenda kunyumba ya Chapanga, chipindi cha kudadava.
44003002	Kwaveli na mundu yaveli chikwavakwava kufumila kuwoneka. Topi vandu vaveli vakumpapa majuva vosi mbaka pamulyangu wa nyumba ya Chapanga wuvawukema, “Mlyangu wa Nyanyi” ili avaluvi vala yivayingila munyumba ya Chapanga.
44003003	Pavawonili Petili na Yohani pavayingila munyumba ya Chapanga, mweni avaluvili vamupi chindu.
44003004	Petili kamulola ngimu wamulolili Yohani pambeli Petili kamuwombela “Tuloli!”
44003005	Mweni kavaghalambukila pashuvilila kupata chindu kwa veni.
44003006	Pambeli Petili kamuwombela, “Nahela mbiya wala chumang'andu, lakini chila chimelili nachu dangugayili. Kwa litawa lya Yesu Kilistu wa Nasaleti, woloki yendiyendi!”
44003007	Pambeli, kamukamula liwoku lya mlilu, pamtanga kumtandamula bahala pala mawulu na matendi vaki vaveli na liwovi.
44003008	Kajumba, kawoloka kwa mawulu vaki kakanda kuyenda yenda. Pambeli kayingila munyumba ya Chapanga, pamu na veni payendayenda na kujumbanga kunu pamjuma Chapanga.
44003009	Vandu vosi vaveli pala pavamuwonili payendayenda na kumjuma Chapanga,
44003010	vandu vamumanyili kucha yula ndi yayikalagha na kuluva pala pamlyangu wuvawukema “Mlyangu wa Nyanyi” wa nyumba ya Chapanga, veni vajinga nendu hata vakamanyeyi ha chindu liki chimgolili nawula.
44003011	Yula mundu aveli akali hela kavakamulila Petili na Yohani. Vandu vosi, pavajingweyi nendu, vakandili kutuvila muudamwa wuvawukema “Mdamwa wa Solumoni.”
44003012	Topi, Petili pavawonili vandu vala vakujuluvala kavawombela, “Vayisilaeli, wuli mukuyikang'anika filongu afi? Wuli mukutufulutulila mesu kucha kwa liwovi lyetu awu uwesu wa yufwi wumugola mundu ayu ayendiyendi?
44003013	Chapanga wa Ibulahimu na wa Isaka na wa Yakobi pamu na wa vagogolu vetu na mweni Chapanga yamjuma Yesu ndumindumi waki. Mumkamula awulayiwi, yumwi mwamlemili hata yingaveli Pilatu angamlekishelili ghavi pekesu.
44003014	Avelili Mng'alili na goleki lakini yumwi mwamulemili, mumudayila mundu yula yawulagha vandu alekisheliwi.
44003015	Mwamuwulayili yula yaveli chikandilu cha unofu, lakini Chapanga amshukushili munjifwa. Yufwi vatovilela wa afi.
44003016	Mukumuwona mundu ayu yimummanyili kalijumila litawa lya Yesu limgola ghavi na liwovi, litawa lya Yesu nakujumila kwaki kumgola anani nakaka, ngimu vosi yimumuwona.
44003017	“Hinapawu valongu vangu, manya kucha yumwi na vakomi venu mumgolela Yesu chindochi pangajila mwaveni kumanya kucha mukugola chindu liki.
44003018	Chapanga agolili fila fya wombili kwa vambuyi vosi, yaveli Kilistu Mkombola dagobuliwi, ponopa ndi kagola chawombili.
44003019	Mupomeli sambi shenu mumuwuyili Chapanga, chipindi dachiyisi mweni davawushili sambi shenu,
44003020	Mgoli nahawu ili Bambu avapi chipindi cha kutayiwa munda kandi davayegheli yula Kilistu Mkombola amshawulili mweni, ayu ndi Yesu.
44003021	Mweni asighali aku kumbindi mbaka payisa chipindi cha kukombola uswanu findu fyosi, ngimu Chapanga wadetili kupitila vambuyi vaki vang'alili vatangalili va dahili.
44003022	Nongwa Musa adetili, ‘Bambu Chapanga wenu davayegheli mbuyi kucha nenga mumlima wenu. Na yumwi damumpikanishi findu fyosi fyavawombela.
44003023	Mundu yoyosi yampikanisha ng'odu mbuyi ayu datapuliwi kutali na vandu va Chapanga na kuwulayiwa.’
44003024	Vambuyi vosi, kukandila Samweli na vala vayisili mumbeli, valandulili milandu yigoleka mumajuva ava.
44003025	Ujangi wa Chapanga wadetili kupitila vambuyi vaki kwanongwa ya yumwi. Wuwula wula mukuva pamu mulilaghanu Chapanga lyagolili na vagogolu venu ndi kwanongwa ya yumwi, chipindi Chapanga amuwombilili Ibulahimu, ‘Kwa njila ya fileli fyaku vandu va mlima davanemiliwi.’
44003026	Topi, Chapanga amshukushili ndumindumi waki kwanongwa ya yumwi, amulayishili avanemeli usangi kwa kumgola kila mundu aghalambuki asileki njila shaki sha wafu.”
44004001	Petili na Yohani pavaveghi vakali vakuvalandulila vandu yivayisili vatambika na vakomi va machonda va nyumba ya Chapanga pamu na Masadukayu.
44004002	Vandu ava vakalalili munu kwanongwa vandundami ava vavelili vakulandula milandu ya kushukuka kwa Yesu, ayi dayilangushi nakaka kucha vandu vasovili davashukuki.
44004003	Topi, vavakamula nongwa yaveli mbungamihi vavavikili muchijaka mbaka chilawu yaki.
44004004	Lakini vandu vatangalili yivapikanishili unjangila wula vawujumila na vavelili valulumi alufu muhanu.
44004005	Chilawu yaki, vakomi va Vayawudi, vagogolu na vawula va Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa vayikungili pamu aku Yelusalemu.
44004006	Vatanganikili pamu na Anasi mtambika mkomi na Kayafa na Yohani na Alekisanda na vamonga vavelili va lukolu lwa Mtambika mkomi.
44004007	Pavavawolushili Petili na Yohani pawulongolu yawu, vavadashili, “Yumwi mugola chindu achi kwa liwovi liki awu kwa litawa lya ghani?”
44004008	Pala, Petili, aveli kamema Mfuki Mng'alili, kavawombela “Vakomi va vandu na vagogolu!
44004009	Mani payiva mukutudasha chila chilongu cha nyanyi chagoliwili yula mundu yavelili chikwavakwava na ndambu yalowuliwili,
44004010	yumwi na vandu vosi va Isilaeli mumanyi lelu mundu ayu awolukili uswanu nakaka kwa litawa lya Yesu Kilistu wa Nasaleti, mweni mumuvangilila mulupingika, Chapanga kamushukusha munjifwa.
44004011	Ayu ndi mweni chilongu cha nyanyi chadetili: ‘Ligonguveli mulilemili yumwi vajengi, ponopa liva ligonguweli likomi lya kujengela kwa yosi.’
44004012	Ulowola datuupati kwa mundu wingi ha, kwanongwa mlima wosi Kwa hela litawa lingi Chapanga lyatugayilili likuwesha kutulowola.”
44004013	Vakomi va chitemela, vakamanyeyi kucha Petili na Yohani vaveli vandu vangajila kuyenda kushuli na vaveli vandu vasihisihi hela, vayikanganikili ndambu ya nyangulilu yawu ya uhwadali. Vamanyili kucha vaveli pamu na Yesu.
44004014	Lakini pavamuwonili yula mundu yivamlowulili Petili na Yohani vawoloka pamu na veni, vaweshili kudeta chindu ha.
44004015	Vavalayishili vafumi panji ya chitemela, ili vakomi va chitemela vawombani kwa chifisu.
44004016	Vakomi va chitemela vayidashili, “Tugoli wuli na vandu ava? Vandu vosi vayikala Yelusalemu vamanya muhilu awu wugolikili, yufwi tuweshi ng'odu kulema milandu ayi.
44004017	Lakini kugola milandu ayi yikotoo kukwila nesu kwa vandu, tuvakapushi vakotoo kulandula kwa mundu yoyosi litawa lya Yesu.”
44004018	Pambeli vavakema kandi munyumba, vavalayisha vakotoo kudeta na kuwula kwa litawa lya Yesu.
44004019	Lakini Petili na Yohani vavayangula, “Mulamuli mwaveni choti chinofu tuvajumili yumwi awu Chapanga.
44004020	Kwanongwa yufwi tuweshi ng'odu kuleka kudeta findu fila tufiwonili na kufipikanisha.”
44004021	Vavaha va chitemela vavalakalila nendu, pambeli vavalekishela. Valemwa kuvapa asabu kwanongwa vandu vosi vaveli vakumjuma Chapanga kwanongwa ya chilongu achi.
44004022	Ayu mundu yagoliwili mihilu ya kulowuliwa aveli na myaka yasidili milongu mchechi.
44004023	Petili na Yohani pavavalekili vawuya kwa vayawu, vavahimulila fila fivawombili vatambika vakomi na vagogolu.
44004024	Veni pavapikanishili filongu afi vajova pamu pavadadava kwa ndima yimu kwa Chapanga pavadeta, “Bambu, yuwi ugolili kumbindi na mlima, bahali na fyosi fivelili,
44004025	udetili kwa liwovi lya Mfuki Mng'alili mumlomu wa ndumindumi waku, mgogolu wetu Dawudi: Wuli vandu va mlima wosi vakwikalalila? Mbona vandu vagola milandu ya hela?
44004026	Vatavala va mlima vayitanda kala, na vatavala vatanganikili pamu, kumlema Bambu mkombola yashauliwili.
44004027	Nakaka, Helodi na Ponsiu Pilatu na vandu va Isilaeli na vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi vatanganikili mumbwani kumulimba Yesu ndumindumi Mng'alili amushaghili mafuta ghavi mkombola.
44004028	Vagolili milandu yila wiyilatili kala dayigoleki kandi kwa uwesu na Udayilu waku.
44004029	Deku, Bambu, uloli ndambu yivatukapusha ututangi vandumindumi vaku tulanduli chilongu chaku kwa chiganu.
44004030	Woloshi liwoku lyaku ulowoli vandu tugoli filangushilu na filoja kwa litawa lya Yesu ndumindumi waku yang'alili.”
44004031	Pavamalili kudadava, pahala pala pavavelili vatanganikila patikanyika, vosi vaveli vamema Mfuki Mng'alili. Vosi vayendelela kutyanga pavalandula filongu fya Chapanga ngajila lyogha.
44004032	Vosi yivamjumilili Chapanga vayiwonili vava moyu wumu na hoshu silinganili. Kwahela mundu yavelili na chindu achivikili chivi chaki weka, vavaghanili fila fivakamulili.
44004033	Vandundami vatovilelili kwa liwovi likomi kushukuka kwa Bambu Yesu na Chapanga avapili usangi utangalili.
44004034	Kwahela mundu yapotili chindu, vamu yivaveli na fitava na nyumba shawu vahemesha vayegha mbiya sivapatili,
44004035	mbiya asi shosi vavapili vandundami, vamgayilili kila mundu ndambu ya Udayilu waki.
44004036	Kwavelili Mlawi yumu, muwoneka wa Kupilu, litawa lyaki Yosefu, vandundami vaveli vakumukema Banabasi, mana yaki, “Mundu wa kuvakola mawoku vandu.”
44004037	Mweni wuwu aveli na chitava chaki pambeli kahemesha kandi katola mbiya sila, kavagayila vandundami.
44005001	Mundu yumu vamkemaya Ananiasi na mdala mundu Safila wuwula wula vahemishili chitava chawu.
44005002	Lakini Ananiasi afisili mbiya simonga sivapatili na mdamundu amanyili. Mbiya sisighalili avagayilili vandundami.
44005003	Pambeli Petili kamudasha, “Ananiasi, kumuleka Lijangavandu ayingili mumoyu waku kumujanga Mfuki Mng'alili kufisa mbiya simonga siupatili muchitava chila?
44005004	Pawuvelili ukali kuhemesha chitava chaveli chaku, pambeli pawuhemishili, mbiya sila shaveli sikali shaku. Wuli kandi kugola findu kucha afi? Kumjanga mundu ha, kumujanga Chapanga!”
44005005	Ananiasi papikanishili naha kawa pasi, kasova. Vandu vosi yivapikanishili milandu ayi vatilili nendu.
44005006	Vafijana vayisa, vagubika chikongu chaki, vachifumisha panji, vachisika.
44005007	Kucha masaa matatu pavapitili, mdala mundu ngajila kumanya chimfumbukili bambu mundu, kayingila mugati.
44005008	Petili amdashili, “Unongeli! Asi nakaka mbiya simupatili pamuhemishili chitava?” Mweni kamyangula, “Yina, sisesi.”
44005009	Pambeli Petili kamuwombela, “Kwaliki muyijanga kumuyesha Mfuki wa Bambu? Pikani! Vala vandu vayendili kumusika bambu waku, ponopa vava pamlyangu na davakutoli na yuwi wuwu.”
44005010	Tepu Safila kawila pamawulu va Petili, kasova. Vafijana vala pavayingilili vamuwona kasova kala, vamufumisha panji, vamsika pabehi na bambu mundu.
44005011	Chipwembwi chikomi chivakamula vandu vosi yivajumilili na vandu vala vosi yivapikanishili milandu ayi.
44005012	Vandundami vagolili mihilu na mihilu yitangalili kwa vandu. Vajumilili vaveli vakutang'anikila pamu muudamwa wa Solumoni.
44005013	Mundu yangajila kujumila atilili kuva pamu na veni. Hata naha, vandu vamonga vangajila kuvajumila vavajuma.
44005014	Vandu vatangalili vamjumilili Bambu, valumi na vadala vayongishekili mulipinga lyau.
44005015	Vandu vavelili vakuyegha vatami mudeha vavawonjesha mufiwonjelu na mitefu ili pakapita livafiki lisisi lya Petili pambeli vanani.
44005016	Vandu vatangalili vafumili mbwani shiveli pabehi ya Yelusalemu, yivavayeghili vatami vawu na vala yivaveli na finyamkela, vosi valowuliwa.
44005017	Pambeli, Mtambika Mkomi na vala vaveli lighanja muchipinga cha Masadukayu va pala, vavawonela weyi vandundami.
44005018	Vavakamula vandundami, vavataya muchijaka.
44005019	Lakini pamihi makungu wa Bambu kavafuwulila milyangu ya chijaka, kavafumisha panji, kavawombela,
44005020	“Muyendi mukawoloki munyumba ya Chapanga, mkavawombeli vandu filongu fyosi fya unofu awu.”
44005021	Vandundami vavayitikila, malavila puti vayingila munyumba ya Chapanga, vakandili kuwula. Mtambika mkomi na vavaha va Isilaeli vagolili chitemela, pambeli vavalayishila vandu vakavayeghi vala vandumindumi kufuma kuchijaka.
44005022	Lakini vala vandumindumi pavafikili kula vavawona ha mula muchijaka. Vawuya kuchitemela kuvawombela,
44005023	“Tuwona chijaka chitatiwa milyangu yosi na machonda vakulolela milyangu. Lakini patufuwulili mugati tumuwona mundu ha!”
44005024	Mkomi wa machonda munyumba ya Chapanga na vatambika vakomi pavapikanishili milandu ayi vapatili lyogha. Vamanyili ng'odu chivafumbukili vandundami.
44005025	Pambeli mundu yumu ayisili, kuvawombela, “Mpikani! vala vandu muvatatilili muchijaka, ponopa vakuwula vandu munyumba ya Chapanga.”
44005026	Mkomi wa machonda wa nyumba ya kudadavila pamu na vandu vaki vayendili munyumba ya Chapanga, kavayegha kuchitemela. Lakini vavakamulili kwa liwovi ha, nongwa vakavatileyi vandu vangavagumili migonguveli veni.
44005027	Pavavayeghili, vavawolosha pawulongolu ya chitemela. Mtambika mkomi avadashili,
44005028	“Twavakanishili nendu kuwula kwa litawa lya mundu ayu, ponopa mukwisha mawuli venu Yelusalemu yosi na mukuyilata kutugayila nongwa ya mwasi wa mundu ayu.”
44005029	Petili, pamu na vala vandundami vamonga, vayangula, “Yikutulata tumjumili Chapanga weka, lakini mundu tukumjumila ng'odu.
44005030	Yumwi mwamuwulayili Yesu kwa kumuvangilila mulupingika lakini Chapanga wa vagogolu venu amshukushili.
44005031	Chapanga amgayilili fwasi ya wutwa kumbindi, kamvika mwambu waki wa mlilu, kava mutwa na Mlowola, kuvagola vandu va Isilaeli vasileki sambi shawu na vapomeliwi.
44005032	Yufwi ndi vatovilela va filongu afi. Chapanga avagayilili Mfuki Mng'alili ghavi mtovilela kwa vala yivamjumilili.”
44005033	Vanjagila vosi va chila chitemela pavapikanishili afi, maya sivakwila, valamula kuvawulagha.
44005034	Lakini Mfwalisayu yumu vamukemeyi Gamalieli mweni avelili muwula wa Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa aveli na luhunja nendu kupita vandu vosi, kawoloka pawulongolu ya chitemela chila, kavawombela vala vandundami vavafumishi panji kwa chipindi chidokwa.
44005035	Pambeli kavawombela vala vanjagila va chitemela, “Vaisilaeli vayangu, muyivavali na chindu achi chimudayila kuvagolela vandu ava!
44005036	Dahili padokwa, afumbukili mundu yumu litawa lyaki Teuda, ayidumbeyi kucha mweni mundu yajumiliwi na vandu mya mchechi naha, vamukovekelili. Lakini vamuwulaghili, pambeli chipinga chaki chosi chimwaaluka pambeli chisova.
44005037	Pambeli kandi, chipindi chila cha kuvalangiwa vandu, afumbukili Yuda wa Galilaya. Na mweni avakweyili vandu vamukovekela, lakini wuwu vamuwulayili na vandu vaki vayangalukili.
44005038	Hinapawu nenga wuwu nguvawombela, muvaleki vandu ava mukotoo kuvagola chindu! Mana payiva milandu ayi ya vandu hela, dayiyamili yeni.
44005039	Lakini payiva milandu kufuma kwa Chapanga, damuwesi ng'odu kulimbana na veni, damuvi mukulimbana na Chapanga.” Topi, vamujumila.
44005040	Vavakemili vala vandundami, vavadamula ndomondu na kuvakanisha vakotoo kuwula kandi kwa litawa lya Yesu, pambeli vavaleka vayendi.
44005041	Vandundami vafumili panji ya chitemela kunu vamema cheleli, kwanongwa vaveli vataywa musoni kwa litawa lya Yesu.
44005042	Majuva vosi vayendilela kuwula na kulandula Chilongu cha Nyanyi cha Yesu munyumba sha Chapanga na mukaya sha vandu kucha Yesu ndi Kilistu yashauliwili.
44006001	Pambeli, vanachuli pavayongishekeyi, kwaveli na shoshu na ng'ong'u gati ya vangutungu na vala yivaywangeyi Chibulaniya. Vala Vahelinisti yivaywangeyi Chigiliki vakang'ong'utekileyi kucha vangalimlyangu vawu vakuvavasuwa kuvagayila fivayilata fya majuva vosi.
44006002	Topi, vala vandundami lilongu na vavili vavakemili vanachuli vosi, vadeta, “Nyanyi ha kwa yufwi tuleki kuchilandula chilongu cha Chapanga na kukimbanikila uvaghi wa filivi.
44006003	Ponopa, valongu vangu, muvashawula vandu saba kwa yumwi yivavelili nyanyi, vamemili Mfuki na yivaveli na luhunja na yufwi datuvapikanisheyi veni.
44006004	Yufwi, chipindi chosi datukimbanikili kudadava na chichuku cha kulandula Chilongu cha Chapanga.”
44006005	Chindochi chivanowesha vandu vosi. Vavashawula Stefwani, mundu yavelili na ujumilwa mkomi na kumema Mfuki Mng'alili. Kandi vavashawulili Filipu na Pulokolu na Nikanoli na Timona na Pamena pamu na Nikolayi wa Antiyokiya yavelili chipindi chimu aghalambukilili mudini ya Chiyawudi.
44006006	Vavavika pawulongolu ya vandundami, vadadava na kuvavikila mawoku.
44006007	Chilongu cha Chapanga chayongishekili nendu na vanachuli aku Yelusalemu vayongishekili kalopu na lipinga likomi lya vatambika vamjumilili Yesu.
44006008	Chapanga amusangilili Stefwani usangi ngenju, kamugayila liwovi likomi aveli akugola mihilu na mihilu kwa vandu.
44006009	Lakini vandu vamonga vayisili ili valimbani na Stefwani. Vamu va vandu ava vaveli va nyumba ya kudadavila yivayikemaya, “Nyumba ya kudadavila ya vandu yivavelili pekesu.” Vandova vafumili mlima wa Kileni na Alekisandilia na vamonga vafumili Kilikiya na mkowa wa Asia.
44006010	Lakini vaweshili ha kumulimba kwanongwa ya luhunja lwaki na kwanongwa ya yula Mfuki yamulongushili chipindi padeteyi.
44006011	Topi, vavapili nganyanga vandu vamonga vadeti, “Vamupikanisha Stefwani padeta filongu fya kumjowola Musa na kumjowola Chapanga.”
44006012	Kwa chilongu achi vavajongishela vandu, vagogolu na vawula va Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa. Topi, vamwisila Stefwani, vamukamula na kumuyegha kuchitemela chikomi.
44006013	Vavayeghili kuchitemela vatovilela va udesi veni vawombili, “Mundu ayu akuleka ha kupajowola mahali pang'alili na Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa.
44006014	Kwa nongwa twamupikanishili kala padeta kucha ayu Yesu wa Nasaleti dayanangi nendu nyumba ya kudadavila na kughalambula Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa vatuyangili kwa Musa.”
44006015	Vandu vosi yivavelili mula muchitemela vamuwengulila mesu Stefwani, vamuwona wushu waki wuva kucha wa makungu.
44007001	Topi, mtambika mkomi amudashili, “Wuli, milandu ayi yiva nakaka?”
44007002	Stefwani amuyangulili, “Valongu vangu na vatati, mumbikanishi! Chapanga wa ukomi amubwitikili mgogolu wetu Ibulahimu paghaveyi kula Mesopotamia akali hela kuyenda kuyikala kula Halani.
44007003	Chapanga amuwombilili, ‘Wuki mumlima waku, valeki vandu vaku, uyendi mlima danikulangushi!’
44007004	Ibulahimu ahamili mlima wa Kalidayu, kayenda kuyikala Halani. Pambeli tati wa Ibulahimu pasovili, Chapanga amuwushili Halani kayisa kuyikala mlima awu wumuyikala ponopa.
44007005	Chapanga amugayilili ng'odu hata chipandi chidokwa cha uganga chivi chaki kucha mbala yaki mumlima awu, hata naha vamujangili kumupa mlima wula wuvi waki na vana vaki, chipindi achi aveli akali na mwana ha.
44007006	Chapanga amuwombilili naha, ‘Chileli chaku dawuchiyeghi kumlima wa wutwa va vandu vengi, aku davavagoli vavanda na kuvagolela milandu ya wafu kwa chipindi cha myaka mya mchechi.
44007007	Lakini nenga dandivahighi vandu ava yivavagola vavanda. Pambeli chileli chaku dachiyisi mulima wula kumjuma Chapanga bahapa.’
44007008	Chapanga kagola lilaghanu na mweni, topi, kamwingisha jandu ngimu chilangushilu chaki. Pambeli Ibulahimu amudumulili jandu mwana mundu Isaka pavapitili majuva nani kufuma awoneki. Isaka wuwula wula kamugolela Yakobi. Na mweni Yakobi kavagolela wuwula wula vala vanamundu lilongu na vavili veni vaveli vambuyi vetu.
44007009	“Vana va Yakobi vamuwonela weyi Yosefu, vamuhemesha Misili ghavi mvanda. Lakini Chapanga aveli pamu na mweni,
44007010	kamulowosha mungondu shaki shosi. Chapanga amugayilili fupu na luhunja pawulongolu ya Fwalawu, mutwa wa Misili, mweni amuvikili ghavi mkomi wa mlima wa Misili na munyumba yaki ya wutwa.
44007011	Pambeli kwafumbukili njala ngomi mlima wosi wa Misili na Kanaani, yiyegha madaba makomi. Vagogolu vetu vaveli vahela chilivi chochosi.
44007012	Yakobi papikanishili filongu fila kucha aku Misili kwaveli na filivi, avalayishili vana vaki, ndi vagogolu vetu, vayendi Misili kwa mwanja wa kwaa.
44007013	Mwanja awu wa pili, Yosefu kayilangusha kwa valongu vaki na Fwalawu kavamanya valongu va Yosefu.
44007014	Yosefu alayishili lulayi layi kwa tati mundu Yakobi na valongu vosi, tolitoli ya vandu yaveli milongu saba na muhanu, vayisi Misili.
44007015	Topi Yakobi ayendili Misili, kula mweni na vanamundu vosi vasovili.
44007016	Fikongu fyawu vafiyeghili mbaka Shekemu, vafisika musembi yahemilili Ibulahimu wa kabila lya Amoli kwa mbiya siutunga.
44007017	“Chipindi pachifikili Chapanga agoli chila chamjangili Ibulahimu na tolitoli ya vandu kula Misili yayongishekili kala na kuva ngomi munu.
44007018	Pambeli mutwa yumu yavelili kamumanya ng'odu Yosefu akandili kutavala aku Misili.
44007019	Awugolilili vandu va mlima wetu umakuluhu, avagolilili findu fya wafu vagogolu vetu kwa kuvang'ang'anika vavaviki panji fyali fyawu fisovi.
44007020	Musa awonikili chipindechi. Avelili mwana yamunowishili Chapanga. Aleliwili pakaya kwa chipindi cha myesi mitatu,
44007021	na pafumishiwili panji awulaghiwi, kamwali wa Fwalawu amutolili, kamulela kucha mwana mundu.
44007022	Musa awuliwili findu fyosi fya luhunja lwa Vamisili kava mundu yaveli na liwovi kwa filongu na kwa figoli.
44007023	“Pafikishili myaka milongu muchechi alamulili kuvatyangila valongu vaki Vayisilaeli.
44007024	Aku amuwonili yumu wa vala vakumgolela fya wafu na Vamisili, kayenda kumukombola kandi kumuhombela lugotu kwa kumuwulagha yula Mumisili.
44007025	Akacheyi Vayisilaeli vayaki vangamanyili kucha Chapanga angamutumili mweni avalowoli, lakini vamanyili nawula ha.
44007026	Chilawu yaki, avawonili Vayisilaeli vavili vakwiminya ayeshili kuvajovesha padeta, ‘Yumwi muva ulongu nongwa liki, mukuyigolela wafu mwaveni kwa mwaveni?’
44007027	Yula yaghaveyi akumutova muyaki kamusukumula Musa pambali padeta: ‘Ndi yakuvikili yuwi kuva chilongosi na muhigha wetu?
44007028	Wuli, ukudayila kung'ulaya kucha wumuwulaghili Mumisili yula lichu?’
44007029	Musa papikanishili filongu fila, atuvili kayenda kuyikala mumlima wa Midiani aku apatili vana valumi vavili.
44007030	“Myaka milongu mchechi payifikili, makungu wa Bambu amufumbukili Musa kuchivala chivelili chikuyaka motu kucheja pabehi na chidunda cha Sinai.
44007031	Musa kajinga munu kuwona chindu achi, kaselela pabehi ili ashungulili unofu, lakini apikanishili lishu lya Bambu:
44007032	‘Nenga Chapanga wa vambuyi vaku, Chapanga wa Ibulahimu wa Isaka wa Yakobi!’ Musa kabagama kwa lyogha na kayesha kandi ha kulembesha munu.
44007033	Bambu kamuwombela, ‘Wopoli mikobasi yaku kwanongwa pawuwolukili apa ndi mahali pang'alili.
44007034	Nakaka ndifiwona findu fya wafu fivagolili vandu vangu kula Misili. Mbikanisha chivembu chawu, nenga nyisa kuvakombola. Ponopa, dandikuyeghi Misili.’
44007035	“Ayu Musa ndi yula vandu va Isilaeli vamulemili pavadeteyi, ‘ghani yakuvikili yuwi kuva mlongosha na muhighi wetu?’ Kwa deha ya yula makungu yamufumbukilili kuchivala chikayakeyi motu, Chapanga kamulayisha ayu Musa ghavi mkomi na mukombola.
44007036	Mweni avalongushili vala vandu kufuma Misili kwa kugola mihilu na mihilu mulima wa Misili, kubahali ya Shamu na kucheja, chipindi cha myaka milongu mchechi.
44007037	Musa mweni avawombilili Vayisilaeli, ‘Chapanga davashawulili mbuyi kucha nenga gati ya valongu venu vamonga.’
44007038	Vayisilaeli pavayikungashili kucheja, Musa avelili kula kucha munjagila pamu na vagogolu vetu na yula makungu aywangili nayu kuchidunda cha Sinai. Mweni yayangili filongu fitugayila unofu atugayili yufwi.
44007039	“Lakini yuyu, vagogolu vetu valemili kumupikanisha, vamusukumulila pambali, vakadayileyi kuwuya Misili.
44007040	Vamuwombilili Haluni, ‘Tugoleli vamulungu, vatulongoshi njila. Tumanya ng'odu fimupatili ayu Musa yatulongushili kufuma Misili.’
44007041	Vagola ling'omung'omu lya ngwada wa senga na kuchitambikila. Vachigolela lihungu chindu chivelili vagola kwa mawoku vawu veni.
44007042	Lakini Chapanga awukili pagati yawu, avalekili vajumi ndondwa sha kumbindi, kucha vayandikili muchitabu cha vambuyi va Chapanga, ‘Yumwi vandu va Isilaeli! Nenga ha mungayilili fupu na tambiku kwa myaka milongu mchechi kula kucheja!
44007043	Yumwi mwapapili libudi lya chapanga Moleki, na ndondwa ya kuwumba ya chapanga wenu Lefani. Ming'omung'omu yimuwumbili yeni mukuvajuma. Kwanongwa ayi, dandivayeyi mateka kutali kupita Babiloni!’
44007044	“Kula kucheja vagogolu vetu vavelili na lila Libudi lya utovileli kucha Chapanga amulayishili Musa aligoli, ndambu yiyila yamulangushili Chapanga.
44007045	Pambeli valipokela lila Libudi lya Chapanga kufuma kwa vambuyi vawu. Valeli vetu chipindi cha Yoshua, pavawutolili mlima wula kufuma kwa vandu avawushili Chapanga ngimu yiva fikili. Pala vayikalili mbaka chipindi cha wutwa wa Dawudi.
44007046	Dawudi atamwili na Chapanga, Dawudi amuluvili Chapanga amujengeli pakwikala mweni avelili Chapanga wa Yakobi.
44007047	Lakini Solumoni ndi yamujengilili Chapanga nyumba.
44007048	“Hata naha, Chapanga Mkomi akwikalagha ha munyumba shivajengili vandu, kucha mbuyi adetili.
44007049	‘Bambu kadeta, Kumbindi chigoda changu cha wutwa na mlima chigoda changu cha kuvikila mawulu. Nyumba ya wuli wuli damuweshi kujengela na koti dambumulileyi?
44007050	Nenga ndi yigolili findu fyosi afi ng'odu?’ ”
44007051	Pambeli Stefwani awombili, “Yumwi muveli na lukilu lukomi! Mundima na majeji venu mukupikanisha ng'odu unjagila wa Chapanga! Yumwi kucha vagogolu venu. Majuva vosi mkumulimba Mfuki Mng'alili.
44007052	Kwaveli mbuyi yoyosi yangajila kuteshiwa na vagogolu vawu? Vavawulayili ava avatumili Chapanga kulandula kwisa kwa yula goleki. Hinapawu, yumwi mumushengeta, mumuwulaya.
44007053	Yumwi muvapokela Malawu va Chapanga atuyeyilili makungu, lakini muvajumila ng'odu.”
44007054	Vala vagogolu va chitemela pavapikanishili afi, vakalalili nendu, vakelichula minu kwa maya.
44007055	Lakini Stefwani aveli kamema Mfuki Mng'alili, kalola kumbindi, kawona ukomi wa Chapanga na Yesu kawoloka mwambu wa mlilu wa Chapanga.
44007056	Kadeta, “Mloli! Nguwona kumbindi kufuwuliwa na Mwana wa Mundu kawoloka mwambu wa mlilu wa Chapanga.”
44007057	Pala, vandu vosi vavelili muchitemela chila, vawuteyi na kudika majeji vawu kwa mawoku vawu. Pambeli vamujumbila pamu vosi.
44007058	Vamsukumulila panji ya mbwani, vamutova kwa miganga. Vala vavikili mikoti yawu kwa utovilela kwa kijana yumu litawa lyaki Sauli.
44007059	Pavaveli vakumtovanga kwa miganga Stefwani kayendelela kudadava naha, “Bambu Yesu, pokeli ufuki wangu!”
44007060	Katundama, kalila kwa kulandula, “Bambu, ukotoo kuvavalangila sambi ayi.” Pamalilili kudeta naha, kasova.
44008001	Sauli mweni awonili chindu achi cha kumuwulagha Stefwani chaveli chinofu. Majuva ava lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu lya Yelusalemu lyakandili kugoboliwa nendu. Yivajumilili vosi vatuvila kufijiji fya Yudeya na Samaliya ila vasiyalili vala vandundami hela.
44008002	Vandu vasangi vamusikili Stefwani na kumugolela chivembu chikomi.
44008003	Chipindi chichila chila, Sauli ayeshili kuvagobola lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu. Kayenda kaya mbaka kaya pakavafumisha panji vajumilili, valumi na vadala, kavataya muchijaka.
44008004	Vamjumilili Chapanga kula kosi kwevatuvilili vayendili kulandula chilongu cha nyanyi.
44008005	Filipu ayingilili mbwani ya Samaliya na kumulandula Kilistu Mkombola kwa venikaya va pala.
44008006	Vandu vayisili kupikanisha unofu wa unjagila wula wa Filipu na kulola mihilu yila yagolagha.
44008007	Mana finyamkela fivafuma vandu vatangalili pavawuta kwa lishu likomi nawu vandu vatangalili vaveli vapombalili na vandevindevi valowukili.
44008008	Kwaveli na cheleli ngomi mumbwani yila.
44008009	Topi, kwavelili mundu yumu vamukemaya Simoni, mweni aveli kagola kala uhavi waki mumbwani yila kwa chipindi chila, vandu va Samaliya vajingili, adetili kucha mweni mundu mkomi.
44008010	Vandu vosi, vadokwa na vakomi, vamupikinishili finofu vakadeteyi, “Simoni kana liwovi lya Chapanga vakemili ‘Liwovi Likomi.’ ”
44008011	Vandu vatangalili vampikanishili wula vavelili vajingwa kwa uhavi waki kwa chipindi chitali.
44008012	Lakini pavawujumilili unjagila wa Filipu wa chilongu cha nyanyi cha wutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga na litawa lya Yesu Kilistu, vabatishilwi valumi na vadala.
44008013	Simoni nayu kajumila, pambeli pabatishiwi aveli akuyenda pamu na Filipu, ayikang'anikili nendu mihilu na mihilu yiveli yikugoleka.
44008014	Vala vandundami vavelili kula Yelusalemu pavapikanishili kucha venikaya va Samaliya veni vapokela chilongu cha Chapanga, vavayegha aku Petili na Yohani.
44008015	Veni pavayisili, vavadadavila vandu va Chapanga vamuyangi Mfuki Mng'alili.
44008016	Kwanongwa kwaveli kwahela hata muyawu yumu yasunukiwili na Mfuki Mng'alili, ila vabatishwa hela kwa litawa lyaki Bambu Yesu.
44008017	Petili na Yohani vavavikila mawoku, vamupokela Mfuki Mng'alili.
44008018	Simoni pakawonili vandu vapokela Mfuki Mng'alili kwa kuvikilwa mawoku na vandundami, adayilili kuvagayila mbiya Petili na Yohani, kandi kadeta,
44008019	“Mungayili na nenga uwesu awu, mundu yoyosi panumuvikila mawoku vangu, apokeli Mfuki Mng'alili.”
44008020	Lakini Petili amuyangulili, “Uyaghamili pamu na mbiya shaku muyaghamili! Yuwi ukucha dauweshi kuhemela kwa mbiya usangi wa Chapanga!
44008021	Yuwi kwahela chindu mumilandu ayi, ngunda yaku ya nyanyi ng'odu kwa Chapanga.
44008022	Hinapawu, pomeli ughalambuki uleki chiuyihola na umuluvi Bambu mweni akuwesha kukupomela chilongu achi chiwuyihola.
44008023	Manya nakaka kumema nesu weyi na sambi sikutopela!”
44008024	Simoni kayangula, “Mudadavili kwa Bambu likotoo kumbata lya kumbata kwa afi fimudetili.”
44008025	Petili na Yohani pavahimulili kala na kulandula fyalayilili Bambu, vawuyili Yelusalemu. Pavaveghi vakuwuya vakalanduleyi milandu ya nyanyi mufijiji fitangalili fya Samaliya.
44008026	Makungu wa Bambu amuwombilili Filipu, “Uyitandi uyendi kundenyeku kupitila deha yifuma Yelusalemu kuyenda Gaza.” Deha ayi vakutyangila ha.
44008027	Topi, Filipu ayitandili kala, akandili mwanja. Chipindi chichila kwavelili na Mwisopiya yumu, ufisa mvika mbiya wa Muhumbu Kandake, mweni aveli ngali mdala. Avelili kayenda aku Yelusalemu kumudadavila Chapanga na chipindi achi aveli akuwuya kakwela mumbutuka ya kukwegha na chihongu.
44008028	Paaveyi mumwanja, avelili akusoma chitabu cha mbuyi wa Chapanga Isaya.
44008029	Mfuki Mng'alili amuwombilili Filipu, “Yendi pabehi ya mbutuka ayi uyendi pamu.”
44008030	Filipu kayenda mbilu, kampikanisha akusoma chitabu cha mbuyi wa Chapanga Isaya. Filipu kamudasha, “Afi fiwusoma fikuyingila muluhala lwaku?”
44008031	Kayangula, “Goli wuliwuli chinyingili ngajila mundu wa kunongosha?” Kamuluva Filipu akweni vayikali pamu na mweni.
44008032	Chifungu cha mayandiku avelili akusoma ndi achi, “Kalongoshwa kucha fungami akuyenda kumsinja, na kucha wula mwana wa fungami panyamala kwa yula yamuketula miwaji, mweni akudawula ng'odu mlomu.
44008033	Vamujohola na kumukaja haki. Ndi dahimulili chileli chaki? Mana unofu waki kawushiwa kumlima.”
44008034	Yula ngali mdala kamudasha Filipu, “Unongeli, mbuyi ayu filongu afi akadeteyi milandu liki, ndi milandu ya mweni awu ya mundu wingi?”
44008035	Topi, Filipu akandili na Mayandiku Vang'alili, kamuwombela Chilongu cha Nyanyi cha Yesu.
44008036	Pavaveyi mumwanja, vafikili pavelili na machi, yula ngali mdala adetili, “Loli, pavaveli machi ava, chindu liki chikunganisha ngotoo kubatishiwa?”
44008037	Filipu kadeta, “Mani pawujumila kwa moyu waku wonda, ukuwesha kubatishiwa.” Kayangula, “Yina ngujumila Yesu Kilistu ndi mwana wa Chapanga.”
44008038	Topi kawolosha mbutuka, pambeli vasunuka vonda vavili vayenda mumachi, Filipu amubatishili.
44008039	Pavafumili mumachi, Mfuki wa Bambu kamubikula Filipu, yula ngali mdala kamuwona kandi ha. Topi kayendelela na mwanja kunu kava na cheleli buja.
44008040	Filipu kayiwona kabwitukila mbwani ya Azotu, paaveyi akupita akalanduleyi Chilongu cha Nyanyi mumbwani shosi, mbaka pafikili Kayisalia.
44009001	Lakini Sauli, kayongesha kuvagola vandu vatili na kuvawulagha vandundami va Bambu, kamuyendela mtambika mkomi,
44009002	akamluveyi baluwa kufuma munyumba sha kudadavila sha Damasku, pakatanganika na vandu vamujumilili Chapanga mudeha valumi kwa vadala avakamuli avayeghi muchijaka aku Yelusalemu.
44009003	Tepu paaveyi mudeha, pabehi ya Damasku, lwengi kufuma kumbindi lumng'alikili kumshengeta mweni.
44009004	Kagua pasi, kapikana lishu likumuwombela “Sauli, Sauli! Wuli ukugobola nenga?”
44009005	Sauli kamudasha, “Bambu, Yuwi ghani?” Kamuyangula, “Nenga Yesu, yugobola.
44009006	Ponopa woloki, uyendi mumbwani, davakuwombeli chindu cha kugola.”
44009007	Vala vandu yivaveli pamu na Sauli mumwanja vanyamalili jii, vakapikanisheyi lishu, lakini vamuwonili mundu ng'odu.
44009008	Sauli atandamukili pasi agubutulili mesu vaki kachiwona chindu ha, vamukamula liwoku vamlongosha mbaka Damasku.
44009009	Ayikalili majuva matatu ngajila kulola, kulanda na kulya chindu.
44009010	Paaveyi Damasku ndundami yumu yivamkemili Ananiasi. Bambu amukemili mumilotu, “Ananiasi!” Kayangula, “Nengapa, Bambu.”
44009011	Bambu amuwombilili, “Woloki, uyendi deha yivayikema ‘Yiholukili,’ mbaka kaya ya Yuda, kuna mundu litawa lyaki Sauli, kafuma Talisu, mweni akumdadavila Chapanga.
44009012	Chapanga amulanushili kucha mundu yumu litawa lyaki Ananiasi, kayisa kumuvikila mawoku, aweshi kulola kandi.”
44009013	Ananiasi kayangula, “Bambu, mbikanisha filongu fya wafu fya mundu ayu kufuma kwa vandu vatangalili, kagola findu fitangalili kwa vang'alili vaku aku Yelusalemu,
44009014	kandi vatambika vakomi va Damasku vamjumisha avakamuli vonda yivakudadavila mulitawa lyaku.”
44009015	Lakini Bambu kamuwombela Ananiasi, “Uyendi, nongwa ayu ndimushawula andangi nenga kulilandula litawa lyangu limanyiki kwa vandu vangajila Vayawudi, vatwa na vandu va Isilaeli.
44009016	Kandi dandimulangushi ndambu dagoboleki kwanongwa ya litawa lyangu.”
44009017	Ananiasi ayendili munyumba yila, kayingila mugati mwavelili Sauli, pambeli kamuvikila mawoku, pakadeta, “Mlongu wangu Sauli, Bambu Yesu kanayila, yakufumbukilili mudeha pawuyiseyi apa, mweni yanyeyili nenga apa, akudayila uloli kandi na umemeshwi Mfuki Mng'alili.”
44009018	Tepu fiponeka kufuma mumesu vaki kucha mipati ya somba, kawesha kulola kandi. Kawoloka na kubatishiwa.
44009019	Pambeli kalya filivi, liwovi limuwuyila kandi. Sauli ayikalili Damasku na vanachuli vaki padokwa hela.
44009020	Tepu, kalongosha kulandula munyumba sha kudadavila kacha Yesu aveli Mwana wa Chapanga.
44009021	Vosi vamupikanisheyi vajinga, pavayidasha, “Ayu yuyula yula ng'odu avawulayei vandu vosi vamujumilili Yesu aku Yelusalemu? Na mweni kayisa apa kayilata avakamuli vandu vosi ng'odu na avayeghi kwa vatambika vakomi va nyumba ya kudadavila.”
44009022	Sauli ayongeshikili liwovi nendu, avagolili Vayawudi vavelili Damasku vayipwelishili, padeta ayu ndi Kilistu yaveli mkombola.
44009023	Pavapitili majuva vatangalili, Vayawudi vawombanila ndambu davamuwulaghi Sauli,
44009024	lakini Sauli amanyili chivayilatili. Pamusi na pamihi vakamulembeleleyi mumilyangu ya mbwani vamuwulaghi.
44009025	Pamihi vanachuli yivaveli pamu na Pauli vamtolili vamusunusha mulitandavala likomi kufuma mulilanga lya luviu lwa mbwani.
44009026	Sauli pafikili Yelusalemu, ayeshili kuyihasha na vandundami, vosi vakamutileyi, vajumilili ng'odu kucha nakaka kava ndundami.
44009027	Banabasi amutolili, kamuyegha kwa vandundami, Sauli avawombilili ndambu atanganikili na Bambu mudeha, kandi Bambu aywangili na mweni na ndambu akalanduleyi litawa lya Yesu kula Damasku kwa liwovi.
44009028	Sauli ayikalili pamu na veni na kuyendayenda Yelusalemu yosi, palandula litawa lya Yesu ngajila lyova.
44009029	Awombili palimbana na vangutungu va Vayawudi, lakini veni vasakeyi kumuwulagha.
44009030	Lakini valongu pavamanyili milandu ya kumuwulagha vamutolili mbaka mbwani ya Kayisalia, vamuleka ayendi Talisu.
44009031	Topi, Vajumilwa vaveli vasika mu Yudeya yosi, Galilaya na Samaliya, Mfuki Mng'alili atangili kuyongesha lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu na vayikalili pavamtila Bambu.
44009032	Petili pavatyangileyi mbembi shosi mumlima, mweni ayendili kwa vandu va Chapanga va aku Lida.
44009033	Amuwonili mundu yumu aku, litawa lyaki Anea mundu ayu apombalili awonjili muchiwonjelu myaka minani.
44009034	Petili amuwombilili, “Anea, Yesu Kilistu kakulowola, wuki unyengi chiwonjelu chaku.” Tepu katandamuka.
44009035	Vandu vosi vayikalaya Lida na Shaloni pavamuwonili Anea, vamuwuyilila Bambu.
44009036	Ndumindumi yumu avelili Yopa, yivamkemeyi Tabita, mana yaki kucha “Mbalapi” yajumilili vamkemaya Dokasi kwa Chigiliki. Mdala ayu avelili kagola findu fitangalili fya nyanyi pamu na kuvatanga vagaju.
44009037	Chipindi chila mdala yula atamwili na kusova, vawofuwili chikongu chaki vachivikili muchumbagati cha mumbindi.
44009038	Yopa yavelili kutali nesu ha na Lida, vanachuli vapikanishili Petili kava kula, valayisha vandu vavili vamuyegheli unjagila, “Lopukeshi ukotoo kuhava!”
44009039	Petili kawuka kayilongosha na veni, pakafikili vamuyegha kuchumba cha mumbindi, vangalimlyangu vosi vawolukili pabehi yaki, vakalileyi na kumulangusha mihabiti na yingwa shasonili Dokasi chipindi paveli mnofu.
44009040	Petili kavafumisha panji vosi, katundama, kamdadava Chapanga, pambeli kaselela kuchikongu, kadeta, “Tabita yimuki.” Mweni kafumbula mesu vaki, amuwonili Petili kayimuka kayikala.
44009041	Kamkamula liwoku kawoloka, pambeli kavakema vamjumilili Yesu na vangalimlyangu kamuvika pawulongolu yawu, kava munofu.
44009042	Milandu ayi yamanyikili mumbwani yosi ya Yopa, vandu vatangalili vamujumilili Bambu.
44009043	Topi, Petili ayikalili Yopa majuva vatangalili, kayaki mundu yumu, litawa lyaki Simoni, yagolagha findu fya ngwembi.
44010001	Kula Kayisalia pavelili mundu yumu, litawa lyaki Kolineli, mkomi wa machonda va Italiya yivayikemili, “Kombaniya ya Vaitalia.”
44010002	Avelili mundu msangi, mweni na nyumba yaki yosi, akovekelagha Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa avelili akuvatanga vagaju na kumudadavila Chapanga majuva vosi.
44010003	Yavelili pamusi saa tisa, Chapanga amlangushili palola ngatu hela, makungu wa Chapanga, kamuyisila kumuwombela, “Kolineli!”
44010004	Kolineli kamulolesha nesu makungu ayu kwa lyova, kadeta, “Kuna liki Bambu?” Makungu kamuyangula, “Chapanga kasiyanga dadavu shaku na fupu wala dakuvasiwi ng'odu.
44010005	Hinapawu, valayishi vandu Yopa, vakamukemi Simoni, litawa lyaki lingi Petili.
44010006	Mweni muhenja wa mundu yumu, litawa lyaki Simoni, mugola chichuku sha ngwembi, nyumba yaki ya muluwongu ya bahali.”
44010007	Yula makungu akaywangeyi nayu pawukili kala, Kolineli avakemili vagolafichuku vaki vavili va munyumba na machonda yumu yamumanyili Chapanga.
44010008	Pavawombilili kala findu fyosi fifumbukili, kavalayisha vayendi Yopa.
44010009	Chilawu yaki, pavaveghi mumwanja pabehi na mumbwani, Petili akwenili kulipaghali, kadadava kwa Chapanga, lijuva lyaveli palundosi.
44010010	Njala yamutamili, akadayileyi chindu cha kulya, pavaveghi vakumutelekela, kashulula,
44010011	awonili kumbindi kufuwuka, chisunuka kucha yingwa ngomi, yikusunushwa pasi yikamuliwa na mbembi shaki mchechi.
44010012	Mugati yaki mwavelili vang'ongolu vosi vaveli na mawulu, vala vakwava na vambongu vawuluka kululanga.
44010013	Pambeli kapikana lishu limlongela, “Petili tandamuki, kawulayi wulyi.”
44010014	Lakini Petili kadeta, “Ng'odu Bambu! Ngali hela kulya chindu chiveli cha wafu.”
44010015	Lishu limuwombela kandi lideta, “Fyang'alishili Chapanga, kotoo kufikema fyawafu.”
44010016	Chindu achi chiyeleka mala ndatu, pambeli yila yingwa yiwuya kumbindi.
44010017	Petili aveli akunyumanyuma akwipwelesha mumunda yaki, milotu ayi ayiwonili yina mana liki, vala vandu avalayilili Kolineli, vakakonyesheleyi nyumba ya Simoni vawolukili pawulongolu ya mlyangu.
44010018	Vakakemeyi panji kwa lishu likomi, “Kwaveli mhenja litawa lyaki Simoni Petili, akwikala amu?”
44010019	Petili aveli akwihola chila chalangushilwi na Chapanga, Mfuki Mng'alili kamuwombela, “Pikani! Pavaveli vandu vatatu vakukusaka.
44010020	Ulopukeshi, usunuki uwuki pamu na veni, kotoo kuva na hoshu, nenga ndivalayisha.”
44010021	Petili kasunuka pasi, kavawombela vandu vala, “Yumumsaka nengapa. Muyisa muyilata liki?”
44010022	Veni vayangula, “Kolineli mkomi wa machonda katulayisha, vamuwombela mundu yaveli goleki yamujumila Chapanga, mweni mundu msangi kupita vandu vosi va mlima wa Vayawudi. Makungu kamuwombela atulayishi tuyisi tukuwombeli uyendi kayaki, apikanishi filongu fyaku dawumuwombeli.”
44010023	Petili kavalibushila munyumba vavi vahenja vaki vawonja pala. Chilawu yaki kawuka na vala pamu na vandu vamonga vamujumilili Bambu vayikalaya Yopa vamukovekelili.
44010024	Chilawu yaki vafikili Kayisalia. Kolineli avelili akumvetela Petili aveli na valongu mundu na vaghanja vaki va pabehi yivalalikili.
44010025	Petili payingileyi, Kolineli afumili panji kumuyanga, kamutundamila na kamugondamila Petili mbaka pasi.
44010026	Petili kamutandamusha, kadeta, “Woloki, nenga mundu hela kucha yuwi.”
44010027	Pakawombeyi nayu kunu vakwingila munyumba, kaliwona lipinga likomi lya vandu vayikungasha pamu.
44010028	Petili kavawombela, “Yumwi mumanya nendu mwiku kwa Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa mundu yavelili Muyawudi kuyihasha awu kuyityangila na vandu va milima yingi. Lakini Chapanga kanangusha ngotoo kumukema mundu yoyosi yapiyalili awu wa wafu.
44010029	Kwa nongwa ayi, pamungemili jumila nyisa ngajila kususuvila, topi nguvadasha, chimungemilili nenga chindu liki?”
44010030	Kolineli kadeta, “Majuva matatu vapitili, chipindi kucha achi, cha saa tisa mbungamihi, padadaveyi kwa Chapanga munyumba yangu, melili nimwona mundu kawoloka pawulongolu pangu, avelili na yingwa sing'alili.
44010031	Kadeta, ‘Kolineli! Chapanga kapikanisha pawudadava na fupu shaku dasivasuvi ng'odu.
44010032	Valayishi vandu vayendi Yopa, vakamukemi Simoni Petili, akwikalagha mukaya ya Simoni mugola chichuku sha ngwembi yayikala muluwongu ya bahali.’
44010033	Tepu, ndivalayisha vandu kwa yuwi, kugola nyanyi kwisa. Hinapawu twawosi twabaha pawulongolu ya Chapanga tukupikanisha filongu fyosi fyakulamulili Bambu.”
44010034	Petili akandili kudeta, “Nakaka ponopa manya Chapanga kavahela lushawu.
44010035	Mundu yoyosi yamjuma Chapanga na yaveli goleki, dajumiliwi na mweni.
44010036	Chilongu achi chavayeghilili vana va Isilaeli kulandula Chilongu cha Nyanyi yichiyegha kusika kwa deha ya Yesu Kilistu ndi Bambu wa vonda.
44010037	Yumwi chindu achi muchimanya, chikwila mlima wosi wa Yudeya, kukandila Galilaya, unjagila walandulili kala Yohani Mbatisha.
44010038	Milandu ya Yesu wa Nasaleti, Chapanga amushawulili amumemishili Mfuki Mng'alili na liwovi. Mweni kayenda kosi, pagola chichuku cha nyanyi kavalowola vosi yivaveli muliwovi lya Lijangavandu. Nongwa Chapanga aveli pamu na mweni.
44010039	Yufwi vatovilela va milandu yosi yagolili mumlima wa Uyawudi na Yelusalemu vamuwulaghili na kumutumbika mlupingika.
44010040	Chapanga amushukushili mulijuva lya tatu tangila pasovili na kumugola awoneki,
44010041	kwa vandu vonda ha, ila kwa vatovilela yivashawuliwili kala na Chapanga, yufwi yina, tulya na tulanda pamu na mweni pashukukili kufuma munjifwa.
44010042	Katulayisha tuvalandulili vandu, pavawombela kucha Chapanga amshawulili Yesu kuvahigha yivaveli vanofu na yivasovili.
44010043	Vambuyi va Chapanga vosi vakumuywangila, kucha mundu yoyosi yamujumila, kwa liwovi lya litawa lyaki dawushiwi sambi.”
44010044	Petili paghaveyi akali akudeta filongu afi, Chapanga kavasunushila Mfuki Mng'alili vandu vonda yivapikanisheyi unjagila waki.
44010045	Vayawudi vajumilili yivayisili na Petili kufuma Yopa vajinga kuwona wuwula wula Chapanga kavamemesha vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi Mfuki Mng'alili.
44010046	Nongwa vavapikanishili pavadeta ndambu yingajila kumanyika na kumujuma Chapanga. Petili kadasha,
44010047	“Vandu yivamupokilili Mfuki Mng'alili kucha yufwi, ghani daweshi kuvakanisha ava vakotoo kabatishiwa kwa machi?.”
44010048	Kalayisha vabatishiwi kwa litawa lya Yesu Kilistu. Pambeli vamuluvili Petili ayikali nawu kwa majuva madokwa.
44011001	Vandundami na valongu vavelili Yudeya vapikanili kucha vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi na veni vachiyangili chilongu cha Chapanga.
44011002	Topi, Petili pawuyili Yelusalemu, Vayawudi vamjumilili vakadayileyi vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi vayingishiwi jandu,
44011003	vakadeteyi, “Yuwi vayendili kuyikala kwa vandu vangajila jandu na kulya na veni!”
44011004	Petili akandili kuvawombela kwa chiganu chindu chigolikili kufumila pa kwandi,
44011005	“Lijuva limu pandimudadavila Chapanga mbwani ya Yopa, ng'ona milotu, chindu kucha yingwa ngomi yiveli na mbembi mchechi yikusunushiwa kufuma kumbindi yiwoloka pawulongolu yangu.
44011006	Panolili chindu chila mugati nivawona vang'ongolu va mkaya vaveli na mawulu mchechi na vang'ongolu va mudasi, vala vakwava na vambongu va kululanga.
44011007	Pambeli mbikanila lishu likung'ombela, ‘Petili toli, uyendi ukavasinji, wuvalyi.’
44011008	Lakini nenga nyangula, ‘Ng'odu Bambu! Mana chindu chamwiku awu chawafu chiweshi ng'odu kuyingila mumulomu wangu.’
44011009	Lishu lila lyanyangulili kandi kufuma kumbindi, ‘Fyawumbili Chapanga kafigola fing'alili kotoo kufikema findu fyawafu.’
44011010	Chindu achi chigoleka myanja mitatu, pambeli findu fyosi fibikuliwa kandi kumbindi.
44011011	Tepu, vandu vatatu vayisili pawulongolu ya nyumba yindiyikaleyi, valayishwa kufuma Kayisalia vayisi kwa nenga.
44011012	Mfuki Mng'alili kang'ombela nyendi na veni, ngotoo kuva na hoshu. Valongu ava sita yivajumilili tuyilongosha pamu kuyenda Kaisalea tuyingila munyumba ya Kolineli.
44011013	Mweni katuwombela ndambu amuwonili makungu yawolukili panyumba yaki na kumuwombela, ‘Valayishi vandu vayendi Yopa vakamukemi Simoni, litawa lyaki lingi Petili.
44011014	Dakuwombeli filongu fyeni dafikulowoli yuwi na vandu vosi va kayaku.’
44011015	Pangandeyi kudeta, Mfuki Mng'alili kavasunukila kucha patusunukilili yufwi pa kwandi.
44011016	Ngumbuka chilongu chadetili Bambu, ndambu adetili, ‘Yohani Mbatisha abatishili kwa machi, lakini yumwi damubatishwi kwa Mfuki Mng'alili.’
44011017	Mani Chapanga kavapa veni fupu yiyila yila kucha yatugayilili yufwi patumujumila Bambu Yesu Kilistu, nenga ghani mbaka nyesi kumulimba Chapanga?”
44011018	Pavapikanishili filongu afi valeka kulimba vamujuma Chapanga, pavadeta, “Chapanga kavatanga Vangutungu vapomeli na vapati unofu!”
44011019	Vala yivajumilili chipindi achi vapwililikili kwanongwa ya kugoboliwa na kuwulayiwa kwa Stefwani, vayendili mbaka Foiniki na Kupilu na Antiyokiya, pavalandula unjagila wula kwa Vayawudi weka hela.
44011020	Lakini yivajumilili vamonga vaveli vandu vafumili Kupilu na Kileni, veni pavafikili Antiyokiya valandulili Chilongu cha Nyanyi cha Bambu Yesu kwa vangutungu.
44011021	Liwoku lya Bambu lyaveli pamu na veni, vandu vatangalili nendu vamujumilili na kumughalambukila Bambu.
44011022	Milandu ayi yapikanikili kwa lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu aku Yelusalemu, vamulayishili Banabasi ayendi mbaka Antiyokiya.
44011023	Pafikili kula awuwonili usangi wa Chapanga asekililili, avakuvilishili vandu vosi vayikali muujumilwa wa Bambu kwa ndima shawu shosi.
44011024	Banabasi aveli mundu msangi yamemili Mfuki Mng'alili na ujumilwa na vandu vatangalili vayongisheka na kumuwuyila Bambu.
44011025	Pambeli, Banabasi kayenda Talisu kumusaka Sauli,
44011026	Pamuwonili kala kamuyegha Antiyokiya, vosi vavili kwa chipindi cha mwaka vayikalili pamu na lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu kunyumba ya Chapanga na pavawula lipinga likomi lya vandu. Kula Antiyokiya vavelili vandundami va kwaa kukanda kuvakema Vakilistu.
44011027	Vayisili vambuyi vamu va Chapanga yivafumili Yelusalemu kuyenda Antiyokiya.
44011028	Muyawu yumu litawa lyaki Agabasi, awolukili kadeta kwa Mfuki Mng'alili kucha dayiyisi njala ngomi mlima wosi awu. Yeni dayiyisi chipindi cha wutwa wa Kilawudiu.
44011029	Vala vandundami, kila mundu ndambu yaweshili, avatangili vala yivamjumilili Kilistu yivayikaleyi Yudeya.
44011030	Vagolili nawula, pambeli, vavayeghilili mbiya vagogolu va vandu va Chapanga kwa mawoku va Banabasi na Sauli.
44012001	Chipindi chichi, mutwa Helodi akandili kuvagobola lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu.
44012002	Amuwulaghili Yakobi, mlongu waki Yohani kwa limayi likomi.
44012003	Paawonili kavanowesha Vayawudi, kayenda kandi akamukamuli Petili. Majuva vala vavelili majuva va mibumunda.
44012004	Pavamukamulili kala, kamuvika muchijaka kamtaya mumawoku va fipinga mchechi fya machonda mchechi mchechi vamuloleli, Helodi akadayileyi chipindi cha Lihungu pachipita amfumishi na kumuhigha pawulongolu pa vandu.
44012005	Petili vamuvikili muchijaka, lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu vadadavili kwa Chapanga kwanongwa yaki kwa chiganu.
44012006	Chipindi Helodi padayileyi kumfumisha, pamii Petili avelili kawonja pagati ya machonda vavili, kawopiwa mingongola mivili ya chuma na machonda vamloleleyi pavayipokela pawulongulu ya chijaka.
44012007	Tepu makungu wa Bambu awolukili pala, lwengi lung'alika chumba chila, kamgufya Petili, pamuyimusha, padeta, “Ulopukeshi! Tandamuki!” Mingongola ya mumawoku yawopusokili.
44012008	Makungu kamuwombela, “Uyiwopi lufunga, ufwali mikobasi yaku.” Petili agolili wuwula, makungu kadeta, “Fwali yingwa yaku ungovikeli.”
44012009	Petili amkovikelili makungu kufuma muchijaka, ngajila kumanya ndambu yagola makungu nakaka awu akulota hela.
44012010	Pavampitili mdima wa kwaa na wa pili, pambeli mlyangu wa chuma wa kuyingilila mumbwani, wafuukili weni. Vafuma panji, vapita deha yimu, tepu makungu kamuleka Petili.
44012011	Petili luhala palumuwuyilili, kadeta “Hinapawu manya nakaka kucha Chapanga amuyeghili makungu waki, kung'usha mumawoku va Helodi na Chila vakashuvilileyi mlima va Vayawudi.”
44012012	Pamanyili afi afikili kaya ya Maliya, mamundu Yohani Maliku, vandu vatangalili vavelili vatangana amu pavadadava kwa Chapanga.
44012013	Petili akutili mulyangu, mgolafichuku wawu litawa lyaki Loda, ayisili kumpikanisha.
44012014	Pakamanyili lishu lila lya Petili, kwa cheleli kufuwula ha mlyangu, katuva mbilu kuyingila mugati kuvawombela kucha Petili kawoloka pamulyangu panji.
44012015	Vamuwombela, “Kuna lukwali!” Lakini mweni ayendilili kudeta nakaka. Topi veni vadeta, “Ayu makungu waki.”
44012016	Petili kayendelela kukuta pamlyangu, pambeli vamufuwulila, vamuwona mweni, vayikanganikili.
44012017	Kavakupisha liwoku vanyamali, kavahimulila ndambu Bambu amufumishili muchijaka. Awombili, “Mukamuwombeli Yakobi na vala valongu filongu afi.” Pambeli afumili ayendili kwingi.
44012018	Pamalavila machonda vayishoshili, kucha chindu liki chimupatili Petili?
44012019	Helodi avalayishili machonda vamsaki lakini vamuwona ha, avawombilili machonda, pavamuwona ng'odu alayilili vawulayiwi. Pambeli Helodi afumili Yudeya kayenda Kayisalia ayikalili aku padokwa.
44012020	Helodi kavakalalila nesu vandu va Tilu na Sidoni, vamuyendela mweni. Vagola lighanja na Blastu, mweni aveli mlolela wa nyumba ya mutwa, veni vayendili kwa Helodi kuluva kuvi na kusika, kwanongwa mlima wawu wapatili filivi kufuma mlima wa mutwa.
44012021	Lijuva limu vayishawulili, Helodi afwalili yingwa sha wutwa, ayikalili muchigoda cha wutwa, akavalandulileyi vandu.
44012022	Vandu vakavikeyi umatu, vakadeteyi, “Ali lishu lya mundu ha, lya Chapanga!”
44012023	Tepu makungu wa Bambu kamuwisha Helodi pasi, kwanongwa kamtundamila ha Chapanga, wambi vamulya Helodi, kasova.
44012024	Chipindi achi chilongu cha Chapanga chiyendelela kukwila na kukula.
44012025	Banabasi na Sauli, pavamalilili kala kulandula, vawuyili Yelusalemu, vamtola Yohani yivamkemili Maliku.
44013001	Lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu lya aku Antiyokiya munyumba ya Chapanga kwaveli na vambuyi na vawula, vamu vaveli, Banabasi na Simoni yivamkema Mtitu na Lukiu Mkileni na Manaeni ayikalili kwa Helodi kandi kwavelili na Sauli.
44013002	Pavamdadavileyi Bambu na kuyikaja kulya, Mfuki Mng'alili kadeta, “Mubawulili Banabasi na Sauli vavi na nenga mungimbaniku yila yindivakemilili.”
44013003	Pavamalili kuyikaja kulya na kudadava, vavavikila mawoku, vavaleka vayendi.
44013004	Mfuki Mng'alili avayeghili vandu ava vaselikilili mumbwani ya Seleukia, kufuma aku vapitili mubahali mbaka liwunguli lya Kupilu.
44013005	Pavaveghi Salami valandulili chilongu cha Chapanga munyumba sha kudadavila sha Vayawudi, veni vaveli pamu na Yohani Maliku avatangili mungimbaniku.
44013006	Pavapitili kala pagati ya lihunguli lyosi mbaka Pafu, vamuwonili mundu yumu muhavi Muyawudi yakemiwa Baliyesu, mbuyi wa udesi,
44013007	Mundu ayu avelili pamu na mkomi wa lila liwunguli Segiu Pauli, mundu yaveli na luhala munu. Mweni avakemili Banabasi na Sauli vayendi kayaki, akadayileyi kupikanisha chilongu cha Chapanga.
44013008	Lakini yula Elima, mhavi kucha wuvakemiwa kwa Chigiliki, akayesheyi kuvalimba kumugola ayu mkomi wa liwunguli akotoo kuujumila Ukilistu.
44013009	Topi, Sauli yivamkemeyi wuwula Pauli, amemili Mfuki Mng'alili, amufulutulili mesu muhavi.
44013010	Kawomba, “Yuwi mwana wa Lijangavandu. Yiumemili wafu wosi. Yuwi chimdwama wa chindu chiveli cha nakaka, kuva mjangi mudeha sha Bambu siholukili?
44013011	Loli, liwoku lya Bambu dalikwisili ponopa, dawuvi ngalimesu na ukotoo kuliwona lijuva kwa chipindi.” Tepu, mesu va Elima vayingila lwisa, kashengeta shengeta akusaka mundu wa kumukamula liwoku na kumulongosha.
44013012	Yula mkomi, pawonili figolikili, kajumila, akajingeyi mawuli va Bambu.
44013013	Pambeli Pauli na vamonga vawuka kwa watu mbaka Pafu, vafika Pagi, mbwani ya Pamfilia. Yohani Maliku kavaleka kawuya Yelusalemu.
44013014	Lakini veni vawukili Pagi, vafikili Antiyokiya, mbwani ya Pisidia, Lijuva lya Kupumulila vayendili munyumba ya kudadavila, vayikala.
44013015	Pambeli, pavasomili kala Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa na mumayandiku va vambuyi, vakomi va nyumba ya kudadavila valayilili mundu kayawu na kuvawombela, “Valongu, kucha pamuva na chindu cha nyanyi kuvawombela vandu ava, mudeti.”
44013016	Pauli kawoloka, kapunga liwoku, kadeta, “Yumwi valulumi Vayisilaeli na yumwi mumjumila Chapanga, mpikanishi.
44013017	Chapanga wa Vayisilaeli, avashawulili vagogolu venu yivasovili, avagoli vavi mlima mkomi, pavaveghi vakwikala kucha vahenja mlima wa Misili, kwa liwovi lyaki avawushili, kavalongosha.
44013018	Kwa chipindi cha myaka kucha milongu mchechi avayiwunishilili kucheja.
44013019	Payanangili kala makabila saba va Kanaani kavagayila wuvi mlima wawu wa mbala.
44013020	Kwa chipindi cha myaka miya mchechi na milongu muhanu, Chapanga avagayilili valamula wutwa mbaka chipindi cha mbuyi wa Chapanga Samweli.
44013021	“Pambeli valuva avagayili mutwa, Chapanga kavapa Sauli mwana wa Kisi, mundu wa kabila la Benjamini, kwa chipindi cha myaka milongu mchechi.
44013022	Pamuwushili kala Sauli, amugolili Dawudi ghavi mutwa wawu. Chapanga awombili, ndimuwona Dawudi mwana wa Yesi, ndi mundu yanowiliwa na ndima yangu, dagoli fyosi fidayilili kugola nenga.
44013023	Kufuma lukolu lwa Dawudi, Chapanga ngimu avajangili, kavayeghela Mlowola wa Isilaeli ayu ndi Yesu.
44013024	Yesu paghaveyi akalihela kwisa, Yohani Mbatisha alandulili kala kwa vandu vosi va Isilaeli filongu fya ubatishu wa kupomela.
44013025	Yohani mbatisha paghaveyi akumalila chichuku chaki, adetili, ‘Mukucha nenga ndi mkombola? Nenga ng'odu mumuveteli. Mumbikanishi! Mweni dayisi kumbeli ya nenga, nenga ngujakwa ha hata kuwopola ng'oyi sha mikobasi yaki.’
44013026	“Valongu vangu, va lukolu lwa Ibulahimu, pamu na ava vayenu muveli nawu vamjumilili Chapanga, unjagila wa kulowoka ufika kwa yufwi.
44013027	Vandu yivayikala Yelusalemu na vakomi vawu, vamumanyili ng'odu Yesu mkombola, wala filongu fya vambuyi fyavasoma Majuva va Kupumulila, hata naha vatolili filongu fya vambuyi figoleki nakaka kwanongwa ya kumuhigha.
44013028	Pavapotili nongwa ya kumuwulaghila, vamuluvili Pilatu amuhighi njifwa.
44013029	Pavagolili fyosi fimuyilatili mweni kufuma Mumayandiku, vamusunusha kufuma mulupingika, vamuvika kusembi.
44013030	Lakini Chapanga amushukushili munjifwa,
44013031	kwa majuva vatangalili ayilangushili kwa vala vayendili pamu na mweni kufuma Galilaya kuyenda Yelusalemu, ava ndi vatovilela vaki kwa vandu va Isilaeli.
44013032	Na yufwi tuyisa kuvayeghela chilongu cha nyanyi, chilongu chila Chapanga avajangili vambuyi vetu yivasovili.
44013033	Chapanga katugolela chavalayili vambuyi vetu yufwi vaisukulu vawu, kwa kumshukusha Yesu kufuma munjifwa. Ngimu iyandikilwi Mulumbombu lwa Pili, ‘Yuwi mwana wangu, nenga lelu ndiva Tati waku.’
44013034	Kandi mumilandu ya kumshukusha munjifwa, akotoo kuwuya na kuuleka mvili uwoli musembi, Chapanga awombili naha, ‘Damunyimbi nemusi sing'alili na sha nakaka shindimujangili Dawudi.’
44013035	Mahali pamonga Mulumbombu pakuwomba, ‘Chapanga dawumleki ng'odu Mng'alili waku awoli.’
44013036	Lakini ayu aveli Dawudi ha yamalilili chadayilili Chapanga chipindi cha unofu waki, pambeli asovili, vamusikili pabehi na vagogolu vaki yivasovili, mvili waki wa wolili musembi.
44013037	Lakini yula, Chapanga yamushukushili munjifwa kawola ng'odu.
44013038	Topi, valongu vangu mumanyi, kucha kwa njila ya Yesu unjagila wa kupomiliwa sambi ukulanduliwa kwa yumwi.
44013039	Kila mundu yamjumila Yesu kavahela nongwa. Na nongwa yaku yingahighiwili ha kwa ugoleki wa Chapanga vamupili Musa.
44013040	Topi, muyivavali na milandu yivadetili vambuyi yikotoo kuvafumbukila yumwi.
44013041	Vambuyi vadetili, ‘Mupikanishi, yumwi yimuvelili na mbedalu, mujingi muyaghamili! Kwanongwa chigola panopawu chipindi cha yumwi, chindu cheni damukijumili ng'odu hata mundu pakavawombela.’ ”
44013042	Pauli na Banabasi pavafumeyi, munyumba ya Chapanga, vandu vavaluva vayisi kandi Lijuva lya Kupumulila lingi vavawombeli milandu ayi.
44013043	Likungashu lila palipelili, Vayawudi na vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi vatangalili vavelili vakukovikela deha ya kumkovikela Chapanga ya Chiyawudi vavakovikelili Pauli na Banabasi. Vandundami vaywangili na veni, vavakuvilishili vayendeleli kuyikala pavayidumba usangi wa Chapanga.
44013044	Hata Lijuva lya Kupumulila liyisili, vandu vatangalili va mumbwani yosi vayikungashili kupikanisha chilongu cha Bambu.
44013045	Vayawudi pavawonili vandu vayikungasha, vamemili weyi, vafibedala filongu fyadetili Pauli na kumujowola.
44013046	Pauli na Banabasi vawombili kwa chiganu nendu vadeta, “Chilongu cha Chapanga chivi kwa yumwi tanila, lakini kwanongwa mwihigha mwaveni na mukudayiliwa kwikala jola, tukuvaleka tukuyenda kwa vandu va milima yingi.
44013047	Kwa nongwa ayi Bambu katulayila naha, ‘Ngukuvika wuvi lwengi lwa milima, uvayegheli vandu va milima yosi ulowolu.’ ”
44013048	Vandu va milima yingi vasekilelili pavapikanishili chilongu chila, vajuma pavadeta, “Unjagila wa Bambu mnofu,” na vala yivavelili vashawuliwa kupata unofu wa jola, vamjumila Chapanga.
44013049	Chilongu cha Bambu chikwila pala posi.
44013050	Lakini Vayawudi vavatumishila vadadala vatawukili va milima yingi yivamumanyili Chapanga na valulumi vatawukili va mbwani ayi. Vakandili kuvagobola Pauli na Banabasi, vavavinga kuvayikaleyi.
44013051	Veni vavapundila lifu livelili mumawulu vawu kucha kuvakayika pambeli vayenda Ikoniu.
44013052	Lakini vandundami yivavelili vamema cheleli na Mfuki Mng'alili.
44014001	Kula Ikoniu, milandu yavelili kucha kula Antiyokiya, Pauli na Banabasi vayendili munyumba ya kudadavila kwa Vayawudi vadetili kwa kugangamala mbaka Vayawudi na Vagiliki vajumila.
44014002	Lakini Vayawudi vamonga vangajila kujumila vavajongishela na kuvagola vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi vaghalambuki kufuma vandu yivajumilili.
44014003	Pauli na Banabasi vayikalili nesu, vakadeteyi kwa chiganu chilongu cha Bambu na Bambu alangushili unakaka wa usangi waki kwa kuvagayila liwovi lya kugola mihilu na mihilu.
44014004	Lakini vandu va mumbwani vabavikili, vamu vavelili mwambu wa Vayawudi na vamu mwambu wa vandundami.
44014005	Pambeli, vandu vamonga va milima yingi na Vayawudi, pamu na vakomi vawu, vayilatili kuvagolela wafu vandundami na kuvaguma migonguveli.
44014006	Vandundami pavamanyili chindu achi, vatuvilili Lusta na Debi mbwani sha Lukaonia na milima ya pabehi,
44014007	aku vavelili vakulandula chilongu cha nyanyi.
44014008	Kwavelili mundu yumu aku Lusta kufumila awoneki aveli ndevindevi, akali hela kuyendayenda.
44014009	Mundu ayu ayikalili pampikana Pauli yalanduleyi. Pauli amlolili kwa chiganu, kamuwona kana ujumilwa akuwesha kulowoka,
44014010	kalandula, “Woloki kwa mawulu vaku!” Yula mundu ndevindevi tepu katandamuka, akandili kuyendayenda.
44014011	Lipinga lya vandu pavawonili chagolili Pauli, vakandili kuvika umatu kwa kabila lya Chilukaonia, “Vamulungu vatusunukila kucha vandu.”
44014012	Vamkema Banabasi Zeu na vamkemili Pauli Helimesi, kwanongwa mweni aveli mlandula mkomi.
44014013	Mtambika wa nyumba ya kudadavila ya chapanga Zeu awolukili panji ya mbwani, ayeghili likambaku lya senga na uluva pamlyangu wa kuyingilila mbwani, mweni pamu na lipinga lila lya vandu vakadayileyi vavatambikili Pauli na Banabasi.
44014014	Lakini vandundami Banabasi na Pauli, pavapikanishili milandu ayi, vademula yingwa shawu, vayenda mbilu vayingilili mulipinga lya vandu, padeta kwa lishu likomi,
44014015	“Wuli mwabambu mukugola afi? Yufwi tuva vandu kucha yumwi! Tukuvalandulila filongu fya nyanyi, ili mughalambuki na kuyileka milandu ayi ya wafu na mumghalambukili Chapanga yaveli munofu, yagolili kumbindi na pasi bahali na findu fyosi fivelili.
44014016	Pakwandi Chapanga avalekili vandu vagoli chila chivadayila veni.
44014017	Hata naha, Chapanga avalekili ng'odu kuyilangusha kwa kuvagolela findu fya nyanyi, kuvatonyela ndonya kufuma kumbindi na kuvagayila filivi mufitava kwa chipindi chichila, akuvayikutisha filivi na kuvagayila cheleli.”
44014018	Kwa filongu afi vavelili na chipindi chibalamili kuvakanisha vandu, vakotoo kuvatambikila.
44014019	Vayawudi vamu vayisili kufuma Ikoniu na Antiyokiya mumlima wa Pisidia vavajongishela vandu vayihashi pamu na veni, vamuguma migonguveli Pauli na kumukuluwula mbaka panji ya mbwani vakacheyi kasova kala.
44014020	Lakini vandundami pavayikungashili na kumshengetela pambeli atandamukili, chilawu yaki kawuya kumbwani, mweni na Banabasi vayendili Debi.
44014021	Pauli na Banabasi pavalandulili kala filongu fya nyanyi aku Debi na vandu vatangalili vamjumilili Chapanga. Pambeli vawuyila Lusta na kutyangila Ikoniu pavayenda Antiyokiya yiveli Pisidia.
44014022	Vavagolili vakamali vala vanachuli vala va mlima wula kandi vavataya munda vayikali muujumilwa wawu. Vavawulili, “Lasima tupitili mugoboleku sitangalili pambeli tuyingili muwutwa wa kumbindi kwa Chapanga.”
44014023	Vashawulili vavaha kila mu lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu, kwa kudadava na kwikaja kulya, vavavika mumawoku va Bambu yivamjumilili.
44014024	Pavapitili mlima wa Pasidia, vafikili Pamfilia.
44014025	Pavalandulili unjagila wula kula Pagi, pambeli vayenda Atalia.
44014026	Kufuma aku vawuyili Antiyokiya muwatu pala pakwandi pavanemiliwi usangi wa Chapanga kwanongwa ya chichuku, chivamalilili kala.
44014027	Pavafikili aku Antiyokiya vagolili likungashu lya lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu pala, vavawombilili milandu yagolili Chapanga pamu na veni na ndambu avafuwulili vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi kuyingila muujumilwa.
44014028	Vayikalili chipindi chitali pamu na vala vandundami Chapanga.
44015001	Topi, vandu vamonga vasunukili kufuma Yudeya kuyenda Antiyokiya vakandili kuvawula vala yivajumilili pavadeta, “Pamuyingila ng'odu jandu kucha Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa yivavadayila, muweshi ha kulowuliwa.”
44015002	Chindu achi chayeghili malimbanu makomi, Pauli na Banabasi vaywangili nawu, vavalayila Pauli na Banabasi pamu na vandu vamu yivajumilili va yila nyumba ya kudadavila ya Antiyokiya vayendi Yelusalemu kavalola vandundami na vagogolu yivayilatili chilongu achi.
44015003	Topi, lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu lyavatawulili, na veni pavaveghi vakupita Foiniki na Samaliya vavahimulili vandu ndambu vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi pavamughalambukilili Chapanga. Filongu fila fyavagayilili cheleli vosi yivamjumilili.
44015004	Pavafikili Yelusalemu vayangiwa na lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu na vandundami na vagogolu, veni vavawombilili findu fyosi Chapanga fyavavagolilili veni.
44015005	Lakini yivajumilili vamu vavelili va chipinga cha Vafwalisayu vawolukili, pavadeta, “Vangutungu lasima vayingili jandu na kuvawombela vakombikeshi Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa.”
44015006	Topi, vandundami na vavaha vatanganikili kwa chindu achi.
44015007	Pavalimbanili nendu, Petili awolukili, kadeta, “Valongu vangu, yumwi mumanya kucha dahili Chapanga ashawulili nenga gati ya yumwi kulandula Filongu fya Nyanyi kwa vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi, vaweshi kupikana na kujumila.
44015008	Mweni Chapanga yamanyili chivayihola kila mundu, avagayilili Mfuki Mng'alili vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi ili vajumili nakaka kucha watugayilili yufwi.
44015009	Aveli kavahela lushawu gati ya yufwi na veni vang'alishili ndima shawu kwanongwa vamjumilili Yesu.
44015010	Topi, nongwa liki kumuyesha Chapanga nongwa liki mukuvapapisha vandundami misiwu misitu hata vagogolu vetu, vaweshili ng'odu kupapa misiwu ayi?
44015011	Yikotoo kuva naha, tujumila, yufwi datulowuliwi kwa usangi wa Yesu kucha veni.”
44015012	Chipinga chosi chanyamalili jii, chikavapikanisheyi Banabasi na Pauli pavahimulila mihilu na mihilu Chapanga fyagolili vandu kupitila veni kwa vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi.
44015013	Pavamalili kudeta, Yakobi akandili kudeta, “Valongu vangu, mumbikanishi!
44015014	Simoni ahimulili ndambu Chapanga dahili wavagolilili vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi, avatolili vandu kufuma veni vavi va mweni.
44015015	Chilongu achi chiva ngimu filongu fya vambuyi, kucha mayandiku vang'alili wuvadeta,
44015016	‘Pafipela filongu afi dang'uyi, na kugola libudi lya Dawudi ndiliwoloshi kandi, dagoleshi pabowuyokili ndipagoli kandi na kuugola udindali kandi.
44015017	Apa vandu va makabila vosi davayisi kwa nenga, vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi vosi vandivakemili vavi va nenga, davamkovikeli Bambu.
44015018	Kucha Bambu ndambu wadeta, agolili chilongu achi chimanyiki kufuma pakwandi.’ ”
44015019	Yakobi kayendelela kudeta, “Mukotoo kuvagobola vandu vangajila kuva Vayawudi yivamughalambukilili Chapanga.
44015020	Ila tuvayegheli baluwa kuvawombela vakotoo kulya filivi fya wafu fivatambikilili milungu wa ming'omung'omu, vayilyepi na uwoni, vakotoo kulya vang'ongolu vaveli fibudu na vakotoo kulanda mwasi.
44015021	Nongwa kwa chipindi chitali Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa vavelili vakusomiwa munyumba sha kudadavila shosi majuva va kupumulila vosi na filongu fyaki filanduliwa mumbwani shosi.”
44015022	Vandundami, vavaha na lipinga lya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu lyonda valamula pamu mulipinga lyawu kuvalayisha Antiyokiya pamu na Pauli na Banabasi. Topi vamshawula Yuda wuwula vamkemaya Balisaba pamu na Sila. Vavelili vakuhishimiwa nendu na yivajumilili.
44015023	Vavagayila baluwa ayi, “Yufwi vandundami na vavaha, valongu venu, tukuvajambusha yumwi valongu va milima yingi yimuvelili aku Antiyokiya na Siliya pamu na Kilikiya.
44015024	Tupikana kucha vandu vamonga yivafumili kwa yufwi vakuvaghasha na kuvayaghamisha kwa filongu fyawu. Lakini vagolili naha ngajila yufwi kuvajumisha.
44015025	Yufwi tulamula kuvashawula vanjagila na kuvalayisha kwa yumwi valongu venu Banabasi na Pauli,
44015026	veni vajumila kusova kwanongwa ya litawa lya Bambu wetu Yesu Kilistu.
44015027	Kwa nongwa ayi tukuvalayisha Yuda na Sila vayisi kwa yumwi, veni davavawombeli afi fituyandikili.
44015028	Topi Mfuki Mng'alili na yufwi yitumjumilili tukotoo kuvayitwika msiwu nendu ila fila fivelili fitalama:
44015029	mukotoo kulya filivi fitambikiwili ming'omung'omu na mukotoo kulanda mwasi na mukotoo kulya fibudu na muyilyepi na uwoni. Damuvi mkugola nyanyi kucha pamuyilyepa filongu afi. Mwikali nyanyi!”
44015030	Pavayitawulili kala, vala vandundami vayendili Antiyokiya kwavelili likungashu lya vala yivamjumilili Bambu, vavagayila baluwa yila.
44015031	Pavasomili baluwa yila, filongu fyaki sivadindasha ndima, vasekelela nendu.
44015032	Yuda na Sila, vavelili vambuyi, vaywangili na valongu ava kwa chipindi chitali kuva sikisha moyu na kuvadindasha.
44015033	Kwa chipindi chivayikalili kula, valongu va Antiyokiya vavatawula pavaluvila kusika moyu. Pambeli vawuya kwa vala yivavalayishili.
44015034	Lakini Sila awonili ngiba asighali.
44015035	Pauli na Banabasi vayendili kuyikala Antiyokiya pavawula na kulandula chilongu cha Bambu, pamu na vandu vamonga vatangalili.
44015036	Majuva pavapitili Pauli kamuwombela Banabasi, “Tuwuyi tukavatyangili valongu vetu mumbwani shosi situlandulili chilongu cha Bambu, vakuyendilela wuliwuli.”
44015037	Banabasi akadayileyi kumtola Yohani Maliku ghavi pamu na veni,
44015038	ila Pauli awoni nyanyi ng'odu kumtola Yohani Maliku kwanongwa avalekili kula Pamfilia, vayendili pamu ha mungimbaniku.
44015039	Topi valimbanili veni kwa veni mbaka valekana deha. Banabasi amtolili Maliku vayipaka watu vayenda Kupilu.
44015040	Lakini Pauli awukili na Sila, valongu va pala pavadadavilili kala vapati usangi wa Bambu, pambeli kawuka.
44015041	Vapitili Siliya na Kilikiya kunu padindasha mipinga ya vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu.
44016001	Pauli pafikili Debi na Lusta, kwayikaleyi mwanachuli yumu yivamkema Timotewu. Mawu waki aveli Muyawudi, lakini tati mundu Mugiliki.
44016002	Vandu vamjumilili Bambu va Lusta na Ikoniu vamuhimulilili nyanyi Timotewu.
44016003	Pauli amudayilili ayu ayendi nayu, kamtola kamudumula jandu kwanongwa Vayawudi vavelili mwambu wula, nongwa vosi vamanyili kucha tati mundu aveli Mugiliki.
44016004	Topi pavavelili vakupita mumbwani yila, vavagayilili malaghililu vavikili vandundami na vavaha vavelili Yelusalemu, ili vasikamuli.
44016005	Vandu yivamjumilili Kilistu vapatili liwovi kwa ujumilwa wula, vandu vayongishekili kila lijuva.
44016006	Pauli na vayaki vapitili mlima wa Fulugia na Galatiya, Mfuki Mng'alili avakanishili vakotoo kulandula chilongu chila mlima wa Asia.
44016007	Pavafikili kumbaka ya Misia vayeshili kuyenda Betaniya, lakini Mfuki Mng'alili wa Yesu kavajumisha ha.
44016008	Vapitili Misia vasunukila Tiloa.
44016009	Pamihi Pauli alotili milotu, amuwonili mundu yumu wa Makedoniya kawoloka pala akumdedeka kumuwombela, “Jabuki, wisi Makedoniya wututangi.”
44016010	Palotili kala milotu yila, twayitalishili kuyenda Makedoniya pangajila kukelwa kunu patumanya nakaka kucha Chapanga katukema tuvalandulili Chilongu cha Nyanyi.
44016011	Tufuma Tiloa, twayendili kwa watu mbaka Samotilaki na chilawu yaki tufika Neapoli.
44016012	Tufuma Neapoli twafikili Filipi, mbwani ya wilaya ya kwaa ya Makedoniya na wuwula wula vaveli pasi ya wutwa wa Loma. Twayikalili mbwani ayi majuva vautunga.
44016013	Mulijuva lya kupumulila twafumili panji ya mlyangu, tuyenda muluwongu lwa lweni, tukacheyi kuna mahali pa kudadavila Chapanga. Tuyikala, tuywanga na vadadala vatanganikili pala.
44016014	Mdadala yumu, mwenikaya wa Tiatila, litawa lyaki Lidia amujumagha Chapanga, mweni ahemishagha yingwa sitalamili, mweni aveli msangi, kapikana, mundima yaki yifuwuliwa na Bambu, vavika filongu fyawombeyi Pauli.
44016015	Hata pabatishiwi kala, mweni na vandu va munyumba yaki, katuluva, padeta, kucha muhigha ndiva msangi kwa Bambu, muyingili munyumba yangu muyikali. Katung'ang'anika.
44016016	Patuveyi tukuyenda mahali pala pakudadavila, mvanda yumu mhinja yavelili akutunga atuwonili, avelili akuvalondulela valundamali vaki mbiya sitangalili kwa kutunga.
44016017	Muhinja ayu kamukovekela Pauli na yufwi pawuta na kudeta, “Vandu ava ndi ndumindumi wa Chapanga avelili kumbindi, veni davavawuli ndambu ya kulowoka.”
44016018	Agolili nawula kwa kila lijuva. Lakini Pauli yamunyekwili, kamghalambukila mhinja kamuwombela yula chinyamkela, “Ngukulayisha kwa litawa lya Yesu Kilistu, ufumi kwa mundu ayu!” Kamfuma chipindi chichila chila.
44016019	Topi vabambu vaki pavawonili kucha chivashuvilileyi kupata mbiya chipela, vavakamula Pauli na Sila, vavakuluwulila pawelu kwa vakomi va mbwani.
44016020	Vavatola mbaka kwa vahigha milandu, vadeta, “Vandu ava vakugola ndilingu mumbwani yetu na veni Vayawudi.
44016021	Kandi vakuwula milandu yeni kwa yufwi vandu va Loma tukujumishwa ha kusijumila na kusikovekela.”
44016022	Lipinga lya vandu vala vosi vavayendela na vala vahigha milandu vavawopusola yingwa shawu kwa liwovi, valayisha vavalatuli ndomondu.
44016023	Pavalatuwili nendu vavataya muchijaka, vavalayishila machonda va muchijaka vavadimi nesu.
44016024	Kwanongwa ya nayililu yila machonda avavikili muchumbagati cha mugati nendu ya chijaka kavawopa mawulu vawu mumingongola.
44016025	Mandandu Pauli na Sila vavelili vakudadava kwa Chapanga na kusomola mbombu sha kumjuma Chapanga, kunu vawopiwa vamonga vavelili vakuvapikanisha.
44016026	Tepu pavelili na chiyighayigha chikomi, mbaka chikandilu cha chijaka chitikanyika, tepu milyangu yifuwuka na mingongola yilekana.
44016027	Yula mdimi wa chijaka kayimuka, kawona milyangu ya chijaka yifuwuka, akacheyi vala yivawopiwili vosi vatuva, kakwemula chimayi chaki, akadayileyi kwiwulagha.
44016028	Ila Pauli awutili kwa lishu likomi, “Ukotoo kuyiwulaya, twawosi tuva baha.”
44016029	Pamkemili kala mundu ayeghi luliku, yula machonda kajumbila mgati, kunu pabagama kwa lyogha, kavawila pamawulu va Pauli na Sila.
44016030	Pambeli kavayegha panji, kavadasha, “Bambu goli liki ili nowuliwi?”
44016031	Vamuwombela, “Mjumili Bambu Yesu, yuwi dawulowoki pamu na yivaveli munyumba yaku.”
44016032	Vamuwombela chilongu cha Bambu, mweni na vandu vosi yivavelili munyumba yaki.
44016033	Kavalalika chipindi chichila chila, yaveli pamihi, kavawofuwa filonda fyawu, pambeli mweni na vandu va munyumba yaki vabatishiwa chipindi chichila chila.
44016034	Pambeli kavatola Pauli na Sila kayaki, kavagayila filivi. Mweni na valongu vaki vosi vagola lihungu kwanongwa ayi ponopa vava vakumjumila Chapanga.
44016035	Chilawu yaki pamalavila, vahigha vavalayisha vakomi va machonda vawu pavadeta,, “Muvafumishi vandu ava vayiyendeli.”
44016036	Yula mdima chijaka kamuwombela Pauli filongu fila padeta, “Vahigha valayila vandu ili mufuwuliwi, topi ponopa mfumi panji, myiyendeli kwa kusika.”
44016037	Pauli kavawombela, “Kucha chindu liki? Ingava twavelihela mbatiwa, vatulatula ndomondu pawelu kunu yufwi vandu va Loma, pambeli vatutaya muchijaka, ponopa vakudayila kutufumisha kwa chifisu? Ng'odu, vayisi veni vatufumishi.”
44016038	Vakomi va machonda vavawombela vahigha milandu ayi, veni vatilili pavapikanishili kucha vandu va Loma.
44016039	Vayisa kuvaluva vapomeli na pavavafumishili mugati, vavaluvili vafumi mumbwani yila.
44016040	Pauli na Sila vafumili muchijaka, vayendili kaya kwa Lidia. Aku vatanganikili na vakilistu na vavasikisha moyu vayenda.
44017001	Kwa kupitila Amfipoli na Apolonia vafikili Tesaloniki, aku kwavelili nyumba ya kudadavila ya Vayawudi.
44017002	Na Pauli, ayilumbili pamu kucha wuyivelili chishovi, awombanili nawu kwa chipindi cha majuva va kupumulila matatu yivayilongushili, pasoma Mayandiku Vang'alili.
44017003	Ahimulili na kulangusha kucha alatiwili Kilistu kuteshiwa na kushukuka. Kavawombela, “Ayu Yesu yindivalandulila ndi Kilistu.”
44017004	Vamonga vajumilili, vayilongosha na Pauli na Sila na Vagiliki vamumanyili Chapanga, vatangalili nesu na vahumbu vatangalili, vayihasha pamu nawu.
44017005	Lakini Vayawudi vawonili geli, vavatolili lipinga lya vandu kusoku vangali lusungu na vawafu, vagolili ndilingu mbwani, vavayendela vandu kunyumba ya Yasoni, vakadayileyi Pauli na Sila kuvayegha kwa vandu va mumbwani.
44017006	Pavapotili, vamkukusha Yasoni na valongu vaki vamonga kwa vakomi wa mumbwani, vakawuteyi vakadeteyi, “Vandu ava vaghalambulili mulima vosi, vayisa na mumbwani yetu.”
44017007	Na Yasoni kavalibushila na ava vosi vakugola milandu yiveli yilinganila ng'odu na Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa va Kayisali, pavadeta kuna mutwa wingi, vakumkema Yesu.
44017008	Kwa filongu fila vakomi va mumbwani na lipinga lya vandu vapatili lyova.
44017009	Yivagolili Yasoni na vayaki vahombi mbiya, pambeli vavalekiselili vayendi.
44017010	Tepu valongu ava vavayeghili Pauli na Sila pamii mbaka Beleya. Veni pavafikili kula vayingilili munyumba ya kudadavila ya Vayawudi.
44017011	Vandu ava vavelili vanyanyi pitu vala va Tesaloniki, vapikanishili chila chilongu kwa moyu wosi na majuva vosi vayiwulili mayandiku, kulola kucha nakaka chavawombela Pauli na Sila.
44017012	Topi, vandu vamonga vatangalili vajumilili na vadadala va Chigiliki vaveli na fyewu fikomi na wuwula valulumi.
44017013	Lakini, Vayawudi wa Tesaloniki pavamanyili kuva Pauli avelili akulandula chilongu cha Chapanga aku Beleya, vayendili aku, vakandili ndilingu na kuvatumisila lipinga lya vandu.
44017014	Vala valongu vamuyeghili Pauli kumbwani lakini Sila na Timotewu vasiyalili Belea,
44017015	Vala valongu vamuyeghili Pauli vayendili pamu nayu mbaka Ateni. Pambeli, vawuya pamu na yalayishili Pauli kuva Sila na Timotewu valopukesi vamukovikeli.
44017016	Pauli avelili akuvaveta Sila na Timotewu aku Ateni, mugati ya moyu waki akalalili nendu kuwona ndambu mbwani yila yamemili ming'omung'omu.
44017017	Topi munyumba ya kudadavila awombanili na Vayawudi vamumanyili Chapanga na vala atanganikeyi nawu majuva vonda papiteyi mulipinga.
44017018	Vamonga vakovikelili ndambu ya Epikulo na Stoiki valimbanili nayu. Vamonga vadetili “Akudayila kudeta liki ayu ndwangamlomu?” Wula Pauli avelili akulandula milandu ya Yesu na kushukuka, vamonga vadetili “Yikulangusha kucha ayu akulandula milandu ya vachapanga vahenja.”
44017019	Vamtolili Pauli, vamuyegha Aleopagu, vadeta, “Tudayila kumanya chilongu achi chashonu uvelili ukutuwombela.
44017020	Findu fimonga twapikanishili kwa majeji vetu fikuwoneka kucha mihilu kwa yufwi. Tungadayilili kumanya milandu ayi yina mana liki.”
44017021	Venikaya va Ateni na vandu vamonga vayikalaya aku vavelili chipindi chawu chosi vakahimuleye na kupikanisha filongu fya shonu.
44017022	Topi, Pauli awolukili pawulongolu pa chitemela cha Aleopagu, adetili: “Vandu va Ateni! Nguwona kuva yuwi, vandu mukukovekela deha ya kumukovikela Chapanga nendu.
